1.content:
"Man this sucks!" whined Naruto as he moped down one of Konoha's many roads.

"Every mission assigned to us is some boring babysitting job or some other useless task! I wish something interesting would happen for once!"

As if the gods themselves were looking down at Naruto that very moment; he tripped over something and landed on his head.

"Gahh!" He cried rubbing his head in pain, "Who put this stupid thing in the middle of the street?!"

Looking up from grasping his head he noticed that the object he tripped over was a small black air tank with a silver nob at the top which was large enough to hold in his hand. Crawling over to it, he picked it up and examined it more closely.

"Yeash, who left this stupid air can here." It seemed ordinary enough to him. However he noticed a small piece of white paper near the nob. "Hey there's a note on it..."

Fumbling stupidly with the device he ripped the note off without hesitation and read it out loud.

"Who so ever breathes into this air tank will deflate into a wearable skin suit that any person may put on over their own skin. Once the air tank is full of the deflated one's air anyone may either breathe his or her air from the tank and assume their body shape, height, and voice, they may wear their skin and take their appearance, or they may do both and become a complete duplicate of the victim. HAH! Yea right, what is this? A prank on me by Konohamaru?? What kind of dummy would actually fall for a dumb joke like this?!"

No sooner did he throw the note away did someone approach him from down the street. It was...
1.title: The Finding

choices: Naruto runs towards Sakura and puts the air can on her mouth.
11.content:
It was sakura she was walking towards naruto,

What will Naruto do?
11.title: Sakura.

111.content: Sakura deflated into a skintight suit. Naruto grinned as he held "her" up. What should he do with the Sakura suit?
111.title: Naruto runs towards Sakura and puts the air can...

choices: A mixture of his and Sakura's clothes
1111.content:
Naruto quickly stripped off his clothes and picked up Sakura's skin. Stretching the mouth wide, Naruto slipped his feet in, slowly pulling the skin up his waist. He then inserted his arms through the opening and fit them into Sakura's arms, and then finally pulled the skin all the way up to Naruto's neck. After taking a quick breathe, Naruto pulled the head over his, adjusting and moving it into place until it fit snugly. Looking at his reflection in a nearby puddle, Naruto saw he looked exactly like Sakura, except he was naked.

"Oops," Naruto blushed as he realized his dilemma. "Better get dressed before someone sees me."

Naruto looked at the two piles of clothes, his and Sakura's, and put on...
1111.title: Wear it.

choices: Apprentice of the Queen of Medics, Tsunade!
Tutoring with the Illusion Mistress, Kurenai!
11112.content:
Naruto quickly returned Sakura's clothes to her body, and after a moment of deliberation, inhaled the air from the tank. Naruto resisted the urge to shudder as his body and mind changed in a way it was not meant to. Weight shifted, bones changed shape, and something alien filled his mind. Naruto clutched his head as what felt like the worst Shadow Clone dispelling filled his head, suddenly struck by everything that Sakura ever was and would be. Her friendship with Ino, her crush on Sasuke, her annoyance with Naruto, her love for her family... it was all in there. But it was more than just her personal history. It was Sakura's perfect memory and recall. It was Sakura's perfect chakra control. It was all the knowledge and talent that had earned Sakura the top female grade in a class with two clan heiresses competing with her for it.

Naruto-as-Sakura grinned as her newly advantaged mind took all this in in but a moment. Naruto took a moment to form a one handed Rasengan, and was delighted to have it appear easily and near instantly. Shrinking it, then enlarging it, Naruto again delighted in her new-found chakra control as she took in the responsiveness her favorite technique showed. Naruto then attempted a summoning, only to be disappointed as the technique failed to take. She reasoned it was because for all intents and purposes, she was Sakura, not Naruto. Still, it was no great loss. It was rare that she would need to smack down a full manifested Tailed Beast she reasoned. Running through the rest of the combined Naruto and Sakura technique library, she was pleased the the Shadow Clone continued to work, her personal variant of the Transformation still worked, and thanks to Sakura, Naruto now had access to the Illusion Clone and the Illusion Transformation. Finally, Naruto attempted a basic strength test; though she had Sakura's slimmer, less muscled form, she felt as strong as ever. A number of pushups later, Naruto knew that she still had all of her stamina and strength.

Naruto giggled with glee and did a small twirl on the spot. Infinite Chakra and Perfect Control! This was the greatest thing ever! Peering from behind her eyelashes at the air tank that had caused this all, Naruto quickly considered how to best keep it safe. Deciding that it would be best to keep it on her person, Naruto considered how the Sakura suit seemed to correct differences in shape. Peeling back the mouth of her new skin required the application of chakra and the distinct desire to separate from the skin, but an opening for the tank was easy to make in the end. Naruto marveled at the fact that once the Sakura suit was back in place, it was impossible to tell that the tank existed. In fact, Naruto wasn't certain she could detect it herself.

All the better.

Naruto skipped off, considering her plans for the future. As they were, they needed a few adjustments. Naruto now understood that a large deal of the interest in Sasuke was about social status and influence, in addition to genuine admiration. Naruto however, had less interest in such round about ways to power and influence. She was going to the Hokage, believe it! And Naruto was very much still interested in girls, rather than boys. Grinning, Naruto wondered if Ino or Hinata, or both, could be convinced to come around to that kind of thinking.

What also bore consideration was how her skills could improve from here. Between chakra capacity and control, options that were never available to Naruto or Sakura were now well within reach. Illusions, hypnosis and medical techniques were new options Naruto was eager to pursue; the ultimate tricking techniques and the ability to protect and heal her precious people made the often dismissed fields incredibly interesting to Naruto.

And wouldn't you know it, Kurenai Yuhi had offered to tutor her in the Illusion and Hypnotic arts, and Tsunade Senju could definitely be convinced to take on Sakura as an apprentice. Oooh, the possibilities were endless.
11112.title: Becoming Sakura

111121.content:
"Please!"

The fifth Hokage looked up upon hearing a voice, having ignored the incoming footsteps as she went over mission reports in her office. Naruto's teammate, Sakura, was bowing before her.

"Make me your apprentice!"

Fire burned in Naruto's eyes as he stared Tsunade in the eyes from behind Sakura's face. The queen of medics considered her for a moment, before finally replying. "Haruno Sakura. I've heard from Kakashi that you're intelligent and that you have a strong spirit." Tsunade smiled in a predatory manner. "Alright. I won't go easy on you."

Naruto beamed. "Alright!"

---

What happened over the next few months was incredible. Tsunade had been led to believe that her new apprentice had poor stamina, but the reality was anything but. With a mind like a bear trap and the creativity and off the wall thinking to get around any problems she encountered, Tsunade's new apprentice was rapidly progressing at a pace that was practically unheard of. Tsunade had already begun to teach Sakura her strength augmentation technique and some higher level illusions in an effort to distract the poor girl from her missing teammate. After Naruto was missing for a full month and no word had been heard of the blond brat, Tsunade had concluded the worst, and only thanked the gods that the Kyubi appeared to have died with him. Tsunade assumed the curse of the First Hokage's necklace had struck again. When Jiraiya confessed that the toads could no longer contact Naruto, well... that was the final nail in the coffin.

The confirmation of Naruto's passing had brought Tsunade and Sakura together though, the two comforting each other as best they were able. Tsunade had smiled when Sakura declared she would take up Naruto's dream of being Hokage, and somehow suborned Jiraiya into lending his expertise to Sakura's instruction when she revealed an interest in sealing. And Sakura blossomed under the tutelage of the loyal members of the Sannin, rapidly receiving an out of testing promotion to chunin. It might've been protested as favoritism were it not for the fact that Sakura proved ten times over that she could back it up.

Meanwhile, Sasuke had more or less become Kakashi's apprentice as the man's sole student. However, he had become more and more withdrawn over the months that passed, until eventually, he abandoned the village.

---

Naruto was shocked when he heard what her old teammate had done. Alongside Shikamaru, she prepared to retrieve the wayward Uchiha and gathered a team. Kiba was tapped for his nose and tracking skills, alongside Neji for his eyes and skills in non lethal takedowns. Chouji was considered, but passed over for his relatively poor travel speed. After a brief debate between the two chunin, Shino was tapped as well for his ability to drain chakra.

As the mission went on, team members were forced to drop out in order to counter the harriers that broke off from the Oto honor guard sent to retrieve Sasuke. After a drawn out battle between Naruto and a bone wielding Oto ninja, Gaara dropped in and took up the battle for Naruto. Thankful for the intervention, Naruto shot off to pursue Sasuke.

The battle was long and drawn out, but there was some interesting things Sasuke said that made Naruto think. Sasuke criticized Sakura for having it all; training under two of the Sannin, her family. And then he spoke of something far more interesting to Naruto.

Killing your best friend granted a Sharingan wielder a new dojutsu. Granted, he didn't outright state it, but memories of Sakura studying the history of the Uchiha clan as a little girl sprang up. This was the secret to Madara Uchiha's power. But the apprentice of the Hokage had access to reports and knowledge that was otherwise kept secret. Madara had needed to steal his brother's eyes for his new eyes rejected him. And all the members of Team 7 were well aware that Kakashi had an implanted Sharingan eye.

So Naruto wondered; what if she killed Sasuke... and took his Sharingan? Would that satisfy the conditions for the eyes of Madara capable of controlling ever the Kyubi?

Only one way to find out.

Crushing Sasuke's chest felt surprisingly satisfying, particularly with the immense surprise that appeared on Sasuke's face on having Tsunade's strength technique destroy his ribcage and spine. Rapidly shifting to triage mode, Naruto kept Sasuke's now disabled body alive with one hand while the other worked at taking off Sakura's face.

Sasuke's shock at that was even better.

Still kept alive and conscious, though paralyzed, by Naruto's medic techniques, Sasuke watched in shock as Naruto carefully removed an eye from her head, Sakura's mouth a parody of a hood around her face. Naruto tossed the eye and repeated the procedure on Sasuke's active Sharingan, placing it within her empty eye socket. Naruto's regeneration kicked in and integrated the foreign organ in a flash. Naruto grinned and repeated the process with Sasuke's remaining Sharingan.

Naruto felt that performing a double ocular transplant on herself with one hand was rather impressive. She removed the First Hokage's neclace from where it had been sitting beneath the Sakura skin and pulled it back into place, marveling at how the world looked so very different from behind the Sharingan.

"What's this called Sasuke-kun? These new eyes of mine. They're the best present you could have gotten me for my apprenticeship. Oh, you're so romantic." Naruto asked in Sakura's voice in a gross parody of her old behavior.

Sasuke, still in shock, answered numbly. "Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan."

Naruto smiled, not that Sasuke could see it, and finally allowed him to die. Crushing the skull with a Tsunade strength punch, Naruto felt she had disposed of the evidence fairly well. Still smiling, she sealed the battered remains of Sasuke into a scroll and prepared to return to Konoha to report the results of the mission. She would report that Sasuke had killed Naruto out of jealousy, confessed in the heat of battle, and had foolishly kept the First Hokage's neclace as a trophy. Sakura would return to Konoha the avenger of her teammate's murder, retrieving the First Hokage's necklace from a would be traitor, a hero with the tragic tale of being forced to kill her traitor teammate, and the apprentice of the Fifth Hokage. The spiffy new fancy eyes didn't hurt either.

Checking Sakura's appearance in the water of the surrounding battlefield, Naruto was satisfied to see that though she had the Super Sharingan active, only Sakura's green appeared. Twirling the scroll that held the corpse in her hand, Naruto left to Konoha, now the fusion of the greatest pieces of each member of Team 7.

Naruto considered how to break the news to Ino; two grief stricken girls might try to comfort each other in... wonderful ways...
111121.title: Convince Tsunade to teach Naruto-as-Sakura

choices: Itachi investigates the death of his brother!
1111212.content:
Naruto had finished her report to Tsunade, stoically reporting Sasuke's treachery; the murder of Naruto in an attempt to advance his bloodline, the defection to Oto, and her own subsequent brutal response, crushing Sasuke's chest long enough for him to die terrified before popping his skull like a grape. Her mentor had come out from behind her desk and brought Naruto into a hug at some point in the report in an effort to comfort her. They stood silently now, clutching each other, Naruto reveling in this freely given love and comfort.

Naruto broke the silence first. "I need to break the news to my team. ...And my genin pool." Realizing that she hadn't yet asked after her team, she made to do so. "How are Shikamaru and the others?"

Tsunade continued to hold her apprentice, rapidly listing off their condition; all a little battered, but ultimately fine thanks to the intervention of the Suna team sent in support. Which was really a lucky thing, as apparently Gaara had demanded to come to Konoha to pay his respects at Naruto's symbolic grave, the heroes' stone. His brother and sister had been happy to come along as well to pay their respects to the young man who had given them back their younger brother.

The Hokage informed her apprentice that she would be given some off duty time to grieve and process. Naruto confessed that she'd like to pursue the art of illusion and hypnosis more in depth as a sort of distraction project, and Tsunade approved, advising her to seek out Kurenai.

---

Naruto took the leave time provided to purchase and move into an apartment, alongside a still somewhat shocked Ino who had taken the news in a mix of despair and fury, and Tenten, who was happy to have someone to split bills with. Ninja were so often out on missions, it made entirely too much sense to share living spaces; in practice, it ended up being more like a time share then an apartment shared by roommates. That said, by pooling their resources, they had a comfortable and roomy space that was more than comfortable for three young ninja- and whatever company they might bring home.

Over the following months, Ino quickly recovered from Sasuke's defection and subsequent execution in the field, and seemed determined to comfort Sakura. Naruto happily went along with it, and Ino apparently realized how much Naruto luxuriated in physical affection. It was still novel for the demon vessel and body thief, and Ino was rapidly becoming a beautiful- hot- young woman instead of a cute girl. The relationship had escalated just that morning in a peck on the lips, and the two girls had blushed brightly over it. They blushed further when Tenten had stalked catlike and kissed Naruto as well; none of them professed to understand their relationship, but both Ino and Tenten were head over heels for Sakura, apprentice to two of the Sannin and their friend who was rapidly rising through the ranks who strove to comfort, befriend, help and love the both of them.

In that time, Sakura had undergone an intense genjutsu training regime from Kurenai, and due to the numerous advantages Naruto possessed; Sharingan, perfect chakra control, infinite chakra and stamina; she was already close to surpassing the raven haired Jonin. Kurenai remained only proud of her new student, and told her she required now only experience and to craft her own techniques. Naruto had been intensely interested in hypnosis, widely seen as the culmination of the Genjutsu field. While dojutsu and advanced senses could reveal an illusion, hypnotic suggestions and derivatives came from the targets own mind and nearly impossible to recognize if performed with sufficient skill.

Naruto was widely satisfied with the extent he had mastered hypnosis; what Kurenai did not- could not- remember was that she had volunteered to test the successful test of a memory modification technique.

---

Naruto leaped through the thick forest, making all haste to reach Tenten's team after a desperate turtle summon had popped up in the Hokage's office saying they desperately needed a medic. Gai had been disabled, and Neji blinded in a tussle with a group of Kumo ninja. Rock Lee was and Tenten were holed up in a stalemate thanks to Tenten's long distance advantage, but she would eventually run out of chakra or throwing weapons. She had learned an Earth shaping technique in an attempt to provide herself with a theoretically infinite supply of weapons, but Naruto knew her friend- her girlfriend- could only do that so long before her chakra ran dry.

Breaking into the scene and taking out the Kumo nin with a potent mix of genjutsu and super strength, as their senses deceived them into leaping straight into fatal punches, Naruto let out a pattern of whistles in an all clear sign and entered the base Tenten and Lee had made for themselves in a cave in the sheer face of a rock cliff.

"You are damn lucky that neither of them earth release techniques," were the first words out of Naruto's mouth as she entered the mouth of the cave, before hugging Tenten and giving her a light kiss. Naruto turned to face Gai and Neji, and was astonished at the condition the two were in; Gai was as pale as death, and Neji had bandages wrapped around his eyes that despite clearly having been changed, were already useless.

She entered medic mode, assessing the condition of the two males. Gai would be fine. The man had suffered from a delayed poison evidently, a lesser man would have died. It was only thanks to his insane physical health and condition that he had already mostly burned up the otherwise fatal agent.

Neji- well, he wasn't as lucky. A lucky stroke from a kunai had done severe damage to his precious eyes; they were likely irreparably damaged. Naruto considered, before turning to the two healthy members of Team 10. "Which of you is less squeamish?" Lee blushed and looked to Tenten, who stepped forward. "Find the jokers that had you holed up here and bring me back the first head that has eyes in good condition. Fast." Tenten nodded and pursued her assigned mission. "Lee. Boil me some water so I can sanitize everything."

Half an hour later, the operation much more difficult due to Neji lacking a healing factor that Naruto had used to compensate for errors on her own operation, the young Hyuga was resting with a pair of rich hazel eyes behind closed eyelids. The Caged Bird Seal had been a bitch to work around, but due to the eyes already being destroyed, there had been enough leeway to remove the remains and implant the hostile foe's eyes.

Naruto wondered if Neji would appreciate the irony of a Hyuga stealing the eyes of a Kumo ninja. In fact, he did; though his vision had not yet settled and he would require substantial time to adjust to lacking the Byakugan, he promptly went about gathering the corpses of the ambush team and scooping out their eyes. Apparently, the young branch house member still had an impressive amount of anger against Kumo, and the latest incident had not helped.

Naruto watched, mostly impassive, but secretly delighting in the pair of Byakugan eyes she now had sealed away on her person. Silly Hyuga, assuming 'permanently beyond Kumo's reach' meant 'destroyed'.

The trip back to Konoha was slow, Neji needing time to adjust to his new sight. Several times he forgot that he could no longer rely on his dojutsu, but several important details were revealed regardless; Neji still possessed the capacity for extreme telescopic sight, and his range unobstructed was actually much improved. Neji also reported still being capable of perceiving chakra when he attempted to activate his absent Byakugan, but could no longer see through solid objects or his own head. Still, he was making the most of it, and Tenten was happily walking him through a wide collection of long range weapons that could capitalize on his extreme telescopic vision. Neji had already demonstrated, through a combination of a lightning affinity and some crazy contraption Tenten had called a 'Compound Longbow' the ability to snipe a moving target at 5000 meters amidst a crash of thunder. Tenten had sworn up a storm, through which the assembled nin learned that such an act was throughly bullshit, even with chakra taken into account. Nevertheless, Neji had repeated the act, and Tenten had proceeded to grumble something about drag, curvature of the earth and a 'sonic barrier'.

Naruto finally shut Tenten up as they approached the gates by kissing her senseless and dragging her to a eagerly smiling Ino.

That night, after her two girlfriends were asleep after a vivid retelling of the events, Naruto examined the Byakugan eyes in her possession, restored to their former glory. The Kyubi chakra allowed Naruto to go beyond Tsunade's talents and achieve true regeneration, which had been put to good use restoring the eyes.

By the time she went to sleep, the Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan she possessed had been combined with the Byakugan and rested within her head. The red pigment was now replaced by milky white, and Naruto had confirmed that she could see the entirety of Konoha with her new eyes, the Sharingan recording the entire thing.

Naruto grinned.
1111212.title: Other

11112121.content:
Naruto was on an early morning jog, enjoying the benefits of being the apprentice to Tsunade; the use of medical jutsu to sculpt her body exactly as she wished. Long, pink and perfectly healthy hair was tied into a firm braid, her generous and still developing breasts was in a black halter sports bra, leading to a flat and toned stomach above a perfect ass in a tight pair of black booty shorts. Abbreviated shinobi sandals pounded along the ground as Naruto completed another circuit around Konoha.

The combined Byakugan and Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan in Naruto's head were an amazing asset. With the amount of chakra that Naruto was able to dedicate to the eyes, the range of sight encompassed the entirety of Konoha easily. The Sharingan seemed to be innately capable of parsing anything within its sight and impart it to its user. As such, Naruto was functionally omniscient of all that occurred within Konoha. If someone did anything within her range, she could reproduce it. If anything was written, she knew it. If anything was said, she was now a proficient lip reader, and knew it. Separating noise from information was difficult at first, but it was already a hurdle that had been overcome. The greater challenge had actually been not reacting to information that Naruto could not have known.

That said, Naruto was still well aware that Itachi and Kisame had entered Konoha, and so was not surprised when Kisame's giant sword attempted to separate her from her legs. They were actually in what amounted to a shinobi district, so the civilian presence was negligible, but possible friendly support for Naruto was a possibility. Naruto rapidly dodged and launched a few testing punches and kicks to the Missing Nin Swordsman, before falling back and observing the pair, cloaked in Akatsuki robes and large straw hats.

"Pinky's got a bit of skill. Wasn't expecting that," the large blue man commented to his partner. Itachi merely stared forward blankly. Undeterred, Kisame addressed Naruto. "Now come on Pinky, we just want to know what happened to your teammates. Word at large is you killed Itachi's only living relative! How could you do something so cold hearted as that?"

Naruto, quite frankly, saw no reason not to repeat the party line for the benefit of the two missing nin. "Uchiha killed his sleeping teammate in cold blood under the belief that it would grant him 'ultimate power'. We're not certain if he believed he could acquire the mythic eyes of Uchiha Madara, the power of the Kyuubi sealed with Naruto, or a combination of the two. Either way, he was unsuccessful in his venture beyond committing treason and murdering an ally. He was summarily executed in the field, and his eyes destroyed, may he rot in hell."

The two missing nin had remained in place for the short speech, and Kisame laughed upon the conclusion. Itachi actually revealed a frown, though he appeared more disappointed than anything else. Naruto kept her face carefully impassive as suddenly, she struck from behind, striking a paralyzing blow to Kisame's sword arm from beneath illusion cover. As he dropped his chakra consuming sword, Naruto was able to quickly grab it and throw it to the ANBU that now lined the rooftops.

Even with a disabled arm, Kisame was more than a threat, proving that he had well earned his rank. The support that he had from fighting alongside Itachi against a single opponent was not to be ignored, and a high level, fast paced battle followed. Naruto held her own, but was unable to launch any effective attacks. Illusions were put to good use and aided the defensive tactics Naruto was forced to use. Upon the appearance of Tsunade to fight alongside her now struggling apprentice and Kakashi's electrifying entrance with a narrowly avoided Chidori, Itachi elected to retreat, but not before a suddenly on the defensive Kisame perished under a super strength blow to the chest, courtesy of Naruto.

In the coming months, when Sakura was promoted to jonin, naysayers would remember her S-Rank kill in the heart of Konoha and keep their silence.

---

And Naruto continued to have a spectacular track record. Upon the successful reinstatement of the rightful ruler of the Land of Spring, no-one protested the young jonin's short vacation in the Princess' estate. That Koyuki Kazahana was utterly love stricken for her temporary bodyguard was politely not commented on, and it was only upon the successful creation of a personal teleportation technique that Naruto left. The discovery of shadow clones of the Yondaime and the previous Kyuubi vessel within Naruto's soul had been a joyous occasion, and Naruto had not hesitated to pop and absorb the knowledge held within the two.

Huh. Those were her birth parents. Who'd a thunk it?

Still, the immense knowledge, skill and ability the two had possessed, particularly in sealing techniques, was a god send. Naruto had eliminated the flash, actually a disorientation tactic deliberately added in, and the Journey of a Thousand Miles technique was made. Kissing Koyuki goodbye and checking the seal marker in the roof of her mouth as she did so, Naruto made the return journey to Konoha by mundane means, a mix of not wanting to reveal her new ability and not having a personal marker in Konoha. Upon her return, she spread the markers to what was more and more amounting to her harem; Tenten and Ino, her first girlfriends; Hinata, who had come to see Sakura as the second coming of Naruto; and finally Kurenai and Anko, who had evidently been a package deal upon the removal of Anko's curse seal.

Still, there were greater concerns on the horizon; like Akatsuki, the tailed beast hunters who evidently wanted to rule the world; keeping Konoha safe; and attaining the sole loyalty of her harem and their health upon it.
11112121.title: Itachi investigates the death of his brother!

111121211.content:
Naruto deepened her kiss, and Shizune melted a little more into her. Separating so the brunette could gasp for air, Naruto smirked at the normally demure jonin before leaning in to nip at her nick. And once she was all hot and bothered...

Tsunade burst into the quiet record room Shizune had dragged Sakura into. Shizune blinked hazily, before recognizing her sensei. "Oh, Tsunade-sama. Are you going to join us?" she asked slightly vacantly, leading Naruto and Tsunade to chuckle lightly.

"Not today, my apprentices." Tsunade said, and Shizune blushed, realizing she had just propositioned her mentor. She made to stutter her apologies, but Tsunade waved them off with a leer. "Maybe later, but we've got a situation."

Naruto, by this time, had her blue and white battle dress back in place, and fussed with Shizune's kimono, which was still in disarray. "Oh?" she asked absently.

"Sand's asking for backup. Akatsuki stole Gaara." Tsunade answered bluntly.

Naruto blinked- she had already seen the report thanks to her stolen eyes, but it was still surreal to hear the words. "How do you steal a Kage from his village? And what does that say about Sand?"

Tsunade grunted, and Naruto and Shizune fell into position either side of her as they returned to Tsunade's office. "It reflects poorly on them, and us by proxy because of the alliance, but they aren't actually that weak. Really, Gaara and Sand just got overconfident that nothing could challenge the Ichibi in a desert. Akatsuki capitalized on it." She shrugged to emphasize the point, and her marvelous chest followed the motion, drawing Naruto's eyes. When she returned to eye contact, Tsunade gave a flirty wink to the pinkette.

"Well, I can't actually order you Sakura, my queen- what will you do?"

Naruto smiled at those words- 'my queen'. They were true too, as Naruto was sole master of the Venus Contract. Naruto's loss of the Frog Contract had been a bit of a sore point, and she had worked to obtain a new contract to replace them. Somewhere along the way, Naruto had crafted a chakra contract with herself as the master... but no summons. But it was when she really examined her contract again that she realized that the pacts characteristic of a summon contract could be tweaked to create unbreakable loyalty, personality and emotion influencing connections. Functionally, any signee would love Naruto, be unshakably loyal to her, and obey her orders. Oh, they could question, and waver, but if Naruto truly wanted them to obey, they'd do it and think it was their own idea. In return, the signees were granted the regeneration Naruto had, meaning they didn't age, scar, or get sick. Enhanced stamina and chakra reserves had appeared as well.

Naruto had been quick to get her lovers, and a few more, to sign what she came to call the Venus contract. Ino, Tenten, Hinata, Kurenai, Anko, Yuugao, Shizune, Tsunade, Koyuki, Tsume and Hana had all found themselves to be signees, which none of them could really find it in themselves to mind. Naruto didn't even have to exert unnatural influence.

In particular, Tsunade was delighted with her returned youth, the regeneration having returned her to the physical age of twenty-one, and was known among the Venus Court for being a bit of a nymphomaniac.

...None of them really seemed to mind though.

Naruto shook herself from happy recollections and spun to head out the door, but not before tossing her head over her shoulder. "I'll handle it."

---

When Sakura arrived at the gates of Sand, it was an anxious Temari who was there to escort her in. She watched, amazed, as the pink haired jonin calmly set about bringing her brother back from death's door, not a single sign of stress on her features. Once she was finished, Sakura turned to her and asked to be taken somewhere they could get some privacy. Gaara's office being the best choice, Temari escorted her there. Once Sakura was satisfied that they were secure...

"Right. Now, how're we planning on saving Gaara?" the pinkette asked her. "Can you still sense him?"

Temari blinked, and tried to deny that she was a sensor, only for Sakura to shift her hips, brush a bang back over her ear and roll her eyes. "You could sense him back at the chunin exams Temari." Temari blinked, surprised the girl had remembered that fact. "Also, I'm a medic-nin that my Kage is willing to send to fight Akatsuki solo. The Fifth Kazekage was dead.

The sight of the Ramen stand and home to ambrosia-like noodles elicited a double set of reactions in the girl: there was Naruto's usual excitement, stressed by an eager rumble in her stomach, but there was also a distant sense of distress and sadness. She must have looked like a fool, standing schock still smack in the middle of the road, trying to wrap her mind around the contrasting emotions, so she entered, waved at Ayame and plopped herself down on Naruto's usual stool.

A minute later, Ayame was there to take her order. "Ah, Sakura. Good to see you. Naruto isn't with you?"

She smiled back, amused. "No, he -" and then froze as Ayame's smile slipped a bit.

Where was Naruto?

It dawned to her she had been referring to herself as Sakura, not Naruto, where not thirty minutes before the obnoxious but brave blond had been her. Hell, he stil was, after a fashion. And yet here she was, sitting like Sakura, wearing her clothes, even thinking broadly like her. Who was she?

For beautiful, Kurenai Yuhi was. Long, tumbling raven hair, eyes one could get lost in, full lips, a lithe but generous body sculpted by years of training and a brain second to none in Konoha, Sakura found her thoughts turning more and more to her sensei as the days turned into weeks.

The young boy wondered aloud as he pulled the suit up his torso then inserted his arms into Hinata's and finally pulling her face over his. After making some minor adjustments so that he could see properly he looked himself over to see that while he had Hinata's pale skin and dark hair, he lacked her amble bust and curves which made the outfit have a boyish outlook though the lack of a man hood was very much present.

"Well I guess I should give myself the finishing touches or should I go find someone to mix and match with?" Both ideas sounded exciting.
1211.title: Naruto wears the suit.

choices: Play Hinata for a day, go to her home.
Go pranking like this. Hinata will take the wrap.
12111.content:
Tearing himself away from examining his new body, Naruto looked down at the air tank lying on its side next to Hinata's pile of clothes. Grinning, he lifted the tank in one hand and grabbed the articles of clothing with his other.

"Guess I should go all the way, I'm come this far already right?"

~

Naruto had moved all of the "equipment" to a side alley and began the finishing touches. According to the note all he had to do was breathe in the air from the tank and he'd completely take Hinata's form.

The process was quick but stimulating; Naruto had never experienced anything quite like it. All the air traveled throughout his body, amplifying womanly curves and shapes while reducing muscle mass. Even his height went up slightly, he really had become a physical Hinata clone. Best of all, there was no jutsu involved. There was no way anyone could tell the difference unless they found the tank or the remains.

Before anyone noticed him, Naruto put on Hinata's clothes and stepped out of the alley, hiding the air tank under her gray jacket. Though he felt somewhat guilty for abusing Hinata's trust like this, the thrill of the situation was too much for him to handle. This might end up being the greatest prank ever.

"Alright, I gotta hide this thing..." He said to himself in Hinata's voice.

Looking around, he spotted a loose fence board behind one of the trash cans. After giving it a slight push, he discovered that there was an enclosed space behind it, perfect for hiding the air tank and his spare clothing in. After closing up his hiding place, he marked the board with a small red 'N'. Things could end up really badly if he forgot the hiding place.

Clapping the dust off his hands, Naruto pondered what to do next.
12111.title: Finishing Touches.

choices: Naruto eventually stumbled upon the mansion.
Naruto runs into one of Hinata's teammates this time.
121111.content:
"There you are." Spoke a hollow voice from behind Naruto, causing him to practically jump out of Hinata's skin.

Petrified that he had been caught, Naruto shakily turned around. The source of the voice belonged to Neji, Hinata's dark and broody cousin.

"I've been looking everywhere for you Hinata. Lord Hyūga has been demanding your presence. Immediately."

Naruto sighed in relief, thankfully it seemed Hinata's cousin hadn't discovered his ploy. Meaning at least he hadn't been caught, yet.

"Oh! Neji....Man, you scared me!"

Neji raised an eyebrow. "Are....You feeling alright Lady Hinata?"

"Fine, why?"

"You're acting...different..."

Naruto mentally slapped himself across the face. If he went around acting like he normally did disguised as Hinata, he was bound to get caught easily. Thinking of a quick excuse, he smoothly got into a more fitting character for Hinata.

"I-I've...Just b-been feeling a little sick after the m-mission..."

Neji blinked once then cocked an eye. "Ah..."

Naruto prayed that he'd bought that and continued. "S-so, f-father needs me?"

"...Right."

A sudden dread thought sparked through the pranksters brain. He didn't know where the Hyūga mansion was!

"Okay...I-I'll just be going n-now..."

"...Alright..."

Naruto tried to take a few steps back before turning around down the street.

"Hinata."

Naruto yelped. "Y-yes?"

"The mansion is that way..." Neji pointed to the road behind him with his thumb.

"O-oh...R-right...My m-mistake...Thank you N-Neji..."

Naruto awkwardly played with his thumbs as he walked past Neji. The brooding boy didn't bother to look up and just crossed his arms. When he was sure "Hinata" was out of ear shot, he mumbled to himself.

"Yeah...Something is definitely up."
121111.title: To Home as Hinata.

choices: Neji, he found the air tank.
1211111.content:
"That was close." Naruto said to himself as he traveled through Konoha. "I really need to be more careful from now on..."

Naruto was having second thoughts about leaving the air tank there now, he had almost gotten caught within minutes of putting on the suit. This was getting a little dangerous. On top of it all, he still didn't know exactly where the Hyūga mansion was and Neji's directions were vague at best. Konoha was a big place after all.

He decided the best place to start looking would be the noble section of the city near the forest outer limits. Without wasting anymore time, he sent off before he got Hinata into any more trouble.

~

It didn't take that long to get to the noble section, and it took even less time to find the Hyūga mansion when he got there. Being the largest clan in Konoha, they would of course have the largest home which particularly dwarfed all the other mansions in the area.

"Whoa...This is where Hinata lives? She must have it made!"

Laughing stupidly, Naruto stepped up to the front door and slid it open. The main hall was well lit with bits of priceless art and polished floors. At the end of the long red carpet that ran through the middle of the hall was an older man who looked somewhat cross. Naruto correctly guessed that he was Hinata's father.

With arms crossed, Lord Hyūga spoke. "And just WHERE have you been, Hinata?"

"O-oh...Uh...J-Just returning from m-my mission father..."

"You know full well that you have training to be doing, young lady. You should have completed your mission hours ago. We may have to very well skip diner because of your dillydallying."

Naruto gulped slightly. He wasn't prepared to be assaulted with a full on training session after immediately returning home. But, clearly there was no arguing with the man.

Naruto bowed. "S-Sorry father...I'll b-begin training at once..."

~

Two hours later, Naruto was exhausted, sweaty, and bruised. He collapsed on the bed in Hinata's room. Already he was having second thoughts about this whole plan.

"Man...Hinata's got it roughed. I've never even worked myself that hard before."

He ran a hand through Hinata's short black hair. It was odd, but it felt like he had already adjusted to her body. Maybe it was the training or maybe there was a little bit of Hinata's conscious in him. But he shrugged it off.

"That's it...Tomorrow I'm getting the air tank back and setting things right. This isn't worth it."

Suddenly there was a knock at the door. It was...
1211111.title: Home at last.

choices: Neji wants Naruto to humiliate Hinata.
Neji wants Naruto to see what Tenten thinks of him.
12111111.content:
A familiar glare greeted Naruto as he opened the door. At first he thought it was Hinata's father again here to chew him out some more. But instead it was someone he hadn't expected to see.

"Neji?"

"Hello, 'Sister' Hinata. May I come in?"

"U-Um, I suppose." replied Naruto hesitantly, not sure what his intention were.

The Hyūga boy quietly entered the room, it was only now that Naruto realized just how intimidating he was. Having his first experience with Byakugan just a few hours ago, he knew how difficult it was to pinpoint the chakra nodes in training. He could only imagine how hard it would be to do it in the middle of a battle. Plus, in this body Naruto wasn't sure he could take Neji on.

As Neji shut the door behind him, he produced a cylinder object from his side pocket which Naruto shiver in fear.

"I-I, uh," started Naruto. "I can explain!"

"There's no point in it, I kind of already figured out who you are. There was a little orange jumpsuit left with it along with the note, so there's no point in hiding it Naruto."

"Aw, crap," Naruto's head buzzed with ways to escape out of this one but with Neji having the air tank there was no way for him to get back to normal. "So I'm in trouble I take it?"

"Something like that..." Neji smiled in a sinister way. "If you want to get back to normal and escape without punishment from everyone, perhaps we can work out a sort of deal."

"A deal? What kind of deal?"

"Well...
12111111.title: Caught

choices: Naruto manages to steal the air tank from Neji.
Naruto messes up talking with Tenten.
121111112.content:
All of a sudden, Neji's typical confident face was flustered with a deep scarlet hue. Unfortunately, Naruto was a little slow when it came to recognizing social cues and were merely annoyed with the slight pause in Neji's speech.

"Well, what?" he asked at last.

Neji averted his eyes. "W-Well, there are certain things you can't ask girls about...And seeing as you have Hinata's body, I-I was wondering if you could ask Tenten what she thought of me."

In that instant, a sly grin appeared on Naruto's (or rather, Hinata's) face. "Wait, a minute. You like Tenten, don't you?"

Neji completely looked in the other direction. "I don't know what you're talking about."

Naruto walked up to Neji from behind and said. "Oh, come on, man. You like her, admit it."

As Naruto raised his hand to slap Neji on the back, Neji's strong arm caught the disguised ninja's wrist. Naruto gave off a girlish squeal as the angry Hyuga squeezed harder.

"Not a word to anyone," warned Neji. "Do you understand?"

"Ow, alright! I get it! Let go!"

Neji huffed and released Naruto, leaving the Hinata-shaped ninja to comfort his now heavily bruised wrist. Naruto didn't think that a master of the so-called Gentle Fist technique would have such a powerful grip.

"It sickens me to think that I have to rely on a pervert like you," muttered Neji as he turned for the door. "But your situation grants me some leverage."

Neji held up both Naruto's old clothes and the air tank, grabbing Naruto's attention instantly.

"Give that stuff back!" yelled Naruto.

"Not so fun to be a girl all day, is it? It's disgusting to think you're in Lady Hinata's body, but I won't tell on you if you do what I request. Besides, it's the only way you're going to get back to normal."

Naruto was crestfallen. "You mean I'm stuck like this!?"

"Until you do what I ask. Should have thought about that before you messed with something like this."

Neji casually tossed the air tank into the air and caught it. "We're having a team meeting tomorrow before lunch. Approach Tenten afterwards."

And that was the last thing Neji said to Naruto as he slammed the door shut behind him. Naruto grunted and began to tend to his aching wrist. He had no idea how he had gotten himself into this mess, but there was going to be only one way out. He couldn't take Neji head on in a fight as Hinata, and the stoic ninja would probably spill the beans if he did.

"I've never even spoken to Tenten!" Naruto pounded Hinata's bed in anger.

Regardless of how unfair the situation was, Naruto was at a huge disadvantage with how to approach Neji's crush. He was good at pranks, not socializing with people. Let alone girls. He was going to have to think of something quick if he was going to get his body back.

The next day...
121111112.title: Fishing for a Crush

choices: Disguise himself as Hinata and Naruto as Hanabi.
1211111122.content:
By the time morning came, Naruto had still not come up with an idea on how to approach Tenten. It didn't help that he had to sleep in a body he still wasn't completely comfortable with. Hinata's breasts went everywhere as he slept so that he couldn't move at all and had to be completely motionless in order to rest.

At the crack of dawn, Naruto had only gotten a few hours of sleep and groggily made his way into the Hyuga household. Despite it being so early in the day, everyone in the family, including Neji, was up practicing in the mansion's garden. Hinata's father turned from his sparring with Hinata's little sister, Hanabi, and scolded Naruto.

"There are you, Hinata! Decided to sleep in? Well, you'll just have to work twice as hard if you want breakfast."

"Seriously?" muttered Naruto to himself.

~

Only when it was about ten in the morning did the training let up. Naruto could barely stand from the lack of food in his belly and all the bruises on Hinata's body. He collapsed under a tree, trying to escape the beating sun of the summer day with small success.

Unfortunately, Naruto's brief moment of silence was interrupted by the approach of a shadow.

"There you are," said Neji. "Enjoying Lady Hinata's training?"

"It's horrible!" replied Naruto as he flailed childishly around a little. "I hate it!"

"Well, her father is going easy on you because of an injury he received from a recent mission. You should be thankful."

"Seriously!? What is wrong with that guy!?" Naruto suddenly had a huge wave of pity for Hinata and her lifestyle.

"Regardless," continued Neji. "Time you fulfill your end of the bargain if you want to return to normal."

He then grabbed Naruto by the wrist again, yanking him to his feet and leading him into the village. Specifically, Neji was taking Naruto in the direction of the training grounds, where most young teams normally would meet up. As they walked along, Neji stopped them very suddenly.

"There she is," he muttered to Naruto. "Waiting at the tree past the bushes, straight ahead."

"How can you...Oh, right," Naruto remembered the powers of the Hyuga clan and activated his own Byakugan eyes to see what Neji was talking about. Sure enough, Tenten was restlessly tossing kunai at a few trees, waiting for her teammates.

"Go on," Neji nudged Naruto, holding out the air tank with his other hand. "Talk to her and you'll get this back."

Naruto grunted and panicked to himself as he approached Tenten. He still had no idea what he was going to say to the female ninja in order to satisfy Neji. He couldn't just blurt out "Do you like Neji" or else she'd know exactly how sent this. Subtly wasn't Naruto's strong suit.

Tenten jolted slightly as Naruto came crashing through the bushes, readying some of her kunai for a potential fight. "Hinata? What are you doing here?"

"U-Um, hey, Tenten...," Naruto's own nervousness was playing on Hinata's natural behavior perfectly. "I-I was just taking a, um, walk. S-Sorry..."

"No, it's alright," Tenten smiled slightly, putting her weapons away. "You just surprised me is all. You haven't seen my teammate, have you?"

"W-Who? Neji?"

"Yeah, we were supposed to have lunch together after our team meeting, but he hasn't spoken to me since I agreed to it. Honestly, I don't know what he's thinking."

"A-Actually," Naruto began. "That's kind of why I'm here..."

Tenten looked suddenly a little cross. "What? Did he chicken out and ask you to tell to break the news to me in his place?"

"What? N-No, of course n--"

But Tenten had already made up in her mind that was what happened. She angrily stomped her foot. "I don't understand him. I told him before if he was ever interested in someone, he needed to express himself and not leave it for others."

"H-He means the best with his intenti--"

"So," Tenten interrupted. "He DID send you! I knew it! Jeez, this is so like him! Well, if he can't properly express himself on his own, then I'm not going to go out to lunch with him. In fact, Hinata, are you doing anything for lunch?"

"N-Not that I know of but--"

"Good! Let's go out to eat by ourselves. I could use another girl to talk to about Neji with, especially since you grew with him."

Naruto felt like he couldn't refuse her request and quietly agreed. "...Okay."

"Terrific! Hang out around the fence and I'll come find you when I'm done meeting Gai-sensei."

Naruto nodded and retreated back into the forest where he had left Neji. There, Hinata's cousin was waiting for him with his arms crossed. He looked even more annoyed than Tenten did.

"What did you do, you stupid prankster!?"

"What?" asked Naruto. "I did the best I could, man. But she seems pissed at you for asking someone to talk to her. It's your own fault!"

Neji clicked his tongue angrily.

"Look," continued Naruto. "I get you're pissed, but we had a deal. I talked to Tenten, now give me the airtank back!"

Neji decided to...
1211111122.title: Another Date

12111112.content:
' Come in . ' , Naruto said as he got off the bed. The door opened and Hanabi was standing in the doorway, she had a slight grin on her face. ' What is it? ' , Naruto asked annoyed by her silence. Hanabi said, ' Today was your worse training ever, I couldn't imagine that you can get any weaker . ' . ' I get it that she is some prodigy child but she has no right to make fun of Hinata who trains really hard. ' , Naruto thought to himself. Naruto then said in a confidence that didn't suit Hinata, ' The Gentle First ain't really my style. Why don't I go kick your ass right now outside. ' Hanabi was shocked to hear Hinata speak like this. Hinabi wondered if this really was her sister, but she then though that Hinata must have snapped.

Hinata and Hinabi both went to the clan's training ground. ' I am not going to waste my time with the gentle fist. I am going to Naruto's ninja handbook. I better finish this quick before anyone see. ' , Naruto thought to himself. Hanabi then activated her Byakugan and charged straight at Naruto. Naruto knew he couldn't use his shadow clones, but for some reason he thought a one handed rasengan would work. All the training Hinata did payed off. It was so easy for him to send chakra to his right hand and manipulate it. Too his surprise a giant Rasengan appeared, Hanabi froze with shock. Naruto knew he would kill Hinabi with this so he had to dial his Rasengan a lot down. Hinabi charged again when she saw the rasengan loose it's most of it's mass. Hinabi was about to make contact with Naruto, just before Hinabi touched him Naruto forced a weak non lethal rasengan into her stomach. The blast send Hanabi flying into a tree. Naruto stared at his feminine right hand and thought to himself, ' I don't get why Hinata waste her time with the gentle fist, her chakra control is amazing and her chakra is powerful .' . Naruto then awoken from his thoughts when he saw Hinabi was hurt. He went to help her up and noticed that Hinabi had found a new respect for Hinata. Naruto just hoped no one else saw him...
12111112.title: Hinata's sister.

1211112.content: Is it Kiba, the heir to the Inuzaka clan, the same person a lot of people believes has a crush on Hinata?
1211112.title: Kiba Inuzaka?

121111212.content: Does Kiba want to ask whom he perceives as Hinata out on a date?
121111212.title: Date?

1211112121.content: "Hinata" sat naked upon he ground. Unconsciously activating the Byakugan, she saw "her" "teammate" Kiba Inuzuka. In a rush, the new Hinata dressed to the best of her abilities, successfully finishing before Kiba arrived. Reaching "Hinata", Kiba breathed heavily before leaning against a wall. Smoothly, or at least in Kiba's opinion, he asked "Hinata" out
1211112121.title: Yes

121112.content: An idea quickly dove into Naruto's mind. He had Hinata's body, right? That meant that he also had her IDENTITY. A sly smile crossed Hinata's lips. "There's nothing wrong with a few pranks, right?" Naruto thought to himself. Having chosen his course of action, Naruto began deciding who his first target would be. Multiple ideas appeared, but Naruto decided to choose the most over-the-top person he knew: Rock Lee. Naruto chuckled malevolently as he set off for his first target...
121112.title: The Benefits of Someone Else's ID

choices: revival of Hinata in a different body
12112.content:
Naruto quickly sees Sakura walking down the street decide to mix and match quickly pulling her into the ally
before she can even speak puts the tube into her mother and presses the button.

after Sakura is successfully deflated Naruto is stuck at a new dilemma. Should he breath in Sakura's air whilst wearing the Hinata suit and using Hinatas air inflate the sakura suit or put on the Sakura suit and breath in Hinata's air.
12112.title: Hh look, Sakura

choices: It was Sakura in Hinata's Skin. Then that ment Hinata was in Sakura's skin
How about Double Hinata or Sakura
1212.content:
As Naruto started to put the tube back in the Hinata skins mouth he heard a loud yell of "You idiot what are you doing".

He whipped his body around and the tube ended up in sakuras mouth and the air from the tank started to go in. Naruto realized after a minute what had happened and pull the tube out. But it was two late and the tank was empty again. So Naruto quickly stuck the tube back in and took out what he thought was Hinata's Air and put the tube back in the hinata's skins mouth. the skin then it started to inflate to the normal size the girl was.

"Hey Hinata are you ok" Naruto asked.
1212.title: Sakura shows up out of nowhere

1213.content:
Naruto was still gaping in shock at the image of Hinata deflating like a balloon while he slowly came to realize it was real.

With an almost giddy expression he separated Hinata's skin from her clothes and held it up in front of him.

"Holy cow. It worked, it really worked! This is gonna be the best prank EVER!"

Idly, he realized that perhaps the middle of a street wasn't the best place to be talking about such a thing. He was just lucky that this area seemed to be deserted for some reason. Eh oh well, but who knew how long that would last.

Quickly bundling the skin and air tank up in her clothes, he picked the bundle up and dashed off to his apartment with a grin plastered to his face.


He arrived at his apartment with the only delay being one of the other tenants questioning him about the clothes bundle, but he had diverted the old lady's attention with a question about one of her pregnant cats before dashing off.

Shutting the apartment door behind him and locking it for good measure Naruto also made sure to pull the curtains across his windows for maximum privacy. Only then did he lay the bundle down and spread it all across his table.

Carefully he picked up Hinata's skin again and marveled at the thing. It was her height, soft to the touch, and even had her hair. At a distance if it was set right you wouldn't be able to tell it wasn't Hinata just laying down. Turning it around he looked for a way to put the suit on but found none, perhaps one had to go in through the mouth as unpleasant as that sounded.
1213.title: To the apartment!

choices: I'm gonna put on the suit
I'll make another clone to wear the suit
12132.content:
Naruto was startled out of his reverie as a knocking came from his apartment door.

"Naruto, Naruto are you in there?" came Sakura's voice.

"Oh crud, if anyone finds me with this stuff I'm dead," Naruto whispers. Quickly and quietly he formed a shadow clone and handed it all the stuff. "Here hide it somewhere, but don't let Sakura find you with it!" he ordered before calling out to Sakura.

"Just a minute, ramens boiling, gotta turn off the stove." Shuffling around in his kitchen for a second to buy his clone some time, idly he noted it had gone into the bathroom probably to hide the stuff under the sink or something, before going to unlock his door and let a frowning Sakura in.

"Geez baka, make a lady wait a while longer huh?" she said with her arms crossed as she looked across the untidy apartment with a frown.

"So uh, what're you doing her Sakura-chan, I thought Kakashi-sensei said we had a while off after that last mission?" Naruto asked, truly unsure why Sakura was here, the only times she ever visited was for when he was late to team practice.

At this Sakura had a slight grin cross her lips. "I'm here to collect on that debt. Your bloody bright orange jumpsuit got us spotted while we were hiding in that mission so I'm telling you to at least get something stealthy."

Naruto's reply was interrupted as a feminine yelp sounded from the bathroom drawing both of their attention.

"Naruto just who do you have in here?" Sakura questioned with a glare before stomping off towards the bathroom while Naruto tried to bar her way.

"NO Sakura, you don't wanna see that honest!" he cried before the bathroom door opened behind him. Pausing and waiting for Sakura to slug him he was surprised when Hinata stepped around him looking just the same as she did when he first saw her today.

"Sorry, Sakura-san, N-naruto-kun invited me over today for some advice on better controlling his chakra," Hinata quietly said, explaining her presence to Sakura who while skeptic had calmed down noticeably

"Oh, good luck then trying to get this baka to listen," she let out before turning to head back to the main room with Hinata and Naruto behind her.

Naruto meanwhile was looking at Hinata suspiciously, why hadn't she told Sakura about the air tank?

"Seriously Naruto, if you'd just said something about asking Hinata for Chakra tips I wouldn't have minded waiting til tomorrow to find you some clothes," she claimed, settling in one of the cleaner chairs. That just happened to be on the side closer to the kitchen. "Hey Naruto, I thought you'd said you were making ramen?" she asked as she gave the air a slight sniff.

Behind Sakura, Naruto was able to see Hinata's eyes widen in panic some before her hand blurred forward and struck Sakura in the neck. Sakura dropped to the floor unconscious and Hinata sheepishly turned to Naruto.

"Oops, sorry boss. Got a bit jumpy," she said bashfully.

Naruto's eyes bugged out at those words. "But then you're the clone, and suit. Then you?"

Hinata nodded her head and gave a beaming smile. "Yep. I put on the suit and used the air tank. It's so awesome. I'm a clone yeah, but I'm Hinata-chan too. Everything about her is mine to use, even her jutsu and memories," the former clone stated with a blush, activating her Byakugan for good measure.

"But what about Sakura-chan, why'd you knock her out?" Naruto asked Hinata with narrowed eyes.

"Sorry, I really am. I panicked and acted before I thought about it. Although now that she's unconscious you can deflate her," Hinata said as she pulled the air tank out from under her Jacket.

Naruto took the tank and with a frown decided to go ahead and deflate her. At least until he figured out what to do about all of this.

Stuffing the hose in her mouth he turned the tank on and watched as she slowly deflated just like Hinata had not even an hour before. Before too long a Sakura suit was laying in the floor of his apartment which he gathered up and set on his couch while Hinata/clone followed behind him.

The clone that was Hinata was minutely squirming the entire time. If Naruto hadn't been so focused on Sakura he'd have easily noticed the blush on her face. Being Naruto he had a lot of affection for Sakura but that was nothing compared to the adoration Hinata felt for himself. The idea of Naruto-kun being Sakura-chan was enough to make a small grin spread across her face.

Turning around Naruto looked at Hinata/clone quizzically. "What's with you?"

"N-Nothing," she stammered, averting her gaze to avoid looking directly at Naruto-kun.

"Anyway, I think I know what I'm going to do now," Naruto declared.
12132.title: Someone knocks at the door

12133.content: " I wonder what would happen if I fill Hinata's skin with someone else's air? " , Naruto thought to himself. " I can't wait to find out, it would be the best prank ever! " , naruto said getting goosebumps. " I wonder who will else can I use? " , Naruto asked himself. Naruto left Hinata's skin at his apartment and took the air tank with him to search for his victim.
12133.title: Fill Hinata's skin with someone else's air.

121331.content:
The search for the Uchiha was easier than expected. Naruto found him and caught him by surprise. He didn't expect Naruto to walk up to him and muzzle him with the air tank, Naruto would usually call out an assault and challenge him head on. Sasuke grabbed on Naruto's wrist with both hands trying to pull away, but his energy got drained just as his air did. He slowly let go off Naruto and slowly turned into a skin suit with a pile of clothes. Naruto immediately picked him and his clothes up and went back to his apartment.

Naruto held the air tank in his hand and wondered how he would separate the air. Unfortunately there was nothing he could do, the air of Sasuke had mixed with the air of Hinata. He took Hinata's naked skin suit and began filling it with air. He was careful enough to only use half the air in the tank. Hinata's skin suit slowly began to fill up and convert back into a living human. Hinata's body retained its original form but something was different about it.

What was it?
121331.title: Sasuke

choices: All of Sasukes good traits mixed with Hinatas
1213312.content: How had her personality changed?
1213312.title: Her personality changed

choices: Hinata notices a strange symbol carved into the tank (This is the symbol: Ⓧ)
122.content:
Naruto shrugged, "All right, let's try it."

After a few seconds of complete and utter silence, Hinata asked, "D-do you m-mi-mind if y-yo-you t-test i-it?"

Hinata did not want to admit it, but she was hoping this would work so she could spend time in her crush's body and temporarily escape her father's disappointment.

Naruto smiled at the shy girl, "Okay, I'll try it out."

Still believing it to be a hoax, Naruto puts the tube in his mouth, and twisted the knob. The two ninjas were shocked as the tank really did deflate Naruto.

Within seconds, Naruto transformed into a wearable outfit garbed in his normal orange jumpsuit.
122.title: Naruto volunteers.

choices: Hinata goes off to get acquainted with her new body
1221.content:
Hinata remains in shock for a minute before finally accepting what happened as reality. Bending down, she quickly pokes the Naruto suit before recoiling, as if it might bite her. When it did not move, she gingerly picked it up in shaking hands, partly wondering if this was one of Naruto's pranks or not.

Once it was back on and she made sure everything fit her perfectly, Hinata grabbed the hose and all but shoved it into her mouth, turning the valve as she did so.

'Please let this work.' She prayed as the tank and hose began to shake and hiss, slowly starting to suck the air out of her.
1232112222121.title: She panics and tries to reverse it. Does it work?
