Naruto starts to squirm around, reminding Hinata how good it feels.
12321122221211.content:
As Kurenai’s air was removed from her, Hinata felt her body shifting back to its normal state. However, she also felt an odd tightness and weight on her front; not to mention that it felt a bit harder to breath then before. Hinata pushed all of that from her mind however, as she didn’t want to even consider the possibility of this not working and Naruto being trapped for good. A stray thought crossed her mind at the thought. ‘It does feel good though… And who’s to say that Naruto-kun won’t come to like it too?’ Hinata shook her head, she couldn’t allow herself to think like that; still the thoughts persisted making her question if she really wanted to let Naruto out.

It took awhile but, she finally noticed that the air tank had finished in removing Kurenai’s air. Spitting out the hose end Hinata shifted from one side to the other hoping to feel Naruto moving under her. When she only felt her own feet touching the floor as she shifted, she knew that her hopes had gone unanswered. A dispassionate sigh escaped the young teen as she slowly wiggled her way out of the Kurenai suit so that she could get a better look at herself.

Upon escaping the confines of the suit that her sensei had become, Hinata quickly noticed a few things were different. First thing she noticed was how her breasts were clearly larger then they had been before. She now sported large round D-cup breasts which looked quite perky and firm. A quick check confirmed that they were still as soft as ever and quite sensitive to touch. As she half expected a small trickle of milk also leaked out of her nipples. Next thing she noticed was how her stance felt wider, which was to be expected if she was carrying life in her womb. Running her hands down her sides, Hinata was admittedly surprised at how much her hips seemed to have flared out. A small detour showed that her rump was larger and fuller as well. This was good as it would give her added support and padding when she sat down.

Last was the most obvious change, one that even though she thought she was prepared for it still left her very shocked. If her belly had appeared big to her before when having Kurenai’s air in her, then the sheer size of her stomach now left Hinata wondering how she was even standing, much less so easily. If the sheer size that Naruto had left her wasn’t enough, the fact that her belly wasn’t round and spherical like before really threw her for a loop. Hinata could easily see Naruto’s shape perfectly through her tight skin. She could see how his hands were off to the sides, as if to try and press the constraining walls of her womb away from him. She could see the arms leading to his hands, the shape of his legs that were curled up in front of him, and the skin was pressed tightly enough against him that she could even make out the vague outlines of the muscles in his limbs. The part that actually scared her a bit was how she could even make out his facial features and the expression on his face to some degree through the tight skin.

Worry flooded her as she registered just how tightly her body was pressing against Naruto. Placing her hands on her disturbingly human shaped belly, Hinata tried to feel for any movement that would indicate that Naruto was still alive and ok. If she had killed the blond by accident then she would never be able to forgive herself; thankfully she was able to detect small twitches and tiny movements showing that Naruto was still alive. Though she doubted he was all that happy with his new situation.

Hinata just stood there for a time. Simply running her hands up and down Naruto’s form as if trying to sooth him and keep him calm. All the while, she was desperately trying to think of something that she could do. As she stood there thinking, Hinata felt her belly suddenly starting to round out. It was slow but, she took some comfort in knowing that Naruto would at least have a little room to move.
12321122221211.title: Young Hinata pregnant with Naruto?!?

choices: Continue in the baths as the girls try to get even 'friendlier' with Hinata.
123211222212111.content:
Hinata sighed as she finished hiding the empty Kurenai suit and the air tank under her cloths. She looked down towards her massive and now much rounder belly, feeling rather mournful as she gently rubbed the sides of the great sphere. She planned to sneak to Naruto's apartment and do some experimenting with the air tank and suits. She was hoping that by doing so, she'd find some way of releasing Naruto.

Another sigh escaped her as she realized how much she was going to have to carry around while trying to sneak. She had no wish for anyone to see her like this as she just knew there would be many questions. Questions that she didn't feel safe answering. A small smile thankfully graced her face as she felt Naruto gentle shift inside of her. She had to admit that feeling him move around inside of her like this was both amazing and comforting. Though that last part didn't surprise her nearly as much as she thought it would. She had always found the presence of Naruto comforting. Hinata always figured it had something to do with his personality mixed with how his chakra seemed to naturally leak out of him, like it was to great for his body to hold it all.

The aura this gave Naruto was something she always enjoyed feeling. And now she was feeling it come from inside of her. It made the idea of just keeping Naruto very tempting to the young girl.

"Hinata-chan!" The loud and unexpected shout startled her enough to let loose a loud "Eep" sound. Before she even registered who the voice belonged to, Hinata turned towards the source. Only to find a seemingly exasperated Ino, clad in nothing but a white towel moving strait towards her.

"There you are. What are you doing just spacing out there? Me and Tenten have been waiting for like five minutes for you to come out and join us." Explained the blond. Hinata however stood frozen in both shock and fear as she tried and failed to desperately cover her Naruto sized belly with the towels she had. Ino did not look amused. "Oh come on, Hinata! What do you have to be embarrassed about. I mean practically everyone in Konoha knows about Naruto. There's just no point in trying to hide him." That got Hinata's attention real quick. "W-what?!? Ev-vry one!?!"

Ino must have noticed the horror and shock on her face as the blond was quick to try and explain. "Now, now. You don't need to worry. Tenten and I haven't broken our promise, so no one else knows how he ended up there. I'm just saying that he's been in there for what now? Nine, going on ten or more years already? You'd have to be both blind and deaf to have not noticed your condition after the first few months." Hinata was wide eyed. Naruto had been in her womb for how long? That couldn't have been right as he had only gotten trapped inside her a few minutes ago. It made no sense to her. Ino however, either didn't notice the shock and confusion on Hinata's face or just didn't care as the blond grabbed her arm and began to gently push and pull the gravid girl back into the bathing section.

"Really Hinata, you've been acting odd for a while now. I know having to carry a boy your own age around inside of you is tiring and that it likely messes with your hormones and all but, you've been even weirder then normal recent." Ino continued to talk while slowly helping the pregnant girl waddle to where Tenten was waiting but, Hinata wasn't really listening anymore. The young Hyuga's focus was on everyone else in the hot spring baths. Hinata had expected a few things; shock, panic, maybe even someone fainting. She was not however expecting to see every girl/woman there give her and her Naruto-sized belly no more then a simple glance before going back to what they were doing.

'How is this possible?' She wondered as she continued to waddle walk while Ino helped to direct her. 'It's like this is perfectly normal to them? But I know that Naruto hasnt even been inside me for a full half-hour, much less years. Could it be that the suit and air tank had something to do with this?' Naruto gently wiggling inside of her brought forward another concern. 'Am I the only one able to remember that this isn't normal? Does Naruto remember that he was outside of my body no more the a half hour ago rather then, then... Oh, Kami-sama! Everyone thinks Naruto has been inside of me since I was four?!?' The realization was nearly to much for the poor girl, causing her to stumble slightly. Thankfully, Ino was quick to catch her and help steady her.

Hinata was thankful for the voice of Tenten shouting out a greeting and bringing her back to the here and now. "Hey girls." Greeted the naked burnet from her place at the washing station. It was required to clean the body before entering the hot bath water that everyone enjoyed. "I'm back and look who I finally managed to get out here." Replied the blond and gesturing towards the much rounder girl. "Hello Tenten-chan. Sorry for making you wait." Hinata apologized and tried to bow only for her to nearly fall forward due to Naruto's added weight. She would have to if not for both girls reacting as fast they did.

"Careful there Hinata. I thought you'd have gotten out of the whole bowing thing after so long." The blond gently chided. "Yeah. Don't get me wrong, I'm more then willing to catch you but, it might a bit awkward if everyone sees a pregnant girl on top of me." Joked the weapon mistress while giving a pointed look at their mutual nakedness. Hinata blushed a bright red as she fully understood what her friend was implying. She opened her mouth to stutter out a reply only for a low moan to escape her as Naruto started wiggling around as much as he could. He clearly was trying to get some attention, whether in hopes someone would help free him or simply because he felt left out was debatable.

"Aww, is Naruto-kun upset he's not getting any attention?" Cooed the burnet in an overly childish manner while she and Ino started rubbing Hinata's squirming belly. Hinata couldn't help but, blush brightly at all the attention she was getting. Instead she simply tried to not start moaning at how pleasant the belly rub was. "You know, sometimes I really wish you'd tell us how to do the jutsu you and Naruto used. I'd really like to have someone wiggling around in me like that." Commented the blond before continuing. "It's a shame there's no known way to get them out after but, that just means you have to choose someone you'd want to have so intimately close for the rest of your life."

"I already know one or two someone's I'd like to have wiggling around inside me for the rest of my life." Stated the burnet while throwing a subtle look between both Ino and Hinata. Neither girl saw the look however, as Ino was currently helping Hinata sit on one of the bath stools so that the gravid girl didn't hurt herself. Once Hinata was seated however, Ino went behind the girl to grab her bucket that had all her bathing things. "I know who I'd want too." Admitted the blond with a light blush on her cheeks. Tenten was the only one to notice the perverted grin on the blonds face as she turned her sights on Hinata. The poor Hyuga was completely oblivious to this however, as she was to focused on trying to reach the bucket with her own bathing supplies. Sad for her it was just out of reach.
123211222212111.title: Ino and Tenten surprise her!

choices: She promises to look for the jutsu but, not so it can be used.
She promises to look but, only Shadow Clones are allowed to use it.
1232112222121112.content:
Hinata was currently sitting on the cleaning stool letting the other two girls wash and scrub her to their hearts content. As embarrassing as it was to have another girl washing her and not having to lift a finger to help, Hinata was too preoccupied with trying to figure things out to really give more then an autopilot response to the girls actions. She still had the decency to blush as the two girls seemed to have more fun washing certain parts of her then they should.

'How is it that they think this is normal? How could they possibly think that Naruto-kun has been inside me since we were four? Just what did the air tank do?' As she pondered this a few ideas came to her. Most were too crazy to even believe but, if there was even the smallest chance it had happened then she needed to know. "Um, Ino?" She called get the blonds attention just as said blond dumped a bath bucket full of water over her head. "Yes Hinata? Something up?"

"Um, I-I was just wondering, why isn't Sakura here?" She asked while trying to ignore how passionately Tenten was rubbing her clean tummy. Ino however gave her an odd, almost bewildered look. "Who?" Hinata couldn't believe that Ino didn't seem to know who she was talking about. It gave the girl a rather uncomfortable feeling in her gut as an idea of what the air tank did started to become clear.

"Sakura Haruno. Pink hair, green eyes, same age as us and your 'rival' of love." Explained the Hyuga. "Hinata are you feeling ok? I've never heard the name Sakura Haruno before. And I'm sure I'd remember someone with pink hair of all things." Hinata just waved off the question. "S-sorry. Just forget about me asking please." The gravid girl all but pleaded. Ino and Tenten shared a quick look with each other. Seemingly have come to a silent agreement they both shrugged and moved on. "Come on Hinata. Let's get you into the bath." Coax the burnet and Hinata was unwilling to resist the invite, not after figuring out what the air tank did. If she was right then anyone who was turned into a suit was erased from the minds of those not aware of the air tank. Reality was then altered to fit the lack of that persons existence. So as long as Kurenai-sensei and Sakura Haruno were left as empty suits, no one would even know who they were. Hinata wondered if it was just the suits, or if it had more to do with the air the tank sucked out. She'd have to experiment at a later date and find out.

A few minutes later found Hinata neck deep in the warm and relaxing waters with Tenten and Ino on either side of her. The three girls sighed in a mix of pleasure and relief as the warm waters seemed to drain all the aches and stress from them. Hinata noted that she could somehow tell that even Naruto was giving a content sigh from his resting place. Her bulging belly was completely submerged under the water, allowing her to nearly forget that Naruto was trapped inside of her at all. A giggle soon caught her attention however.

Turning towards Tenten, Hinata unconsciously cocked her head slightly to the side and asked the older girl what was so funny. "Oh, it's nothing really. It's just... Well, you look so adorable when you and Naruto are happy. *sigh* I really wish you'd teach us that jutsu Hinata. Heck you could just make a Shadow Clone and have it use the jutsu on us. I'd bet it would just need to dispel to let us back out." Bemoaned the burnet. If she couldn't get to use the jutsu that Hinata did to get Naruto where he was, then she at least wanted to experience it from Naruto's viewpoint. Apparently Ino was of the same mind. "Hey, yeah! You could just use your Shadow Clones! I know that you don't like drawing off of Naruto like a battery and all but, with him you could make well over a hundred clones on yourself. The fact that they've always shown up without the pregnant belly always confused me before to be truthful."

Hinata was stunned. She could draw on Naruto-kun for chakra? She could perform Naruto-kun's signature jutsu? She made a mental note to give it a try at some point. For now, she had to nip this jutsu talk in the bud. She had no idea what excuse of a jutsu it was, nor did she have any idea of how to use it. "But, I don't even remember how to preform the jutsu! I was four, remember?" Chided the pregnant Hyūga. "Besides, didn't you yourselves just get through saying it a few minutes ago? Once inside there's no known way to get the person out."

The girls would not be denied however. "Oh come on Hinata. You and Naruto shouldn't get to be the only ones able to enjoy that sort of intimacy. At the very least promise us you'll look through your old diaries and such for info on the jutsu, please." Countered the blond before both girls started begging at the end. Something told Hinata they wouldn't stop until she at least promised to look. "Why do you want this so much anyway? If I use it on you two and you get trapped then I'm effectively ending your ability to live your own lives."

Ino was the one to answer. "Hinata, I know that this may seem odd to you but, ever since this happened to you and Naruto a lot of people have been trying to recreate it. I'd bet you my left nut that if given the chance to experience being inside you, or even just a clone of you like Naruto is a large majority of the village would be tripping over themselves to get in line." Despite not wanting to believe it Hinata saw nothing but, truth in Ino's words. If there was a lie in what she had said, then she could not find it.

'Most of the village wants to be where Naruto-kun is?' She thought in astonishment. A darker idea came to mind as she realized that with the number of Shadow Clones that Naruto could normally make, she could in theory turn the whole village population into pregnant Hinata clones. The idea was enticing but, Hinata quickly forced it down. She would not turn her village into some twisted perverse fantasy. 'Still at least learning if the jutsu even exists in a written form wouldn't be a bad thing. It would help in keeping it out of enemy hands at least.'

Thinking it over, Hinata turned to the still pleading faces of her two companions and...

What's Hinata's answer?
1232112222121112.title: About that jutsu...

choices: Hinata finds out how to use the jutsu. She keeps her promise to Ino and Tenten.
Hinata doesn't find anything about the jutsu. What now?
12321122221211122.content:
Upon seeing the two girls unleash the dreaded 'puppy dog eyes no jutsu' Hinata knew she was beaten. There was just no way she could say no to those big brown and pale blue eyes when they did that. Besides, it would give her an excuse to see if there was even any information about this supposed jutsu. Hinata highly doubted there was seeing as how Naruto's current position in life only came about through some oddity with the air tank. Still, if her growing theory proves to be true, then the air tank somehow affected reality so that what it did would appear normal to everyone who was unaware of the air tank. Then again she wasn't completely sure about that last part as she couldn't speak with Naruto. As such she had no idea if he even remembered that he hadn't been inside of her before today. There was also the fact that Naruto seemed oddly docile now.

Pushing her thoughts always for the moment, Hinata focused on her more immediate problem. "Fine. I promise to do some looking into the jutsu." She hoped that would be enough but, Ino seemed to see through her attempt. "And?" Questioned the blond. Hinata gave a deadpan expression and was just about to tell them that that was as much as they were getting, but they then stuck out their lower lips and pouted. Hinata couldn't take the sight of the two girls overly adorable assault and caved. "And, I promise to let some Shadow Clones use it on you, but only because I should be able to dispel them and free you two at any time. Happy?", grouched out the shy and gravid girl.

Hinata's answer came in the form of a little happy dance from the two that looked completely ridiculous seeing as how they were still sitting down. Hinata gave a mournful sigh and rubbed her belly wondering why she had to be so easy. She was drawn from her thoughts however, when the two girls suddenly hugged her, one on each side. That isn't what struck her as off however. No that went to the fact that both girls then kissed her! Not on the lips she was thankful to say (and slightly disappointed for some reason) as she still wanted her first real kiss to go to Naruto-kun. It was still a massive shock for her to be kissed like that by the two girls. She was thankful when the two released her and they simply started making small talk with Hinata using the chance to gather as much information about this different reality as she could.
/////////

-Hours Later-

Hinata had to admit that today had been one of the best days of her life. After getting over the awkwardness of Ino and Tenten kissing her on the cheeks, she had found herself having a good time with the two. When it had been time to leave she had admittedly started to panic as she hadn't thought up anyway of getting all the suits, cloths and air tank out without looking somewhat supisious. Thankfully, help came in the form of Naruto wriggling around inside of her and indirectly reminding her that she could draw on his chakra for Shadow Clones. It had been amazingly easy for her to pull on Naruto's chakra and use as her own.

Using the new Clones, Hinata was able to sneak the rest of the stuff out of the bathhouse without issue, while Ino and Tenten were to busy being focused on her. As embarrassing as it was, Hinata found herself slowly starting to enjoy the attention the two girls lavished her with. If she didn't know better she'd seriously think they were competing for her affection, but that just seemed silly.

After getting dressed and leaving the bathhouse, the three girls had spent the rest of the day together. They talked, shopped, talked about a few boys (none of which caught her interest in the slightest), and Ino had even managed to wrangle an answer out of them for what had to be the weirdest question Hinata had ever been asked. Ino had asked what girl would they consider entering a sexual relationship with if they were forced to chose one. Hinata still felt herself blush a bit at hearing both Tenten and Ino would chose her. It didn't mean anything. She was sure of that. Ino had asked lots of odd questions. Still the idea that the girls were trying to tell her something without saying it nagged at her.

Shaking her head to drive away the dirty thoughts now crawling into her head, Hinata slowly refocused herself towards reading one of the old diaries she had found hidden away in her room at the Hyuga compound. Ino and Tenten had had to part ways with her about half an hour ago, after which Hinata had immediately gone strait to her room to start looking for anything she could find on the supposed jutsu she and Naruto had used to end up like this. She really didn't believe that such a jutsu existed, blaming all of this on the air tank instead. Still, she couldn't over look the possibility of it being real now. The air tank had made changes to reality to match to make whatever they did with it seem real or normal in someway. She couldn't ignore the possibility that such a jutsu really existed now.

Hinata spent the rest of the day looking for and through any diary she could find hidden in her room, taking breaks only to rest her eyes, give Naruto a little attention or to eat dinner with her father and little sister. She was now slowly reading through the last hidden diary she could find and out of all of them, this one seemed the most promising. The handwriting in it was clearly that of a young child, so this one might have something about this so called jutsu.

Does Hinata find anything about the jutsu?
12321122221211122.title: The search for the jutsu...

choices: No. Their perfectly normal, if pregnant, Hinata Shadow Clones.
Yes. Each clone has taken some traits of their respective girl. (Reserved)
123211222212111221.content:
It was now later at night and Hinata was laying on her side in her comfy futon. For the first time in her life she had completely forgone wearing the thin sleeping yukata (thin kimono). She wasn't even wearing a nighty, choosing to wear nothing more then her panties underneath the thin blanket. Her reasoning was that it was a warm night and Naruto-kun apparently gave off quite a bit of heat while inside of her. She didn't want to sweat throughout the night after all. The teasing sensation of the soft blanket gliding across her naked body and expansive belly that currently housed Naruto was also quiet pleasant.

All of this was just attempts to try and distract herself from what she had learned only a couple of hours ago. The jutsu was real! As sloppy as her handwriting was around the age of four it was still legible enough for someone to read if they took a little time with it. She had done so and learned much from it. The diary spoke of her younger self and how she had made friends with Naruto-kun. As all children their age do they made a promise to always be friends and together forever. Further in, Hinata learned that her four year old self and four year old Naruto had decided to make a jutsu that would ensure they could always be together. The idea had apparently come from watching some other ninja do amazing ninjutsu. Of course neither of them knew much about ninjutsu and how the handseals effect it at that time, so they had simply made it up. Naruto's current position was the result of this.

Hinata gave a heavy sigh and curled up more around her belly, almost like she was trying to wrap herself around it. A gentle heat bloomed in her cheeks as she felt Naruto give a tiny wiggle. As much as she would like to deny it, Hinata actually felt a little envious of the idea at having Naruto inside of her since she was four. In the diary her younger self had only felt bad about what had happened between her and Naruto for a few days. After that the diary showed that she had not only come to accept her friends new position in life but, actually enjoyed it. Hinata had to admit that she could certainly get use to this. Almost as if agreeing with her thoughts Naruto wiggled and rubbed a hand against her uterus wall, making Hinata shiver at the pleasant feeling.

The thing keeping her up however, was how she had found the handseals used for the jutsu, which meant she'd have to keep her promise and let Shadow Clones use it on Ino and Tenten. For the life of her, she couldn't figure out why the idea excited her so much. Still the girls would get what they wanted, hopefully only for a time. She was actually half tempted to try using it on them herself but, not only would that be wrong, she also had no idea if it would even work. And what about her body? The fact that she could even fit Naruto-kun inside of herself without being ripped open was amazing enough, she wasn't sure her body could even hold another person.

Hinata shook her head again and curled even more tightly around Naruto. She needed to stop thinking on this and get some sleep. Closing her eyes Hinata gently pulled at Naruto's chakra. Normally having so much energy moving through a persons body would keep them up but, Hinata had quickly learned how to seamlessly channel Naruto's chakra through her system and back into him. This helped keep her from feeling like she was about to burst from so much chakra being inside her body and Naruto-kun's chakra helped her to relax.

One happy sigh and kiss to her belly later, Hinata was sound asleep. She had no idea just how much craziness she would invite upon herself the next day by revealing she now knew how to use the jutsu.
------------
Next Day

"You Found It!?!" Hinata winced at the high volumed scream of shock and excitement that came from her two friends, Ino and Tenten. Quickly getting over it she nearly nodded her head to show they had heard her right. It took nearly five minutes after that to get the two girls to calm down as they were in a local tea house and Hinata really didn't want to get kicked out of her favorite shop; they sold cinnamon rolls after all.

"So when do we get to dive in?", asked Ino in a over excited whisper as she suddenly seem to just appear molded against Hinata's side. "Yeah," agreed the bun wearing brunette as she soon did the same as Ino on Hinata's opposite side. "We want to get inside you as soon as possible." Hinata went wide eyed and blushed horribly at the possibly unintended innuendo used by the oldest of the three.

"Tenten!", gaped Ino in what at first seemed to be a scolding tone. "You could at least promise the poor girl you'll use protection.", continued the blond with a sly smile on her face. "Aww, but I've heard it's not as pleasant as going bare.", commented the brunet a teasing grin on her own face. Hinata simply buried her burning red face in her hands as she tried to not faint from the images the girls were trying to fill her head with. She calmed slightly at feeling Naruto wiggle and gently brush her uterus walls with his hands.

Hinata took a shaky breath silently thanking her Naruto for his wonderful support and constant presence within her. She was starting to grow so accustom to his new position in her life that she honestly wasn't sure she'd let him out, even if she managed to actually find a way to do so.

"Ino your parents are out aren't they?" Hearing her name Ino was quick to respond. "Yeah, Dad's got work at T&I till late tonight and Mom's busy with deliveries for the shop. So yeah it's just me for today. Why?" Hinata was glad to hear this as she wasn't to sure about using this jutsu at her clan compound. "We'll be going back to your place for this as it's something I'd prefer remained private. My clan compound isn't a good place for us to do that what with our Byakugan eyes. As for Tenten, her place is too small for three pregnant versions of me to stand in, much less four people and one pregnant me once I use the Shadow Clone jutsu. It's also far to busy seeing as how it's the most well known blacksmith shop in Konoha. That leaves us with only your place." Explained Hinata. She really didn't want people to see that she now knew how to do the jutsu, not after their pervious conversation in the baths yesterday.

"Then what are we waiting for!?! Let's go!", the over excited and giddy blond near yelled, only remembering at the last second that Hinata didn't want the attention just yet. This didn't stop the mind walker from jumping up and practically sweeping the surprised Hinata out of her seat before running out of the open tea shop and back towards her place. Tenten watched in shock for a moment as her brain tried to process that Ino had just run off with her stolen Hyuga being carried bridal style in her deceptively thin arms. "Hey, Wait Up!", shouted the burnet as she jumped up, tossed some money on the table and took off after Ino. She would not let the blond steal their (and seemingly the whole villages) common love interest and wet dream girl all for herself.
-------------

Sitting on Ino's bed, Hinata looked back and forth between the grinning and excited girls before her. "Are you both sure you want to try this? I can't be 100% sure that my Shadow Clones will be able to release you later." Hinata already knew that the two weren't going to back out of this no matter what she said, but she still need to try.

"Yeah we're sure.", admitted the blond while Tenten happily nodded. "Now hurry up with those clones and put us in that baby maker of yours.", the blond all but ordered.

Hinata could only sigh in defeat before making the needed handseal and pulling on both her and Naruto's chakra. Naruto's provided the needed energy for the jutsu, while Hinata's provided the identity of who the clone would be. In a poof of ninja smoke two copies of herself, without the Naruto-sized belly, appeared on either side of her. The Hinata clones blinked for a moment before looking down at their flat bellies. Surprisingly they then turned to look between them at the original Hinata's belly, envy clear on their faces.

First, I'd like Hanabi-chan to visit me so I can give her a check up. I need to know how much, if any, of her genome has changed. The sooner the better. Last and quite possibly the most important, I need you two to distract Hinata. She must not yet know what we are doing or that the air-tank is not where she left it."

Hino took a few moments to consider everything her village leader asked of her and Tenata. The first two on the list made sense to her. Hinade-sama had just said why she needed to see Hanabi and Hino could only assume that the woman planned to use the clone to 'recruit' the help she spoke of needing to advance the plan further. Her last command to distract Hinata also made sense as none of the clones wanted their original creator to grow wise to the plan until they were sure that she'd fully approve of it. They could easily use clothes shopping as a means of distracting Hinata and then see about making it into an impromptu date. It was only the third item on the list that bothered her.

"Hinade-sama, why would you require the air-tank? We aren't all that sure about what it can do and I doubt we could get you enough time to experiment to a satisfactory degree with it on such short notice. So why?"

Uchiha district

Mikoto Uchiha gave a tired sigh as she went about her duties. Over the years Mikoto had gone through a number of tragedies, each one beating down the once happy woman till it left her feeling nearly empty and hollow inside. Now the content and strong willed woman that everyone saw her as had become nothing but a front, a facade to keep those around her from worrying. All in all, Mikoto Uchiha felt like she was a broken woman desperately clinging to the last few bits of the once happy life she still had just to keep herself going.

'How did this happen,' she wondered to herself for what was likely the millionth time since it all went wrong. Her mind easily went back to that day, the last time she had seen the one friend that had been at the center of that terrible event. The one person who Mikoto knew would never have allowed her to become so broken inside. The one who had been there for her since they were children and had always left Mikoto feeling safe and cared for when in her presence.

'Kushina.' A sad frown pulled at her lips as Mikoto felt the tell-tell sting in her eyes that signaled the beginning of tears should she continue with this line of thought. Mikoto took a moment to close her eyes and take deep breaths while trying to push back the pain and sadness she felt at thinking of her redhaired friend by focusing on the happier and more pleasant thoughts and feelings that Kushina use to give her.

Thinking about Kushina always made Mikoto's heart seize up, harder than it ever did for her husband. But then, the only thing she could ever feel for Fugaku was icy coldness running through her veins. She dearly missed the time when thinking of Kushina would leave her feeling a mix of happy, excited and nervous all at once. No one had ever given her those happy butterfly-tingles in the pit of her stomach quite like how Kushina would in their earlier years.

Sadly negative thoughts had become a norm for the woman and the moment she stopped focusing on the happy thoughts and began moving again those dark thoughts rushed back in.

'First the Kyūbi attack puts Kushina in a coma and kills her husband, then I can't even give her son a place to call home because of the internal political strife it could cause the village; something I still don't believe even to this day. Next, that idiot ex-husband of mine gets it in his head to start a coup d'état and drags a majority of the clan into it, which later forces Itachi-kun to kill them, stab me and mentally torture his sibling before fleeing the village as a missing nin. How did the future go from looking so happy and hopeful to so empty in just a few short years?'

Shaking her head to try and clear her thoughts a bit, Mikoto decided to take a walk around the village. Her youngest wasn't due back from their mission for a couple more days and she really needed something to keep the negative thoughts from consuming her. She had to keep the small hope that Kushina would eventually awaken from her coma and set things right burning in her heart.

'Maybe I'll get lucky and even see Hinata-chan. Getting to speck to her and say hello to Naruto-kun always helps to brighten my day a little. I'm thankful that Kushina's boy was able to find a sanctuary in the form of Hinata-chan's womb,' thought Mikoto as she stepped outside and locked the door.

"Mikoto Uchiha."

Mikoto did not let out a girlish squeak of surprise at having a commanding feminine voice go off right behind her, no matter what anyone else might say. Broken and beaten she might be, but she still had some shred of pride left in her. That didn't however, stop her from openly gapping at the sight of the female that had called for her.

She looked like she was around the same age as Mikoto's youngest though a bit smaller height-wise. The young girl was wearing the standard ANBU assembly of a white animal mask, in this case a swan, a black no-sleeved skintight top and formfitting black pants. Or at least Mikoto assumed the small ANBU was wearing such things, as most of the girl was covered by the black cloak she had on; A cloak that did absolutely nothing to hide what had to be the most massive pregnant belly she'd ever seen. Seriously, the black of the cloak only served to make the gargantuan middle even more eye-catchingly noticeable.

'Could those rumors I heard of more then one pregnant Hinata-chan now living in the village actually be true,' she wondered as she took note of how similar this ANBU seemed when compared to the heartthrob of Konoha. 'But if that somehow is Hinata-chan, how did she get such a big belly? While Naruto-kun made her quite big, that is clearly not Naruto Uzumaki trapped in that tight looking womb of hers.' This thought was only further proven for her when the occupant of that belly shifted slightly, the uterus pressing so tightly against them that their tiny movements easily allowed Mikoto to see the large muscle bound outline of the person in their entirety.

'Hinata-chan's balance and ability to move so easily with Naruto-kun weighing her down has always been amazing, but this... How does this girl make standing with a belly that is nearly the size of herself look so easy?'

"Uchiha-san, I have orders for you from Hokage-sama. You are to go to the hospital and meet her in the restricted wing immediately. Speak this code phrase to the receptionist to be allowed clearance," she said while handing the still somewhat stunned woman a small piece of parchment. Then, to Mikoto's further amazement, the massively pregnant ANBU girl disappeared without a trace.

'Well, guess I know what I'm doing for the rest of the day.'

Mikoto, who's mind was still trying to process the fact that a pregnant Hinata look-a-like was sitting before her, couldn't stop herself from staring and stumbling over her words. "W-Wha...who...How?"

The receptionist giggled goodheartedly at her for a moment before seemingly deciding to spare the poor woman from further embarrassment. "I take it you want to know how I look so much like Hinata and how I even have the same kind of pregnant belly, right? I have to admit your the first one to actual ask. Most simply stared for a moment before going about their business." She paused for a moment seemingly to consider what to say.

"Well, I'll just say that I was once a Shadow Clone, but due to a neat little side effect of the jutsu that started Hinata's pregnancy, we clones have found a way to become real flesh and blood like any other person. If you want the full details then your going to need to speak with Hokage-sama, but that can come later. For now is there anything I can help you with sweetheart?"

Her mind was spinning, but like the receptionist said, if she wanted answers she'd need to speak with Tsunade-sama which worked out perfectly as the woman had been the one to call her here in the first place. Wanting answers to the questions spiraling in her head sooner rather then later, Mikoto spoke the code phrase that she had been given earlier by the ANBU. The receptionist gave a small smile before with a seemingly casual wave of her hand another large bellied ANBU appeared.

Mikoto looked this ANBU over, mentally comparing it to the one she had previously meet. She was honestly surprised at how little there was differentiating this ANBU from the last one as the only differences she could see were the mask, this one depicting some furry faced creature Mikoto have never seen before compared to the swan mask the last one had, and the size of this ANBU's pregnant belly, which while still bigger then Hinata was significantly smaller then Swan had been.

"Otter, please escort Uchiha-san to Hokage-sama."
=====

'It's amazing just how different it feels to walk through the hospital halls now,' thought Mikoto as she silently followed her pregnant ANBU guide through the halls. Before moving through the hospital had always felt slightly unnerving. Maybe not enough to creep anyone out but it could easily get to that level if the right circumstances came about. Now however, the place felt lively and friendly, like there was a contagious energy in the air that helped a person feel more relaxed and at ease.

'Maybe I'm thinking to deeply on this,' pondered the mother of two. She had passed countless pairs of pregnant Hinata-look-a-likes in nursing gowns along the way to her destination. Her sharp eyes caught sight of the first male she'd seen in the halls as he turned the corner. A doctor she guessed from the white coat and lack of nurse smock. A moment later a faint flash seemed to go off before another pregnant Hinata, this one wearing a white doctors coat, turned the same corner, passing Mikoto without even a glance as she seemed to engrossed in papers on the clipboard in her hand.

Mikoto watched the doctor Hinata walk off before turning back to face forwards. 'Defeinetly overthinking it,' she thought, seemingly not bothered at all by the fact that she may have just witnessed a doctor of Konoha being relocated to the warm and welcoming insides of a Hinata clones tight little womb.

While she had been a little iffy about it at first, Mikoto had seen nothing but positives in the change of the hospital workforce, not that she was really all that surprised by this. No sane person could possibly remain upset or uncooperative when being tended to by a building full of pregnant beauties. Idly she wondered what a clone might look like if she was curled up inside of it. The image her mind conjured up left the young mother blushing brightly. Thankfully, before she could get too immersed in her fantasy, she was pulled from her thoughts by the voice of the ANBU she had been following.

"We have arrived."

Mikoto barely had time to register the words before the ANBU disappeared, causing Mikoto to huff in annoyed disapproval at Otters actions. 'She may look a lot like Hinata-chan but she's clearly lacking her manners.' Pushing the thought to the side she politely knocked and awaited her Hokages permission to enter.

Mikoto is greeted by...
1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.title: Hospital of Hinata

1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.content:
The first things Mikoto saw upon stepping into the room was Tsunade and Shizune quietly speaking to each other. It wasn't that the two women were trying to keep their conversation to themselves, as Mikoto could easily pick up on what they were saying, so much as them simply being a little to engrossed in whatever it was they were talking about. Plus Mikoto couldn't make heads or tails of half the medical jargon they were using, so even if they were hatching some kind of plot, sinister or otherwise, Mikoto knew it would have just flown right over her head.

Instead she decided to turn her attention towards whatever it was both medics seemed so fascinated by. The sight of beautiful crimson hair nearly made her heart stop in shock as she saw the peacefully sleeping face of her beloved friend Kushina Uzumaki, if Kushina had been the same age as her second born child. To say Mikoto was shocked would be like saying the sky was blue on sunny days, or that water was wet. It was a simple statement of fact.

She took a step towards the crimson-haired-woman-turned-girl, her eyes wide with shock and disbelief as her body shook from the sudden maelstrom of emotions swirling within her heart. It was like something out of a dream, Kushina, in the flesh, looking just as beautiful as the day Mikoto first saw her. It was all she could do to keep herself from approaching the sleeping redhead, to caress her cheek, run her fingers through her red hair, to confirm that it was real.

But at the same time, she wouldn't dare do that. It was just as she thought: something out of a dream. And Mikoto had many dreams like this. Dreams where Kushina would be revitalized. Dreams where Kushina would finally awaken. Dreams where Kushina would embrace Mikoto and whisper those words she could never hear but always understood. And they would always end the same way: with Mikoto awake in her bed. And she knew that's exactly what would happen if she approached the sleeping girl. Kushina would disappear, everything would fade away, and she would return to her bed. Return to her home. Return to her same lonely, empty existence.

She didn't want that. If this was a dream, then Mikoto would rather not wake up.

The minutes ticked by as she stood there, just watching Kushina slumber from a safe distance, too enraptured to look away, but to fearful to disturb the serene image to come closer. That was until the redhead murmured something in her sleep and stirred slightly, shifting her body under the covers and rolling her head from side to side. That was...the first time Mikoto ever heard Kushina say something in years, and it was the first time she saw her so much as moved a muscle in all that time as well. It was...too much. The urge to feel her warmth again, to be near her once more, was overpowering the Uchiha.

Kushina-san...please....come back to me!
1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.title: Tsunade and Shizune

1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.content:
Mikoto was at Kushina's bedside in a blink of the eye, a feat that actually managed to surprise Tsunade and Shizune enough that they stopped conversing and gave Mikoto their full attention. The Uchiha woman couldn't be bothered to care, however, as her focus was solely on the bedridden redhead.

Reaching out, Mikoto hesitated for only a moment before grasping one of Kushina's hands between her own. Lifting the hand to her mouth Mikoto laid a gentle kiss to it, before resting her forehead against the smaller hand in her grasp and closed her eyes. To anyone else it would almost look like Mikoto was praying. Opening her eyes again Mikoto's gaze immediately locked on to the sleeping face of her beloved redhead, watching all the slight movements and shifts of Kushina's face.

So focused was she on memorizing the small movements of her beautiful Uzumakis face that Mikoto hadn't even realized that she was now sitting in a chair that Shizune had thoughtfully moved for her. Thankfully, she did have enough awareness to look away from Kushina, for no more then a second, when she felt a hand gently rest itself on her shoulder. She didn't even acknowledge her Hokage, at least until she spoke up in a gentle and understanding tone.

"I'm sure you have many questions."

An understatement if there ever was one. Mikoto had hundreds of questions running through her head, each one demanding answers. Taking a few moments she tried to sort her thoughts a bit and ask only the most important ones she had. "Has she woken up yet?"

Tsunade smiled, inwardly pleased at Mikoto's concern for Kushina's wellbeing came before her questioning of Kushina's physical changes; not that Mikoto could see this with her eyes firmly locked on Kushina once more.

"Between the time we sent for you and you arriving, Kushina has awakened a few times, although I can't be sure she was truly conscious during her waking periods as she would fall back into slumber rather quickly. Still, she did seem more aware and responsive each time she woke."

Mikoto nodded silently taking this in as she quietly contemplated which question to ask next. She really wanted to ask about the physical changes as Kushina now looked so much like she had on the day they first met, and subsequently the day Kushina had accidentally stolen her first kiss. Mikoto flushed lightly at the memory of being steamrolled into, the two girls tumbling over each other and ending with Kushina resting on top of her, the redheads body pressed her own. Mikoto gazed longingly at Kushina's lips as she could still remember how soft they felt against her own that day as she laid there under the equally stunned Uzumaki, her charcoal orbs gazing straight ahead at the most beautiful violet eyes she had ever seen.

Mikoto forcefully pulled herself back to the present, not wishing to linger to long on the memory of that day, how that had been the start of her fascination with the redhead, or how her feelings had only grown as time went on and they became closer.

"When she fully awakens," began the medic, nearly scaring Mikoto right out of her skin as she had practically forgotten about Shizune standing further back in the room. "Kushina will likely be very confused, understandable since she's been in a coma for 14, nearing 15, years now. If I had to guess, once she remembers the Kyūbi attack she'll likely start growing panicked and fretting over her family. We need to make sure she doesn't hurt herself as despite her appearance looking young and healthy, Kushina hasn't moved under her own power since falling into coma. Forcing herself to move quickly or to much could lead to damaging her body."

Tsunade was quick to pick up from there. "As such, while I do believe we should tell Kushina about Minato's fate we will need to try and be gentle about it. As for Naruto; I believe it's best we only tell her that he is safe and being well cared for and loved by a young woman who took him in." The latter part earned a small snort from the vaguely amused Uchiha and a smile from the two present medics.

"Hopefully this, and a promise to set up a meeting with her son, will keep her calm and pacified till she's fully recovered."

"Tsunade-sama, you are aware of what is likely to happen if Kushina meets Hinata without being informed before hand about her sons location, aren't you," questioned the Uchiha as she looked at her Kage with a raised brow, inwardly struggling to hold back the laughter at what Kushina was likely to try and do with the village heartthrob before learning that Naruto now lived inside the girl's' womb.

Tsunade smiled mischievously, a twinkle in her eyes saying she too knew full well what the Uzumaki was likely to try doing once she met Hinata and had her alone for a time. The three grown women all chuckled and wished they'd be able to see Kushina's face once she learned of Naruto's location.

Once the giggles were out of her system Mikoto decided to ask probably the biggest and most obvious question. "Tsunade-sama what did happen to Kushina? I mean she's now so..."

"Young. Vibrant. Full of life," supplied the dark haired assistant. Mikoto nodded as Kushina was now all of those things once again.

"Well, I can't tell you much. Just know that her appearance and remarkable physical recovery is do to something Hinata indirectly discovered and was brought to my attention via her younger twin sister, Hanabi. Without them Kushina would still be trapped in a coma and wasting away."

Mikoto accepted this explanation with a nod, feeling infinitely grateful to the young Hyuga siblings who may have unknowingly saved her friend.

"And why did you specifically ask for me," asked the raven haired mother, her hands having never released Kushina's this whole time.

Tsunade smiled. "Mikoto, I thought that would be rather obvious. Once she awakens there's really no point keeping her here. We both know she'd try to escape first chance she got as she's never felt comfortable inside a hospital. But with no family and her son snuggly tucked away inside of Hinata, we need someone we can trust to watch and care for her as she fully recovers.

"We figured one of Kushina's two closest friends would be the best choice. So it was between you and Hinata's mother, Hikari Hyuga. Seeing as how Hikari is still out of the village on a diplomacy mission, and that having Kushina in the Hyuga compound means she'd likely meet Hinata a bit too early for our liking, having you take care of her just seems to work out best for everyone involved."

While Hinade, in the guise of Tsunade, outwardly appeared calm, collect and understanding, inwardly she was still suffering from a mix of shock and giddiness at learning at learning from Tsunade's memories that her original self's mother was still alive in this reality. In the original reality, her mother had died after seemingly wasting away. Here, that had not only been stopped, but it was learned that it had been planned out by a traitorous clan elder. Said elder was promptly dealt with and the others had extensive investigations on everything they've done, where they've been and so forth. The Hyuga clan elders had lost a lot of clout, something that made keeping them in line much easier on Hinata's parents.

At that moment a groan sounded throughout the room, the sound originating from the only bedridden occupant of the room. All three women instantly focused on the lightly shifting form of Kushina...
1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.title: Kushina's New Caretaker

choices: Return to Hinata and her date (reserved)
1232112222121112212223212211112111211222.content:
Mikoto watched with baited breath as Kushina's beautiful violet eyes finally opened. Mikoto's heart thundered in her chest as she watched her friend awaken and couldn't help but think of how adorable she was as she blinked a few times as her eyes slowly adjusted to the light in the room. Those expressive violet orbs quickly locked on to her own and Mikoto watched as the blurred and glazed look of sleep quickly gave way; first to confusion only to swiftly change to recognition as her eyes seemingly sparkled with joy.

"M-Mikoto," the redhead gasped. Her voice dry and scratchy from lack of use and yet to Mikoto it was still the most beautiful sound she had heard in years. She struggled to hold back the tears that she felt building in her eyes, though some did manage to escape her, the last thing she wanted Kushina to see upon awakening was her friend breaking down into unintelligent sobbing mess. No, Mikoto had to much self-pride to let that be the first thing her Kushina saw of her in years.

"H-hey Kushi-chan," greeted the Uchiha, her voice wavering from the emotional sobs she was struggling to hold back as she used the old nickname she and Hikari would use for the redhead. It wasn't a simple shortening of their friends name, but something that came about one day when returning from a mission. She, Kushina and Hikari arrived in a village that was holding a summer festival and while it hadn't been intended, the three were eventually pulled into the festivities by the very friendly, if rather drunk, villagers. During the festival she and Hikari had secretly bought a suspiciously expensive Kushi, or comb, and presented it to Kushina. It wasn't until after the drunk and jubilant villagers started hooting and cheering for the three that they learned of a rather important custom in this village.

The festival was made in honor of Susanō and as Kushinadahime, the woman who came to marry Susanō, was turned into a comb before he went to battle the Eight-headed and Tailed Snake, this village used the more expensive combs as engagement rings. Since Kushina had accepted and put on the comb that both of her friends had bought and presented to her, she had by custom just agreed to marry Mikoto and Hikari.

Sufficed to say a marriage between the girls never happened, but Mikoto and Hikari started calling Kushina, Kushi-chan as a friendly teasing reminder of how the redhead had accepted her best friends unknowing marriage proposal.

Kushina smiled, clearly amused at hearing her nickname again after what seemed to feel like forever. "Hey. Miss me?"

Nope, they wouldn't be able to get into this place, that much she was sure of. It was the kind of place a woman would go in with her best dress on to celebrate her wedding anniversary with her husband.
