“Gah!” Naruto managed to break away from Hinata’s lips. “Holy crap!”

All that stolen height and mass had to go somewhere, and like when breathing in from the air tank, Hinata had added it to her mountainous form. This put her at a massive ten feet, two inches, large enough to hold Naruto by the waist with one hand. The stolen air had also increased her breast and hip size. Naruto could only gawk at the woman who was literally twice the size as him.

“There we go,” Hinata bellowed with her voice that had gotten unbelievably deep. “Just the right size I wanted you, Naruto.”

She patted him on the head with her free hand. It was like getting hit by a pillow, her flesh was so soft like fresh dough. Even with the hand grabbing him, Naruto felt like he was suspended in mid-air.

“W-What did you do?” asked Naruto, squirming around in Hinata’s grasp.

“I sucked your air out of you, leaving you with only Lady Tsuande’s air,” Hinata explained with a giggle.

“What does that mean?”

“It means you’re stuck as the Hokage until I say so. Aren’t I nice, Naruto? I’ve made your dream come true. You’re the Hokage now.”

Naruto panicked and felt around his face, looking for a way to peel off the Tsunade suit he had been wearing. “I-It won’t come off!”

“No. Even if it did the air would escape and you’d deflate into nothingness without even a skin remaining. You’re stuck as Lady Tsunade until I decide to return your air.”

“B-But how!?”

“Well, if I had to guess it’s because of my overuse of the air tank,” Hinata bent over and picked up the device. What was once a pretty bulky object was now only the size of her head! “I have a feeling that I’ve naturally gained some of its power due to being so large. You could say, I’m a living air tank.”

“Well, please turn me back to normal,” Naruto begged.

“No way! I need your help to get more air, Naruto.”

“But you can get it yourself without the air tank by grabbing them like King Kong like you did to me!”
“Yeah, if I was outside. But in case you haven’t noticed, I’m sort of stuck here.”

Only now did Naruto realize how much of the Hokage’s office Hinata did take up. There was absolutely no way she was going to fit through the six foot tall door. She was stuck in here unless she gave up some of her air or grew out of the ceiling. Hinata gently put Naruto down on the floor as she shuffled around the tight room.

“Well, Naruto?” Hinata asked coyly, fidgeting with her fingers like she normally did when nervous. “If you get me out of this mess, I’ll get you back to normal.”

Her fate was somewhat in his hands at this point. Naruto decided to…
123322121111.title: Twice His Size

1233221211111.content:
Something told Naruto that Hinata wouldn’t willingly hand over her hard earned air, meaning that there was only one way out of this mess. Naruto wasn’t that interested in being a blimp anymore either, he just wanted to get back to normal.

“Alright,” said Naruto. “Looks like we both have something the other wants. You want to get out of here and I want to get back to normal. So, if I bring you a filled tank, will you give me back my body?”

“I suppose,” grinned Hinata.

That would have to be good enough. Naruto picked up the air tank and said his good byes to Hinata before stepping outside into the village.

~

Bumbling along the streets of the city, Naruto pondered what he should do while tossing the air tank around in his hands. He was in a tricky situation, trapped in Tsuande’s body. This had all been good fun until she had turned the tables on him, now he just wanted to at least be a boy again. With all Tsunade’s major weight on her chest, he was growing tired as posing as her and his back was killing him.

“How am I going to fill this tank,” he muttered out loud. Truthfully, his encounter with Shizune had been pure luck and he practically had to force her to use the air tank.

This time Naruto was sure Hinata wouldn’t be as picky with where the air came from, but he still had to trick at least four people into breathing in the device. Even if he could pose as the Hokage, he wasn’t quite sure how he could manage that.

“Lady Hokage!” a voice called out, knocking Naruto from his thoughts.

Naruto jumped as a few of the village ninjas landed from the rooftops right in front of him. Despite his frantic response, the two male shinobi kneeled in the streets and gave him an official report.

“My lady, we’re here to report several prisoners that have captured while trying to illegally cross our borders. They’re unarmed but we figured you’d like to deal with them.”

“P-Prisoners?” the wheels suddenly began to turn in Naruto’s head. “How many?”

“Four in total, my lady. All women hailing from the east. They don’t seem very dangerous, but no one knows what to do with them.”

“I do,” smiled Naruto. “Take me to them and then give us some privacy…”

~

Naruto could practically gloat at his cleverness as he headed into the Hokage’s office with a full air tank. He had managed to convince the jonin on guard that Lady Tsunade had pardoned the prisoners, when in reality he had taken the captured women’s air and threw what remained of their skins in the garbage.

Hinata had a look of surprise when Naruto returned. She appeared to be reading some of Tsunade’s books while Naruto was away, though they barely fit in her fingers let alone her hand.

“My, that was quick. And you have a full tank?”

“Of course, you doubt me?”

“Not at all. Hand it over and I’ll return your air.”

Naruto was tempted to end this and have Hinata keep her promise, but he was still a little sore at the prospect of being threatened into working for her. Doing the math in his head, Naruto concluded that Hinata had absorbed the air of four people: Sakura, Tenten, Shizune, and himself.

He recalled that when he had both Tsunade and his own air, and Hinata had only Sakura’s and hers, Naruto had been the bigger woman. This was because, unlike Sakura, Tsunade was an adult and granted a larger essence to absorb. That meant that the bigger the person was who had been deflated, the bigger the inhaler would grow. While Hinata had inside her three teen’s essences and one adult, Naruto had a tank of four full-grown women’s air.

He could hand over the tank and submit further to Hinata’s whims or he could inhale the tank and try to wrestle Hinata into seeing things his way. Naruto decided to…
1233221211111.title: A Full Tank

12332212111112.content:
Before Hinata could get any closer to him, Naruto bit down on the valve and flipped the switch. Hinata had an expression of horror and betrayal on her face as the air rushed into Naruto’s stomach.

“N-Naruto, what have you done!?”

She rushed over to stop him, but it was too late. The damage had been done and Naruto was swelling up faster than a water balloon. It wasn’t just his belly that expanded, everything from his toes to his fingers grew and his line of sight shot straight up.

Hinata made an attempt to pry the air tank from his lips, but Naruto shoved her out of the way with his free hand. Despite being so large, she was incredibly lightweight and went sailing into the wall behind her with a crash.

“Stop, now!” she cried out, but Naruto was just getting started.

His breasts and thighs pushed their way out of their once tight containers, the clothes he had swiped from the thrift store were doing nothing to maintain the expanding curves of his inflated body. With a loud rip, they were nothing more than tattered remains barely covering his dignity. Naruto flexed his sausage-like arms as he braced himself to finish off the tank.

“Naruto, give me that air right now or I’ll…” Hinata voice trailed off. That was because she had once been looking down at Naruto, now he passed her height and was not stopping.

Everything felt so stretched, like Naruto’s skin was being squeezed at every molecule. Then there was the fullness of the air and the satisfaction that he would no longer be bullied by Hinata anymore. He clocked in at about a foot over her own height, or 11 feet 3 inches, before the air tank ran out. It fell to the floor with a clank as he patted his belly like he had just eaten a full meal.

“Mm,” Naruto said in Tsunade’s voice, though it sounded deeper and hollower. “I can see why you wanted more, Hinata. This feels wonderful.”

“No!” Hinata shouted, and in a surprise move dove at Naruto. “It’s mine!”

She was going straight for his lips to suck out his air. Luckily, Naruto managed to move quickly enough to evade a fatal hat, but he found that his gigantic new form was painfully slow. He took the hit right in his medicine-ball-sized breasts and the pair toppled over onto each other.

“I got that air on my own and I’m tired of being bullied!” barked Naruto as he threw Hinata onto the floor in an attempt to pin her. “You weren’t going to give my body back, so I had to do it!”

“I would have,” replied Hinata as she squirmed around, avoiding Naruto’s lips. “But you were about to do the same to me before I got bigger than you!”

She was telling the truth. Naruto had considered making her his plaything when she was powerless against him, but it wasn’t so funny when the tables were turned.

Hinata had the advantage of better speed and reflexes, being trained in the Gentle Fist and the smaller of the two inflated giants. She was able to twist Naruto’s pin against him and throw him to the floor. She then kneeled on top of his arms, preventing him from escaping.

“Crap, no!” cried Naruto, sure this was the end for him as Hinata dove in for the kiss.

He closed his eyes and felt their lips touch each other. He expected to feel the same vacuum force he had when she had done this to him before, but such deflation never came.

When he opened his eyes, he saw Hinata still kissing him. Only this wasn’t a kiss to drain him but a real kiss, one of affection. Naruto found himself blushing as Hinata broke away from him.

“I only wanted what was equal,” she explained, face just as red as Naruto’s. “This thing is dangerous and we need to trust each other or we’re both going to end up as suits. I could steal your air right now, but I’m trying to make a point, Naruto!”

She then got off of him and stood up, offering him a hand to his feet.

“At the very least, we need to work together or we’re both going to be stuck in this room until one of us dominates the other. Truce?”

Naruto stared at her hand and back at Hinata’s lips. He ignored the offer and jumped to his feet, surprising Hinata with a kiss of his own. Hinata yelped, thinking that she had been duped but like her, Naruto did not suck in her air.

The two bloated ninjas embraced themselves for a few seconds, enjoying the first true bit of passion between them. Naruto was the one to break the kiss.

“Mmm,” he moaned. “You’re right. It’s much cooler to do this together, anyway. It wouldn’t be as fun without you talking sense into me.”

“Speaking of sense,” she replied with a giggle. “Where did you get all that air so quickly?”

“I stole it from some prisoners in the village. Threw out their remains too.”

“That’s horrible!”

“There were criminals. Besides, they’re not entirely gone,” Naruto patted his overgrown belly. He was still getting used to being a huge parade balloon.

“Well,” Hinata continued to bring the conversation back to the matter at hand. “You’re certainly bigger than me, but it’s nowhere near enough to get out of here.”

“Yeah,” Naruto measured his height to the ceiling. He was missing it by a good few inches. “Where did the tank go? We can just deflate to get out then re-inflate when outside.”

The pair looked around before noticing the open door into the hallway behind them. The air tank had rolled out in through the portal just out of reach for them. Hinata struggled to squeeze her arm through the six foot tall door, but there was no way she could fit as bloated as she was.

“Darn,” she muttered. “We’re going to have to trust each other here and give one person all the air. Then trade off when the other person is outside.”

“Uh, huh,” Naruto still wasn’t as comfortable with the idea as she was, but he realized it was the only way out of this mess.

“The question is, who stays big?”
12332212111112.title: A Bloated Truce

123322121111121.content:
“You stay big, Hinata,” Naruto concluded. “I was the one who made you feel uncomfortable. This is my chance to prove my trust in you.”

Hinata smiled warmly, but Naruto could still tell she was relieved. It was understandably a huge risk to put complete trust in him after he had so callously abused her feelings for him. The least he could do was prove that he’d trust Hinata with his air.

“Only if you’re sure, Naruto. I know you enjoyed being inflated.”

“Eh, if this works out we’ll have all the air we could ever want. We don’t even need the air tank anymore except for storage.”

“I look forward to being large with you,” she said, reaching up for Naruto cheek.

Naruto returned her grin with one of his own and leaned in close to the kiss that would return him to a size normal. They embraced and pressed their lips against each other. Then the deflation began.

Truthfully, Naruto was excited to see how big Hinata would get containing the air of eight people. He was practically blowing his air into her when their mouths finally connected. Hinata’s eyes widened in surprise at the sudden pressure being forced down her throat, but quickly accepted the gift Naruto was granting her. Her cheeks puffed up as Naruto’s superior height slowly diminished.

The torn rags that were the only things keeping Naruto’s womanly body unexposed were now sliding off his shrinking curves as Hinata’s dress strained to contain the ninja’s swelling bosom. Her choice in dress had been wildly successful as no matter what shape she took, the material molded itself around her like magic. Soon, it was Naruto who was looking up at Hinata. She also took notice of this and grabbed him by the waist, lifting him into the air effortlessly.

Naruto felt like a babe being consoled by his mother as Hinata drained him of all the excess air he had acquired. She eventually was able to cradle him in her arms as her head bumped against the ceiling. It was like resting against the softest pillows in the world as Naruto nuzzled himself between her now car-tire sized breasts. When the process finally ended, he was almost as big as they were!

“There, aren’t you adorable at that size?” giggled Hinata. Her head was overwhelming huge to him now, everything was.

It was almost uncomprehend-able how big the human being was before him. With all the air, Hinata was now standing at about 14 feet tall and was in danger of exploding out of the room. Her body had swollen out in all directions, though there was a heavy focus on her bust and hips which were the widest parts of her form.

In comparison, Naruto had still retained a little extra air as a gift from Hinata. He could now fit through the door at six feet four inches, though he was a good foot taller than the real Tsunade. His form was still a little bloated in just the right areas as well.

“Couldn’t resist keeping me a little plump, I see,” said Naruto to the giant.

“I suppose you as a larger woman has somewhat grown on me,” replied Hinata, patting Naruto on the head with her watermelon sized hands. “I look forward to having you back at my height, though this is fine for a little longer.”

“It looks like there wasn’t enough air to burst you through the room to get outside, after all. Hang on, I’ll step outside so we can hand off the air.”

“Wait,” Hinata called out just as Naruto turned for the door. “Something’s different. Like before, when I gained the power to steal your air with a kiss.”

“What? Are you saying more air got you another power?” Naruto ask excitedly, the prospect of a new gift to explore with a little exciting.

“Perhaps...,” Hinata’s voice trailed off before closing her eyes in meditation.

She began to breathe out, slowly at first but increasing with every second that passed. Naruto suddenly noticed that with each release, Hinata shrunk a few inches.

It wasn’t long before she neared his current size. Her dress had shriveled up with her and she was still wide around the hips and chest, like she was overweight. She stood at seven feet tall when she finished, though she wobbled around.

Naruto rushed to her side. “Are you alright?”

“I’m fine, thanks. That just made me really dizzy was all.”

“What did you do? You’re tiny again! Well, tinier at least.” Naruto compared their heights, and she was a good head bigger than he.

“I released the air inside me, so now I can fit through the door.”

“So, now that air is lost?”

“I don’t think so,” Hinata mumbled as braced herself.

She took her thumb and stuck it into her mouth. She then took a deep breath and blew as hard as she could into her finger.

Naruto watched in amazement as Hinata began to inflate again without the aid of him or the air tank. She rose up to nine feet before releasing all the air she had gathered.

“Looks like I can blow myself up again, like I’m made of rubber,” she giggled.

“Whoa,” Naruto was now really jealous that he hadn’t been the one to take all the air. “Can you get as big as you want?”

“I don’t think it works that way, Naruto. It’s hard to describe, but it’s almost like when we steal someone’s air, we take their very life essence. Their essence stays inside me, even if I release all my air. However, I’m limited to how much I can grow based on how many people I’ve inhaled. I have eight people inside me, so I can’t get bigger than fourteen feet.”

Naruto was straining himself to follow along, but he thought he understood the basics of what she was trying to explain. “So, what you’re saying is you can control how big you get, but you need more people if you wanted to get bigger?”

“Or if you wanted to get bigger,” she replied as she stepped closer to Naruto, still showing off her superior height. “I still owe you your air back in case you wanted to be the one who got huge first, Naruto. I don’t mind.”

Naruto licked his lips. The proposal was tempting…
123322121111121.title: New Heights and New Powers

1233221211111211.content:
“I gotta be honest,” began Naruto, already blushing from what he was about to admit. “It’s kind of…Exciting to be manipulated by the giant you.”

Hinata blushed in turn. “O-Oh? I didn’t realize you were into that sort of thing, Naruto.”

“Well, keep it to yourself. Anyway, let’s focus on getting you bigger first. We can always swap whenever we want to anyway.”

“I’m fine with that, but how big do you want me to get, Naruto?”

“Huge!” Naruto expanded his hands out to try to give her an idea. “I want you to be so big that you could fit me between your breasts!”

Hinata’s face grew even redder. “I-Is that what you want from me, Naruto?”

He only just realized how brash the idea was out loud. “Sorry! I didn’t mean to upset you or—”

“N-No, that’s not it,” she interrupted, looking down at her feet. “I sort of like the idea of you being that small and having my way with you.”

Naruto cherished the idea that Hinata was be as into his ideas as he was, but this was becoming too good to be true. He awkwardly rubbed the back of his head, trying to change the subject to prevent further embarrassing the both of them. “Well, the first thing we’re going to need is a big space to do all this. And I think I know just the location…”

~

A couple minutes later and both Hinata and Naruto were back to their relative normal size. Naruto was still assuming the identity of Tsunade and had put on a spare outfit of her they had found in the office. Not even Hinata could tell it wasn’t the real Hokage, Naruto’s mannerisms and size were spot on.

Hinata herself had shrunk down to her original four foot nine height in an effort to blend into the village, though she had kept the dress from the shop on. Already, she was missing being an inflated giantess. Everything was so big to her perspective now, and her body felt weak and heavy. It was tempting to just inhale in some air while standing in the middle of the street, but she resisted. They had even left the air tank behind in Tsunade’s office to avoid suspicion while carrying it around.

Thankfully, they were heading outside the city proper as Naruto led them on. Hinata recognized the area they were in. They were headed for the training grounds.

“It’s almost dark,” commented Naruto. “Good, that means no one will be there to bother us.”

“My family is going to wonder where I am soon, Naruto.”

“Just tell them you were busy on a mission when you get back. They won’t even know you’re missing!”

“If you say so…”

Unfortunately, when they came over the hill to Naruto’s usual haunt, they discovered that there was someone already there. It was a tall dark-haired woman that Hinata recognized instantly.

“Sensei Kurenai,” Hinata called out.

Her teacher looked up from the training she was doing. She must have gone out here to practice after their last mission. Kurenai noticed her student and Naruto, walking over to greet them.

“Lady Tsunade and Hinata,” she did a slight bow. “What brings you two out here?”

“Oh, we were just looking for some alone time,” answered Naruto.

“Alone time?” Kurenai asked confusedly.

“Yeah. In fact, we’d be happy if you joined us. Right, Hinata?”

Hinata knew that as her queue to start growing, but she wished it had been anyone else but her master who was their next victim. Still, she wasn’t willing to stop just because of her relation to Kurenai, not when she got such a rush from the process.

Sticking her finger in her mouth, Hinata blew as hard as she could to bring her up to size. Within minutes, she was already towered over both Naruto and Kurenai, the later of whom was in total awe at her student’s monstrous growth.

Hinata eventually clocked in at about fourteen feet and eight inches tall, slightly bigger than before because of the remaining air she had ingested from Naruto. It was good to be big again, and Hinata stretched herself out slightly before looking down at her now frightened teacher before grabbing her around the waist.

“Don’t struggle, sensei,” Hinata tried to be calming with her big booming voice. “I’m not going to hurt you. I just want you to be a part of me.”

Kurenai was practically a doll in her hands and Hinata was able to easily press her lips on her sensei’s squirming face. She breathed in just enough not to take in Kurenai’s entire head, but enough to instantly drain her sensei into a flapping pile of skin and clothing. Even Naruto was startled at just how quickly Hinata deflated Kurenai as she handed him what remained of her former teacher.

Being as large as she already was, only one person’s air had affected Hinata’s height very little. She now stood at nearly sixteen feet tall, meaning Naruto went up to only her knees now. He looked absolutely adorable as he stared sheepishly up at her balloon-like form.

“Well, that was easy,” he replied, folding up Kurenai’s skin. “What do you want to do now, Hinata?”

Hinata smiled, content with the essence of Kurenai swirling around inside her. That’s when she had an idea and leaned down close to Naruto, who was almost the size of her head at this point. She…
1233221211111211.title: Almost Sixteen Feet!

choices: Give Hinata all the air, still.
12332212111112111.content:
“Naruto,” Hinata began, staring directly at the remains of her former teacher. “Hand over Kuranei. I have an idea.”

Naruto was surprised. They hadn’t shown any interest in exploring with the skins of the people they had deflated. But he didn’t say a word as he obeyed his sweetheart; she must have had something big planned.

Hinata took the suit-like remains in her gigantic fingers and shifted them around until she could find the mouth of the skin. She then breathed in and blew as hard as she could into the suit. Instantly, the flattened remains of Kurenai came to life and Hinata began to shrink in size. Naruto continued to watch in silence as Kurenai became sentient, alive, and naked, holding onto Hinata’s face in a passionate kiss.

Before long, both women in front of him were even in size, standing at about half of what Hinata had been, nearly eight feet tall and just as obese-looking. They both broke from their kiss and turned to face Naruto.

“Well, what do you think?” both women asked at the same time, like clones.

“Wait, what did you do?” Naruto asked, glancing at Kurenai then Hinata.

“I transferred half of my air into the Kurenai suit to make a clone of myself,” explained Hinata.

“Wait, that’s also you?” Naruto pointed to Kurenai.

“Yup,” replied the Kurenai clone. “I have all her memories and personality. I’m pretty much an exact duplicate of her except in looks. But speaking of which, that was just step one. Ready?”

“Ready,” smiled Hinata as she and the Kurenai clone put their thumbs in their mouths to inflate again.

And inflate they did. Both women skyrocketed back up to Hinata’s original height of nearly sixteen feet tall. Naruto could hardly believe his eyes, now he had two gorgeous inflated giantesses’ to contend with. Naruto had to avert his eyes though from the Kurenai’s massive inflated form, which both women giggled at.

“He is quite cute when he’s bashful like that,” said Kurenai to Hinata.

“Isn’t he? Step two is complete, time to bring him up to our level.”

“Get ready for a wild ride, Naruto,” smiled the Kurenai as she bent over to kiss him.

She practically swallowed his entire head as she pressed her mouth against his face. It was like getting hit in the face with the blast from a fan when she blew into him. But something was forcing him to keep his mouth open and the air traveled all the way down into his body.

Naruto could feel himself grow, though he saw very little with Kurenai’s face in the way. His body started to explode out of Tsunade’s clothes and he felt himself rise like he was in an elevator. The process made him feel so full, fuller than any inflation he had experienced before. This most likely was because there was so much air to take in for him that the transfer was taking minutes long to complete.

Soon, Naruto was as wide as he was tall. The Kurenai clone was beginning to look like a child in his eyes and he was forced to hold onto her with his hands before she slipped away from his mouth due to gravity. Sensing she could use a little help, Naruto took a deep breath and sucked in all the remained of the Kurenai in the process. His height shot up in an instant, all the way to sixteen feet, as the Kurenai suit trailed down to the ground in the wind along with the remains of Tsunade’s clothes.

“Mmm, there,” said Hinata as she waddled over to her new giant partner. “Step three complete. Welcome to the land of the big.”

And big it was indeed. Naruto was now exactly as tall as Hinata, taller than some of the surrounding trees! This sudden change in perspective was almost too much to take in and he lost his balance. But Hinata caught him before he fell over.

“Easy does it. It’s a lot to take in, isn’t it?”

“Yeah,” he replied. His voice was deeper and hollow sounding, like Hinata’s and released such air that it caused some nearby trees to fray in the wind. “But this is so cool!”

“I knew you’d like it. I didn’t want me to have all the fun. How do you feel? When I first reached your size, my skin felt really sensitive.”

Naruto had to agree. His body had gotten so swollen and tight that every breeze in the wind tickled him all over. Most foreign of all was the concept of just how much space he was taking up. Looking around, he felt like he was in a miniature version of the forest. In the distance, he could see the village and even that was starting to look tiny.

“Well,” Hinata gave him a large hug. “What do you want to do now, Naruto?”

Naruto grinned. The possibilities were truly endless with this power.
12332212111112111.title: Bringing Naruto Up to Size

choices: Hinata deflates with Naruto inside her.
Naruto begins to inflate while inside her.
123322121111121111.content:
“I said I wanted you to get huge and that’s what we’re going to do,” concluded Naruto. “Come here.”

Naruto practically dove all over here as Hinata felt his warm bloated embrace. He stroked her cheek before going in for the kiss and letting the magic begin.

Hinata gripped herself around her crush tightly as the rush of his air filled her mouth and spread out to all corners of her body. This time, the process was a thousand times more intense, most likely due to how huge they both were. She could literally hear her skin creaking as it took to a new size that she never dreamed possible before.

She was letting Naruto control the flow of air passing between and the rate at which she would grow, and Naruto was the impatient type. Hinata felt herself practically launch into the air as her body began more barrel-shaped than anything else. It was like her torso had become a giant ball and everything else, from her breasts to her arms and legs, were mere attachments or decorations. She looked, and felt, like a typical parade balloon.

Naruto had to cling to her face in order to hold himself up, as Hinata was now as tall as a small building. Soon he was only about the size of her head and that’s when he broke himself from her, back at the standard height of Lady Tsunade. He fell backwards only to be caught by Hinata’s bouncy palm.

“YOU LOOK SO TINY, NARUTO.” Hinata said. Her very voice caused their surroundings to rumble.

Naruto, on the otherhand, sounded like a pitiful squeak, even though he was held at chest height to her. “You look perfect!”

Hinata giggled. Officially, she was now standing at thirty one feet and eight inches, almost double what she had been before. She could hold Naruto in the palm of her hand easily, even with him standing up on his own two feet. He beckoned her to lean in closer and jumped at her chest when she obeyed. Hinata felt him land comfortably in her cleavage.

“THAT’S WHERE YOU WANTED TO BE, ISN’T IT?” Hinata let out a hearty laugh as Naruto grinned up at her.

Hinata gave her bust as large squeeze, trying to feel as close as she could to someone so small. But it was becoming hard to enjoy it as much as Naruto was. She wanted to be closer to him, to enjoy his company enough that he didn’t feel like an ant crawling over her.
