He lifted her slightly off the ground with his teeth and breathed in like he was taking a long drag while smoking a cigarette. Manami’s eyes widened as she began to shrivel away and lose all her misbegotten height and weight. She flopped against his chin as Naruto blimped up like he was an air mattress, still lying on the floor of the restaurant.

He felt the different parts of him push against his expandable dress, enjoying the new perspective on his inflation. He hadn’t ever expanded himself by lying down before and it was quite exciting to feel his breasts lift him off the ground with their new girth. But it was his stomach that had expanded the most from this new victim. Manami must have had a very fatty personality.

When the model was sucked dry, Naruto spat her remains to floor like used gum. He could barely fit in the room now and most of the small restaurant was taken up by his nearly thirty foot tall persona. And he wasn’t even at his maximum height yet. Naruto also discovered something else as he returned to a more manageable size of seven feet tall.

“I can hear them,” he said, grabbing his head.

Reaching the forty foot marker had unlocked a new power within him. Naruto now heard the voice of every single person he had drained from Manami to Tsunade. Not only that, but he had their memories and thoughts within him. He could recall everything they had experienced up until the point he drained them of their air. It was like they were sentient souls within him.

“So,” Naruto said to himself as he focused on accessing Manami’s memories. “You got the air tank a year ago and truly didn’t know anything about its power other than it could boost your career. How typical of an adult.”

He had also learned that the air tank had come as a gift from one of Manami’s fans and was much more limited in its power in comparison to the one he had. However, it was much more suited to covert draining as it would not immediately suck a person dry. It would be quite handy to subtly use it in the future to obtain more air, so Naruto stuffed it in his cleavage for safe keeping.

He now had loads of options and knew he could essentially become the size of a building and terrorize the neighborhood, growing more and more as he drained more people. But that kind of approach would get him into a lot of trouble if they managed to defeat him.

Glancing down at the remains of Manami, he had another idea. There was a perfectly good suit waiting for him and he had all the memories of Manami and her past life. It would be safer, though slower, to pose as her and go around quietly draining victims one by one. Over time, no one would even notice that he had acquired so much air.

After giving the matter some thought, Naruto…
123322121111121111222122.title: Forty Foot Naruto

1233221211111211112221221.content:
“Screw it,” shouted Naruto, as he put his finger in his mouth to inflate. “If I’m going to go big at this put, I want to go all the way.”

And with that determination he blew as hard as he could. Naruto felt himself grow out, swelling into the folds of his magic dress which still managed to contain him through everything. He looked down and saw his breasts as huge as basketballs, eclipsed only by his stomach by a good foot. From an outsider’s perspective, he looked like an over-inflated Hinata balloon and he wasn’t even half way done!

Standing up, Naruto found that he was quickly running out of room in the building, so he stopped his inflation for just a moment.

“Okay,” he said, getting on his knees as if ready to spring up in a jump. “Get ready.”

He then inhaled deeply for about a minute before biting his thumb again. As he started to inflate, his used his legs to quickly lift himself off the ground and smash through the roof of the restaurant.

His plan worked! As soon as he hit the ceiling of the building, his growth kicked in and Naruto shot up to over thirty feet tall. The roof was cheaply made and Naruto was able to break through it like one of those crappy monster movies. He now looked entirely like a parade balloon, soaring higher and higher into the sky. At last, he was at his limits…For now.

Now standing at forty one feet and nine inches, Naruto was bigger than most of the buildings around him. It was even more surreal to be this huge within a city as his mind still said all the structures around him should have been larger, but they instead felt like toys. Even the people below, who now noticed Naruto’s gigantic form, were scrambling around like ants.

“WOAH,” he muttered is his deep booming voice that was like a mixture of everyone he had inhaled talking at once. “HELLO KONOHA!”

There were screams beneath him as the citizens attempted to run away from the balloon giantess. But Naruto was too fast for some of them. He had grabbed about three people with one hand and brought them to his mouth.

“YOU ALL LOOK TASTY,” he said, licking his lips.

He brought his first victim to his mouth, a scared looking girl barely older than he was. Without giving her a second thought, he bit down hard onto of her head with his lips. He wasn’t going to chew her but swallow her whole! From his perspective, she was the size of a banana and he sensually slide her down his throat like one. He took a giant gulp and felt himself rise further in height. No longer did he have to deflate someone to take their air.

“YOU’RE MINE,” he roared and shoved the remaining two people into his mouth.

~

It wasn’t until the early morning did Naruto’s rampage end. He had taken in half the village and was now standing well over 500 feet. Anyone who was left had long since fled the city, no doubt to get help from any allies who could defeat this giant Hinata monster.

Naruto would continue on stealing the air from thousands of people until his size neared the moon. With no one to stop him, he would continue to grow until there were no people left at all.
1233221211111211112221221.title: A Big Ending

choices: Naruto quickly turns the lever of the valve.
Naruto laughs at Tsunade for falling for a stupid prank.
13.content:
None other then the fifth Hokage herself. No doubt avoiding work yet again. In fact Naruto noticed that she seemed a bit tipsy and didn't even notice him slouching on the road. Hiding the air tank in his vest Naruto quickly got up and dashed over to her and yelled.

"Hoi! Granny! What are you doing out of the office? You should take Hokage more seriously before I steal the title from you!"

Tsunade blinked at Naruto clearly trying to recognize him. 'Definitely drunk' Naruto said to himself with a snicker. She stumbled up to him, a jar of sake in hand, and said.

"Wha're you doin' here yah brat. I thought I shent you on that mission to baby sit the Hyūga's dog or shomething."

Naruto growled at her unsympathetic comment and pouted, shoving his hands into the pockets of his vest. His hand bumped into the large metallic feeling of the air tank hidden away in his shirt. A sly idea for a gag crept into the yellow haired pranksters head as he pulled the tank out of his jacket.

"Oh nothing much Granny, I was just on my way to deliver this bottle of sake to old Pervy Sage..." spoke Naruto wondering if Tsunade was drunk enough to mistake an air tank for a sake bottle.

It just so happens she was.

"Sh'ake bottle? Oi, give it here brat. Jiraiya won't mind if I sample just a taste now would he?"

And with that Tsunade snatched the air tank out of Naruto's hand.
13.title: Tsunade.

131.content:
Tsunade dimly put the nob of the tank to her lips. Ceasing the brief moment of Tsunade's drunkenness Naruto quickly turned the dial on the valve.

"Ah huh?" muffled Tsunade, "Mhat Mhe?"

Tsunade's cheeks puffed up as if all the air in her lungs was returning to her mouth. Naruto heard a distinct sound, almost like the sound a straw makes when sipping the bottom of an empty cup. There was a surprised look on Tsunade's face as she struggled to the get words out.

"Mmatru! Mlp! Mke Mit Mtp! (Naruto! Help! Make it stop!)"

Naruto could only stare at the puffy faced Hokage. Could that note actually have been true? There was no way that such a device could be real. It was just a prank right?

Tsunade continued to try to pull the air tank off of her mouth, but even with her super human strength she could not remove the sheer suction force of the tank. All she could do was whimper as the tank began to suck her dry. Tsunade's eyes turned to dinner plates as she looked down at her body. Her clothes seemed to becoming looser by the second. Slightly Naruto noticed more wrinkles appearing all over her clothing. Tsunade gasped and made a grab for her chest. Her ample bosom which she was so well known for was slowly retreating into her body.

The sensation was like nothing Tsunade had ever experienced before. It was almost like after taking a huge deep breathe and releasing it slowly, only it covered her entire body. From her nose to her toes she could a feel slight compression. She was shrinking!

Stumbling once more, she tried to make a grab for Naruto to make him stop whatever this thing was doing to her. However she tripped out of her own high heels and fell to the ground. She felt weak, like after a long day of training with no breaks. It took all the effort she had to just stand again, and by then Naruto had moved some distance out of her reach. Wobbling she decided her only option was to stand and wait to see what happened.

The infernal suction noise grew louder and louder and Tsunade felt weaker and weaker. It was almost as if all the muscle in her body was deflating and disappearing. She soon felt a new sensation, almost like a slight pressure from above that was pushing her down. She felt her spine slowly fold like a sheet as her eye level grew lower and lower.

All through this however she felt no pain. In fact it almost felt like a massage. A massage that was shrinking her!

By the time she had been scrunched down to about Naruto's heights she had lost most of her clothing. Her massive green jacket which read "Gamble" on the back had long fallen off and she had given up the struggle to keep her pants at her waist. Her blouse was now the only thing covering her entire body.

Naruto continued to look up with both horror and curiosity. He was deflating the Hokage, the protector of the entire village! However in the back of his mind he knew that this may be a chance for him to spend a day in a Hokage's shoes and finally know what it was like to earn the respect of Konoha.

Tsunade was now nearing Naruto's waist in height which was about three feet. She looked almost no different except for the fact that she was tiny and flat chested. The pressure from above stopped and Tsunade gave a slight sigh.
"Thank goodness" she said to herself. But no sooner did the pressure vanish did another appear from within. Tsunade's eyes bolted open as she felt her entire body compress inward. She was becoming as flat as paper! Her hand began to resemble her clothes as they shriveled away into a hollow form she felt it spread through down her chest and to her legs. Crying, she turned to Naruto and mumbled.

"Nmatru...mlp me...(Naruto...help me...)"

Her legs finally gave away and she collasped into a heap of clothes and skin. Her face was the last to go. The mask of Tsunade began to shrink, like the wearer of the face removed it from her own. Her eyes remained full of tears until they too became lifeless. Tsunade the Fifth Hokage was now nothing more then a pile of skin and clothes.
131.title: Tsunade Fooled!

choices: The hell with it! Use something else!
1311.content:
Naruto was completely speechless at what he just witnessed. Before him as a crumpled suit was Granny. And he could be her. Not an illusion like the Transformation jutsu, but a real disguise that would be able to fool anyone. He walked over to the mass of the former Hokage and picked up her skin and held it out in front of him like a new jacket to try on. She looked like a deflated pool toy only with a giant hole where the mouth would be.

"Now how the heck do I get in this thing?" spoke Naruto as he stretched the tiny Tsunade suit.

The suit was the deflated form of a three foot tall Tsunade. It looked difficult for even a small child to enter but as Naruto stretched it he could tell that anyone of any size could enter the skin. The suit could probably stretch twenty feet before stopping.

"I guess I got to use the mouth as an entrance." Spoke Naruto, not wanting to be a complete pervert by using the less respectable openings.
1311.title: Tsunade Time!

choices: Explore alittle with this new body.
13111.content:
"Granny will kill me if she knows I used another way of entering her suit. Who am I? Pervy Sage?" said Naruto aloud.

With that he gathering up the suit and clothes and carried them over to an ally between two buildings. He began to strip his clothes to prepare himself to enter the suit. When he was finally done, he gulped in anticipation and held up the suit.

"Okay Granny, time to see what it's like to be you." he mused.

He stretched Tsunade's mouth to comically proportions in order to make room for his much larger body. Slowly he stuck his foot in, feeling around for the appropriate leg on the suit to fit his own in. Once he found the hole he slowly slide his whole leg in, bringing the mouth of the suit up to his knee. Confident, he dig his leg deeper into the suit's until the mouth was up all the way to his groin. Feeling around with his feet, he found five small openings and popped each of his toes into the little slots.

Naruto looked over the crumpled body of Tsunade at the foot in the suit. He wiggled the toes which displayed the bright pink nail polish Tsunade had applied.

"Neat!" yelled Naruto as he began to place his other foot inside.

His right foot slide into place more easier then his left, with both legs in place he pulled the suit up to his waist. From another standpoint it would look like a miniature Tsunade had gobbled up Naruto from the waist down. Chuckling, Naruto quickly stretched the suit up to his chest (with some difficultly) so that he hold place his arms in next.

The arms were a far smoother process then both legs combined. It was almost like putting in an over sized glove. Naruto finished fitting his arms inside and pulled up the suit all the way to his neck. He spotted a nearby mirror in the trash and flexed.

"Okay," He said to himself "now the final part. Good bye face."

Naruto pulled the bottom of Tsunade's jaw and aligned her bottom lip with his own. Holding the bottom half in place, he reached over for the Tsunade suit's nose and pulled it over his own. The suit's lips almost seemed to stick to his own as he had difficulty removing them. He looked over his own body. His chest, his face, even his gender had all been switched to Tsunade's. In fact he looked almost like a miniature flat chested Hokage. Admiring himself in the mirror. Naruto laughed.

"Well now what should I do with you Granny..."
13111.title: Use the mouth.

131111.content:
Naruto twirled the pigtails of the Tsunade suit thinking of what what to do next. He spotted the air tank among Tsunade's clothes and hatched an idea.

"Oh right. The note said that if I breathe in Granny's air I'll actually become her completely."

Naruto gathered up the clothes and the air tank. The little dial on the valve read 1/4 full. Naruto became nervous. The note did say that he would be able to assume Tsunade's shape if he breathed the air in, but there was always the chance that he would end up just like here. A crumpled costume in a dark alleyway.

He finally decided it would be worth the gamble. He placed the clothing aside and brought the black air tank to his face.

"Well...here goes nothing." said he as he bit down on the valve.
131111.title: The Gamble.

choices: See what happens if he removes the skin.
1311111.content:
Naruto turned the knob and immediately felt his cheeks puff out, much like Tsunade's did when she deflated.

"Oh crap!" He thought to himself as he prepared to face deflation.

But he did not hear the sound of suction coming from the tank as he did with Tsunade. In fact what he did hear was almost like the sound a balloon makes when being blown up by a helium tank. The air that was being forced into Naruto made it's way down his throat. It was soft air. The kind one would normally breathe in when on a warm day at the beach. There was also a slight scent of sake to remind Naruto that this was Tsunade's essence he was breathing in. The warmth of the air had made it's way down to his belly, where it slowly formed a soft budge as his stomach expanded outwards.

"Mmy Mm Mely! (Hey my belly!)" mumbled Naruto as his stomach neared a foot in length.

Naruto could sense what was happening here. All the air in the tank was making a home in his stomach. His belly blew to nearly two feet and still Naruto felt no pain. It was just like taking the deepest breathe he had ever taken. He gently rubbed his inflating middle as it quickly reached the three foot mark. He now looked like a tiny pregnant Tsunade.

Then something changed for a second as he touched his belly. He felt hollow almost, not just in his stomach but his hands, his legs, even his head (no pun intended). He felt almost like a pool toy eager to fill up the empty void inside of him to transform into a much bigger and grander form. There was then a quick sense of compression on his stomach, almost like someone was pushing in his inflated belly. As if someone had freed the air trapped in his stomach from imprisonment, the air of Tsunade spread outwards. Moving to fill the empty voids in his body.

Naruto watched his hands as his fingers were plumping up to fit Tsunade's size. Slowly his hands grew just a tad larger, he pressed them together and felt their warmth and softness as the air slithered like a snake up his arms. Another large pocket of air was traveling down his body. His toes grew to resemble little light bulbs until their feet followed suit, filling with the same warm air that his hands were. These weren't even the biggest changes as the air pressed upwards towards the more womanly body parts.

Naruto could feel his legs being pushed up as his view of the world slowly cranked higher. His calves and hamstrings were being blown to the busty female's proportions, he put his hands on his hip as he felt a strong resistance as they surged upwards. The butt was the last part of the lower body as it inflated to match his Tsunade legs.

His shoulders and stomach remained at the same size. Probably because there was nothing that expanded there on the female body. His arms had been long finished and he now felt the same super strength Tsunade had within. All the air slowly rised on his body and met in the center of his chest.

"Here it comes." Thought Naruto as he prepared for the giant expansion of his breasts.

But the air did not push out yet, and instead traveled further up to his face. His head grew bigger and his world grew smaller as the air expanded to met Tsunade's skull size. He could feel the largest activity being done on his lips, which were now plumped to the size of Tsunade's. When the process was complete Naruto reached to feel his now face but was stopped by the slight push in his upper body.

The most famous body part of the Fifth Hokage was now making it's show stopping appearance. His boyish chest now grew and grew from A to B to C, as it struggled to match Konoha's Leaders impressive bosom.

"Come on, come on..."mumbled Naruto as he tried to push all the air in his body to that one important point.

After much effort he finally heard two satisfying pops and his chest now displayed Tsunade's proud assents. From head to toe he was now completely the Lord Hokage. Naruto removed the air tank from his mouth and began to feel around his new shape to more sure this wasn't just a dream. As he stared down his body two massive globes of flesh were in his viewpoint.

"Wow..." He spoke in Tsunade's voice, to which he was not accustomed to and quickly covered his mouth.

With the air tank and the body of the leader of an entire village, Naruto could now do absolutely anything. An evil grin came across the Tsunade suit's face as the many ideas of experiments he could do with the tank came to mind.

"What shall I do...?"
1311111.title: It works!

13111111.content:
The sheer number of thoughts rushing through the normally empty headed ninja was staggering. Every single part of the young ninja's brain cried out to explore the world using this magical device. That is until the realization occurred to him that lady Tsunade was standing naked in a dark alley for the whole world to see. Blushing Naruto quickly gathered up Tsunade's clothing and began putting it on. The revealing opening of the blouse made Naruto feel a little embarrassed and the high heels took some getting used to while walking. But once dressed, no one could tell that under the skin of the Fifth Hokage was the number one prankster ninja in Konoha.

Wobbling down the alley with his old clothes and the air tank in hand, Naruto looked down both ways of the street he found the tank on to check if the coast was clear. Someone was coming down the street. It was...
13111111.title: I spy another ninja...

choices: "Do you mind putting this tank to your mouth?"
"Do you want to know a secret?" (Reveals himself to Hinata)
131111111.content:
It was the shy Hyūga girl, Hinata. Obviously returning from a mission just like Naruto had been not too long ago. She seemed to be mumbling to herself, doing her nervous habit of playing with her fingers while walking down the dirt road. She didn't seem to notice Naruto yet. Thinking quickly Naruto hid his old clothing in his pack and tossed it aside, he then went up to greet the quiet black haired ninja.

"Hey Hinata!" yelled Naruto completely out of Tsunade's character.

"Oh h-hello Lady Tsunade." replied Hinata.

"What are you doing out here?"

"Oh-h, I-I was just o-on my way back h-home from the mission y-you assigned us r-remember?"

Naruto had almost forgotten that he was Tsunade now.

"Oh of course! I'm sorry Hinata, I think I just had one too many!" replied Naruto trying to sound like Tsunade as best as he could.

Then an idea popped into his head. Casually he asked Hinata.

"Hey Hinata, I was wondering..."
131111111.title: Hinata returning from a mission.

choices: She fell for it! Deflate her!
Come clean. She likes Naruto and it would be mean.
1311111111.content:
"Do you mind putting this tank to your mouth?" Smiled Naruto.

"Wh-what?" Said Hinata, completely confused.

"Oh well let me explain..."replied Naruto, who was quickly thinking of an excuse "See, I notice you stutter a lot Hinata and I think this air tank might help you with that. It's a special...medical gas that reduces your stuttering greatly. It really works too. Would you like to give it a try?"

Beads of sweat dripped down the back of the suit's neck. Naruto hoped Hinata wouldn't be wise enough to see through his ploy. If anyone found out about this air tank, he could very well be kicked out of the village. He almost sighed in relief when Hinata said.

"R-really Lady Hokage? W-would it r-really help me stop s-stuttering? That w-would be great I-I think Naruto d-doesn't like me for it- I-I-I m-mean, Ummm." said Hinata as she turned bright red.

Naruto couldn't help be blush a tad as well before smiling and said.

"Sure Hinata! Here let me help you with that. Just bring the tank up to your mouth and bite down on valve. That's it..."
1311111111.title: Tricking Hinata!

13111111111.content:
The moment the tank was firmly attached to Hinata's lips was the moment Naruto activated the tank. Smiling, knowing he had her right where he wanted her, Naruto stepped back as Hinata's cheeks filled with the air being drawn from her.

"Mmf Mmdy Mmfmmde. Mf Mfsh Mmmfped Mm Mmm Mmmfnig? (Umm, Lady Tsunade. Is this supposed to be happening?)" muffled Hinata, tugging at the tank.

"Yes of course Hinata. Don't worry. It will be over soon enough." smirked Naruto.

The process was much quicker for Hinata then it was for Tsunade, presumably because of the Hokage's much larger size. Within seconds Hinata feel an almost vacuum cleaner like force suck all the air from her. She began to feel lightheaded and weaker. She felt her chest slowly being pulled in, each breast deflating like a balloon with a hole in it. Even her rump was losing it's size as it was slowly being sucked into her legs. Still Hinata didn't begin to panic until she felt a pressing force from above, like she was being stepped on.

Naruto watched with much more interest as the Hyūga began to dwindle in front of him. It was like watching a life sized Hinata blowup doll lose it's air, only at a much quicker pace. His head followed the girl's shrinking body as it stepped down an inch. 4 feet. 3 feet 11. 3 feet 10. Hinata was shrinking an inch a second. Hinata reached out at Naruto to try to stop it, but she couldn't even speak now. The suction of the air tank had slurped her voice away.

Hinata felt like she was a child again when she passed the 3 foot marker. Even Naruto was surprised when she kept on shrinking away, concerned she might dissolve into nothing. At around 2 and a half feet. The immense pressure from above finally stopped. But Hinata did not even have time for a breathe of relief, the tank sucked with all it's might and instantly made Hinata as flat as a pancake. The remaining suit crumpled to the street, clothes and all.
13111111111.title: Poor Hinata deflates.

131111111111.content:
Naruto picked up Hinata's remains and stored them into his backpack. He would have more fun with them later. What he was most interested in was Hinata's air, the note never said what would happen if someone were to inhale two people's worth of air. Feeling giddy with excitement Naruto put down his backpack and brought the black tank to his mouth. With finger's crossed, he turned on the valve and was greeted with the familiar blow back.

The air was far more intense this time. Immediately blasts of wind burst down the back of his throat filling his lungs with air. When they could hold no more, they found a new home within his stomach. The ninja felt and saw the Tsunade suit develope a small beer belly which surged outwards with no signs of stopping. No sooner then 10 seconds did the Tsunade in the mirror look like she was carrying twins. Naruto knew what was going to come next, the pressure that would push the air throughout his body.

Surprisingly, it never came. Naruto kept blowing up and eventually popped out of his blouse with breasts bouncing on top of his belly. His stomach was now about the size of a small beanbag chair. Naruto became worried when he felt a sharp pain on the top of his stomach, his inflated organ was digging into his ribs! With all his might Naruto struggled to reach over his two orbs and began to push his belly in hoping to release the gas somehow. He knew this was a bad idea! He might pop and die because of his foolish tricks! With all that remained of his arm strength Naruto gave one final push and...

FLUMP, went his chest. Naruto nearly fell onto his back. The air that was inside his belly was now completely spread out all over his torso. From his hips and up he looked like a giant beachball with two domes where his breasts would be. The only thing that could now cover his upper body was Tsunade's green jacket, which was now nearly stretched to the limits. And the air tank was still emptying into him.

"I gotta even this out or I'm dead." Thought Naruto as he continued to push his chest inward.

With a giant push from the sides of his upper body, Naruto closed his eyes and heard an even louder FWUUMP! He felt air rushing to every point of his body and felt Tsunade's pants tear at the seems. With as much bravery as he could muster he opened his eyes.

At first he couldn't see the mirror that was in front of him. He thought he might have blown it away. Naruto looked down and realized the mirror hadn't blown away. He and grown about a good 2-3 feet. The air tank gave the last of Hinata's air before becoming silent again. And Naruto was left to study his new form.
131111111111.title: Adding to Tsunade's girth.

choices: Go out to eat as a giant Tsunade.
Sneak home and try to return to normal.
1311111111111.content:
The first thing besides his new height, which was now officially 8 foot 6., that Naruto noticed was the fact that the giant belly on the Tsunade suit remained. In fact his whole chest was still inflated and hollow. He patted his belly which made a satisfying TONK sound. Of course he could hardly see his belly now because of the newly inflated breasts that had expanded to the size of volley balls. Staring down his massive cleavage he determined that his entire chest looked like an orange with two grapes stapled to it.

He then noticed his fingers, which were now puffed up like sausages left in the microwave. Both arms seemed to have expanded the further they were away from his hands. They almost looked like legs now. He almost had trouble flexing his massive joints. The green jacket still fit tightly over the massive orb that was his body while the blouse had given up the fight and ripped in half.

With some difficultly Naruto bended over to observe his legs which were now the size of tree trunks with equally huge feet that had exploded out of Tsunade's high heels. The pants had ripped on both sides of the waist as the hips of the Tsunade suit flared outwards to almost 5 feet from end to end. Naruto's butt resembled two giant pillows shoved in the back of his pants.

Despite the appearance of an utterly massive Tsunade, Naruto felt extremely light and free. He could probably stand on his tippy toes and still be able to jump on top of the roof of the 5 story buildings that surrounded him.

Even Naruto's head had grown to accommodate the massive body attached to it. The only part of the entire suit that did not seem to inflate was the blond hair with pig tails that looked absolutely tiny compared to the rest of the body.

"Wow, I'm huge..." spoke Naruto in a much deeper Tsunade voice.

He was greeted with a new sensation of dread as his stomach rumbled slightly. He hadn't had anything to eat since this morning and he was hungry. He couldn't go out in public like this...or could he?
1311111111111.title: Tsunade, the inflated giant.

13111111111111.content:
"Know what forget it." spoke the gigantic Tsunade, "I'm the Hokage, if they don't serve me I can beat the crap out of them. Right?"

With that, Mega-Naruto waddled out of the alley and back down the street to head to his favorite ramen bar, Ichiraku. While walking down the street he received a few horror struck looks from the villagers but no one said anything. Finally he arrived at the ramen house. He struggled to squish into the tiny bar and find his favorite seat in the house. Finally with much difficulty he settled down to place his order.

The ramen house owner, Teuchi asked, "Uhhh wow...What can I do for you my lady?"

"Gimme the beef ramen, chef." answered Naruto.

Food was immediately brought out and Naruto dug in. By the time he reached his twentieth bowl, which he would not have been able to pay for if the owner had not given it to him on the house. Naruto was relaxing when he heard a voice from behind him say.

"Oh my! Lady Tsunade, there you are!"

Naruto turned and saw it was...
13111111111111.title: On the town.

choices: Make an excuse to have her follow Naruto. (Devour her.)
Ignore hunger and return to Tsunade's office.
131111111111111.content:
Lady Shizune was sharing up at the massive blimp that was Naruto in the shape of Tsunade. Her jaw dropped at the sheer size of the suit.

"Lady Tsunade, what in the world happened to you?! Are you alright?!", questioned Shizune with concern.

Naruto thought up a lie quickly and said, "Oh yes Shizune, just a small problem with some new...medicine! Yea that's it. Apparently I had an allergic reaction to it and I swelled up a bit. But don't worry it's reversible."

Shizune looked very relieved from Naruto's excuse, which the ninja was grateful for. The less explaining about the air tank, the better. Shizune explained her business in searching for Tsunade.

"You were supposed to be doing the important paper work when you got up and left Lady Tsunade!", cried Shizune,"Now come on, it must get completed before nightfall."

Naruto sighed. Apparently being Hokage was not all free ramen and having fun. As he got up with help from Shizune, his stomach growled loudly. Apparently his body body required more nutrients than a meager twenty bowls of ramen could provide. Naruto stared curiously at Shizune.
131111111111111.title: Shizune looking for Tsunade.

choices: "Oh my god, what have I done?!"
"Mmm, I wonder what else there is to eat..."
1311111111111111.content:
Surely no one would notice Shizune was gone. Naruto could just make an excuse that she had left on an important mission as Hokage after all. He licked his lips and he thought up an excuse to lure the unsuspecting secretary into his hungry stomach.

"Yes of course I'll come Shizune. But first I need your help in a very important matter. Here follow me."

Naruto ducked and waddled out of the ramen shop and headed for a dark alleyway nearby with Shizune closely following behind.

"Why are we heading in this alleyway Lady Tsunade? Is this a secret?"

Naruto smiled greedily and said "Yes of course, this will be our little secret okay?"

And with that, Naruto lifted the surprised Shizune in one hand and placed her feet first in his mouth. He could feel her kicking as hard as she could inside his jaw as she yelled.

"L-lady Tsunade what in the world are you doing?! Let me go pl-" Naruto poked his finger in Shizune's mouth in order to keep her quiet.

Shizune's eyes were wide with fear as each gulp sucked her down the massive Hokage's gullet. Naruto felt the female high heel sandals slip and fall off into the bottom of his belly, landing with a hollow DOINK. When Shizune had been gulped down up to her waist Naruto paused for a moment and moved the smaller woman's arms into his mouth. Shizune bit and kicked with all her might but could not compete with the giantess's strength. Naruto's throat had stretched accordingly to squeeze the woman down like a snake. It was when Naruto had Shizune's head between his teeth did he remove his finger from her mouth.

"Lady Tsunade please we can fix this..." whimpered Shizune,"It's not too late! Just let me out and-

*GULP*

Naruto swallowed Shizune's talking head in one gulp. He felt the woman land within his hollow body with a thud.
1311111111111111.title: Goodbye Shizune.

13111111111111111.content:
Naruto returned to reality. His own hunger had gotten the best of him and he completely lost control of himself. It was only until he felt the kicking of Shizune from within his blimplike belly did he realize what he had done. He had swallowed a person! And worse it was someone knew!

"Oh my god, what have I done?!", he yelled in Tsunade's massive voice. "Lady Shizune, can you hear me in there?! Kick once!"

Naruto felt a slight joint from his gut as a slight bump appeared from within. Shizune was fine inside him. In fact his whole inside wasn't like a normal human's anymore. It was almost like being inside a rubber wall-ball, all hollow and empty with only air to fill the space.

"What can I do to get her out of there?", mumbled Naruto, "Ah I know! I'll deflate myself with the air tank and then she can climb out of the suit! Lady Shizune! If you can hear me just remain calm, I'll get you out of there!"

Naruto bent over to grab the air tank from his backpack. Placing to his mouth, he prepared himself to deflate.
13111111111111111.title: Regret.

choices: Go home and sort things out.
131111111111111111.content:
As Naruto turned on the valve he felt the vacuuming of the air tank as the air from within him met the nozzle. But merely a few seconds in Naruto gagged on something that had been sucked up his throat. He realized what was going on. Shizune was being deflated instead of Naruto! Naruto gave the air tank a tug and pulled out a full grown woman (slowly shrinking) from within his mouth.

"L-lady Shizune! I'm sorry! I didn't mean for that to happen!", yelled the giant ninja.

Tears streamed down Shizune's eyes as she crumpled and shrunk in the same matter her lady did earlier that day. Her clothes began to fall off as she reached out to Naruto to make him stop the suction. Unfortunately she fell flat on her face and her body shape shrink to the ground until she was flat as paper. Shizune was a suit just like Hinata and Tsunade.

Naruto was clearly upset at what he had done. "What am I supposed to do now...?", he asked to himself.
131111111111111111.title: It doesn't work!

choices: Naruto can't find the air tank.
Naruto woke up normal sized, but stuck in the suit.
1311111111111111111.content:
Naruto couldn't do anything else. It was already past midnight and he had to do another mission tomorrow. He gathered up the remains of Shizune and stuffed them in his pack with the others. Because it was late now, there were almost no people on the street so the walk home was uneventful. Fitting into his apartment was difficult but he managed to squeeze inside. However rather than returning to his normal form, he decided to stay as the giant Tsunade blimp. He didn't even need to use his bed to sleep. His big inflated form was so soft and warm. It was liking sleeping in the sun on a hill of grass, he even felt every slight breeze that entered the room as it traveled all over his sensitive body.

"I could get used to this...", he said to himself.

And with that the big ninja boy fell into a deep sleep, almost nothing could awaken him not even the dark stranger entering his window. The figure approached the sleeping giant and grabbed something, the intruder left as quickly as he came. The next morning...
1311111111111111111.title: Nothing else to do but go to bed.

choices: Skip the mission and go back to the spot you used the tank last night.
13111111111111111111.content:
Naruto had wonderful dreams that night. He dreamed he was floating in the clouds, weightless, huge, and soft. He felt free in the big blue sky. It was unlike anything he had ever experienced before. Sadly his dreaming was disturbed by the sharp beeping of his alarm clock. Naruto opened his eyes only to be greeted by a massive cleavage in front of him. He was still hugely inflated from the other night, and had the Tsunade suit and clothes on.

"Oh yea..." he said groggily to himself, remembering what he had done the other day.

He sat up and his head almost reached the ceiling, he felt like a giant weather balloon inside a storage closet in his apartment. Everything familiar was so tiny and far away now. He doubt he could stand up without crouching down to maneuver in his room and get breakfast. As he put his hands to the ground, he touched his backpack. He suddenly remember that he put Shizune's suit and clothing in there.

"Maybe I should return her to normal." He thought to himself. As he opened the pack and looked for the air tank. It wasn't in there. He check Tsunade's pockets and didn't find it there either. He began to worry as he looked around the room, giving moving his giant butt up to see if he was sleeping on it. No where. The tank was no where to be found!

"Oh...CRAP!" Naruto said aloud, suddenly realizing he had another mission he was supposed to go to today. There was no way he could go like this! What should he do?!
13111111111111111111.title: The air tank is gone!

131111111111111111111.content:
He couldn't miss this mission, Naruto had been slacking off enough as it was in his other missions. It was one of the reasons why he had hated yesterday's mission so much. This of course was going to require a huge amount of explaining to his team, particularly the fact that he had taken the air of three other ninjas including the Hokage. He ate his breakfast, which was a challenge in itself considering his hands were the size of the bowl of cereal. After the exercise that was breakfast, he pulled himself together and tried to find some else to wear besides Tsunade's old clothing.

He had to rip off the blue shower curtain from the bathroom and use it as towel wrapped around his body. The whole process took about an hour, making him very late for his mission. Not that it mattered, Kakashi was usually two hours late to every meeting. So Naruto was counting on him to hold up to his reputation as he dashed down the street.

Thankfully his inflated form made him incredibly light weight. By merely jumping into the air he could almost soar for several meters before softly touching back down. He used this to his advantage as he flew effortlessly over the roofs of buildings, it almost like in his dream. Of course, onlookers had to rub their eyes to make sure that they were seeing an inflated Tsunade in a shower curtain jumping from roof to roof.

"Uh oh." Naruto said to himself as he noticed he was gaining a crowd below. Thinking quickly he made the hand signs for shadow clones. Another Tsunade an overly inflated shape bounced next to Naruto. They split up, the clone taking most of the crowd with it. Naruto headed straight for the forest where his team awaited.

He hoped that Kakashi wasn't there yet.
131111111111111111111.title: Got some explaining to do...

131111111111111111112.content:
Naruto glanced at the clock. "Crap, crap...The mission going to start soon..."

He had the choice either to go to the mission and explain things to his team, though he doubt they would understand and would probably ridicule him for his stupid pranks, or to go out and try to find the air tank before someone found him. The choice was pretty obvious in his mind.

"I'll find the air tank, return everything to normal, then quickly head to the mission...I can afford to miss one once, right?"

He crawled around his apartment making his way to the door which he managed to squeeze through despite his blimp-like size. He thought it would be difficult to move around like this, but he was surprisingly light on his feet. Maybe the combined air of Tsunade and Hinata he had swallowed had literally inflated him into a balloon. Thankfully though, he did not go flying into the air when he stepped outside.

"I wonder what will happen if I try jumping..."

Grabbing onto the railing, Naruto threw himself into the air. He went sailing through the wind like a piece of paper, he easily cleared the rooftops and landed just out of sight from the crowd below.

"Gotta stay hidden," he told himself. "Hopefully everyone will just think I'm some balloon floating through the air."

He continued to jump from rooftop to rooftop, trying to make as little noise as possible. He remembered the alleyway in which he had swallowed Shizune last night and as he fast approached it he grabbed onto a nearby tower to look down. To his horror, there was someone already there holding the air tank. It was...
131111111111111111112.title: New Mission: Get the air tank!

choices: Just wander into someone at random.
13111111111111112.content:
"Mmm, I wonder what else there is to eat......Or rather 'who' else?" Naruto chuckled evilly.

Shizune was squirming wildly in the pit of his stomach, even in this gigantic form she still left a more noticeable bulge from Naruto's already protruding belly. Naruto gently patted where the frightened woman's head would be.

"Oh, don't worry Shizune, you're going to have company real soon."

Slowly, Naruto waddled along out of the alleyway. Being a giant blimp of air, he wasn't used to a grown woman now weighting him down in the pit of his stomach. This was making walking slightly more difficult but at least the heavy weight was leaving him less hungry before.

But there was still that gnawing desire to swallow someone else. The realization that he had a live person crawling around his insides hadn't yet hit his head, apparently. All he knew was that he liked this feeling of slight fullness in addition to the tickling on the inside from Shizune, and he wanted more.

It was getting pretty late at night, most ninjas were probably asleep or preparing to be for tomorrow's missions. All of them could be easy enough prey if Naruto got the drop on them. Then again, it was possible he'd just run into someone that looked delicious while exploring around the village. What would he choose?
13111111111111112.title: Go on a binge.

choices: Remove Tsunade's suit and wear Hinata's. Put Hinata's air inside Tsunade.
Deflate another ninja and put Hinata's air inside him/her
131111111112.content: What should i do with Hinata's suit?
131111111112.title: Try something else.

choices: No, trick her into using the airtank.
131111112.content:
Naruto could recognize that pink hair anywhere. It was his teammate and crush Sakura looking depressed, as if she was denied by Sasuke for the thousandth time. Without any critical thinking on Naruto's part, he stumbled out of the alleyway and greeted her.

"Oi Sakura!" yelled the idiotic ninja forgetting the rest of the world saw him as Tsunade.

"Oh um, hello Lady Tsunade, I didn't see you there." replied Sakura nerviously.

Sakura was a teammate and not to mention they could both have a lot of fun with the air tank if Naruto revealed himself. Right...?
131111112.title: Sakura.

1311111121.content:
Naruto decided the best course of action would be reveal himself to Sakura, after all he was a terrible actor.

"Hey Sakura, come on it's me Naruto." spoke Naruto in the Tsunade suit.

"Um, Lady Tsunade are you feeling alright?" replied Sakura, with ever growing concern.

Naruto quickly guessed that the only way to prove himself to Sakura was to remove the suit itself. So Naruto pinched Tsunade's nose and pulled the mask back over his head, until his own face was poking out of Tsunade's mouth.

"What the hell?! Naruto!??" shrieked Sakura.

Naruto quickly put his hand over Sakura's mouth and gestured to be quiet. He then lead her to the dark alley with the mirror. It took several minutes to explain the whole ordeal to Sakura, from finding the air tank to tricking Tsunade. He even showed her the note which explained the workings of the air tank.

"Naruto what in the world were you thinking pulling a prank on the Hokage like that?! She could be dead for all we know!" exclaimed Sakura.

"Well I didn't mean to even do it Sakura, I mean it just started out as a stupid prank and evolved into this. Besides it's kinda cool."

"KINDA COOL!?" yelled Sakura which caused Naruto to shrink in fear, "YOU'RE WEARING LADY TSUNADE LIKE A COSTUME! DID YOU EVEN THINK ABOUT THE VILLAGE? WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO NOW?!"

Naruto sweated nervously. He had not given the village's status any thought at all. If they couldn't change Tsunade back they'd be in huge trouble.

"Come on Sakura calm down a bit. Someone might hear us."
1311111121.title: The jig is up!

13111111211.content:
With her face in her palm, Sakura took a deep breathe and relaxed a bit to try to figure out what to do now. Thinking more clearly she focused on the situation. It wasn't like Tsunade was dead, she was just now a wearable piece of skin. The whole black air tank seemed more like a prank then something meant to actually harm people. If it was left in the middle of the road with a note, whoever placed it there obviously meant it to be found. And if it was a dangerous weapon no one would ever leave something like that lying around. Perhaps she should experiment with it herself...

"Okay look Naruto," she said returning from her deep thought, "clearly whoever left it there meant it to be found. You've tested it already but maybe...umm...I should try it out just to make sure it's safe."

"What?!" shrieked Naruto,"No way! I found it! Finders keepers!"

"I just would like to borrow it Naruto to test it okay? You can hold onto even if you'd like. And if you don't let me I'll immediately report this to the village. Even if you...deflate me like you did with Lady Tsunade, people will notice that the Hokage and I are missing. This is your only option okay? Do we have a deal?"

Naruto made a deep frown, regretting his decision to confront Sakura. This thing could potentially be the best prank he ever discovered. But since he saw no alternative he was forced to agree.

"So...who are you going to use it on Sakura?" questioned Naruto.

"Hmm...well...."
13111111211.title: Take a chill pill.

choices: "I'm about to get some well earned revenge."
"You're here to help me have a littlle fun with Naruto."
131111112111.content:
"A certain pig."

"You mean Ino right?" asked Naruto,"Man what is with you girls and grudges?"

Sakura gave an evil smile worthy of her inner self. She calculated a plan to trick her biggest rival into becoming a mere costume. She went over it with Naruto and the two set out to find the unsuspecting flower girl. Ino was watering flowers in her family's flower shop when the two arrived. Sakura hid on top of a nearby rooftop to get a prime view of the scene while Naruto moved into position as Lady Tsunade.

"Oh Lady Tsunade,"greeted Ino,"I didn't know you were visiting us. Is there something wrong?"

"I must speak with you privately Ino Yamanaka." spoke Naruto trying his best to sound like the Hokage,"It involves a difficult mission and I feel only you can be up to the task."

The prideful blonde could not resist a compliment from the Hokage and quickly stopped watering to join Tsunade in the alley directly below Sakura.

"Err, may I have some details as to what this mission is?" asked Ino.

"Oh I'll explain it to you Ino." yelled Sakura as she dropped down.
131111112111.title: The plan to deflate Ino.

choices: See what happens when Sakura breathes in both Tsunade and Ino.
1311111121111.content:
"What?! Sakura what is th-" Ino tried to say.

Naruto had already pulled out the air tank and shoved it in Ino's mouth and turned the valve. The flower girl panicked and frantically tried to pull the device lodged in her mouth out, which resulted in Sakura laughing.

"Sorry Ino, there's no point in trying. Even Lady Tsunade couldn't pull that tank out of her mouth. Just sit back and enjoy the deflation."

Ino gave a look that said "What?" to Sakura which immediately morphed to bug eyes as she felt the suction of the air tank removing all air in her body. Ino's transformation was much different than Tsunade's. It seemed like all the air tank was doing to her was making her incredibly skinny as her mid section compressed to the size of an apple. Her arms and legs soon followed suite as they began to look like twigs. She looked like she had been starved for weeks.

"Tsunade's deflation was a lot different." spoke Naruto.

Ino's eyes rolled back into her head as her skin shriveled like an old bed sheet. She was becoming hollow now, the process was nearly complete. What remained of Ino struggled to keep her up on her own two feet as they became hollow bags of flesh. Eventually her legs gave way and she fell flat on her back with her arms spread out. Naruto watched as the remaining air in her body escaped, effectively turning the once air filled suit into skin flat as paper. Ino's skin was still wearing her old clothes as Sakura stepped over what was once a talking breathing person.

"That was...incredible..." spoke Sakura, awestruck.

"Yea, so what are we going to do with her?" asked Naruto.

"I don't know, I didn't think it would actually work. Do you have any ideas Naruto?"
1311111121111.title: Revenge is flat.

13111111211111.content:
"Errr....well...", blushed Naruto.

"Well come on, you must have some idea of what we can do.", replied Sakura.

"I had an idea earlier...but it might be risky."

"What is it at least?"

"I was going to see what happens when you breathe in two airs at once. The first time you take the shape of whosoever air it is. But what happens when you take two in at once? Maybe something interesting will happen."

Sakura, let out a huge sigh. Then she took a deep breathe and said.

"I think I...want to do it Naruto. I'm sort of...", she blushed,"...Interested to see what it feels like. To inflate I mean. I-I just think it might be kind of cool, I guess."

Naruto gave Sakura a blank look and then looked slightly amused. Niggling thoughts in the back of his mind wanted to see Sakura all big and inflated but he didn't want to seem like a complete pervert. He wasn't the pervy sage, even if he did train under him.

"Uh, s-sure I guess Sakura. I mean if you want to test it. Who's air do you want to breathe in first?" replied Naruto.

"Hmm,",spoke Sakura," I think we should use..."
13111111211111.title: Naruto's "big" idea.

choices: Something goes wrong. (Naruto's air gets sucked out too)
131111112111111.content:
"We should use Lady Tsunade's air first Naruto, after all you prove that hers will work."

"Yea I guess you're right. But how are we going to get her air out of my body?"

Sakura looked at Naruto with annoyance, "Didn't you even read the back of the note that came with the air tank?"

Naruto simply shrugged as Sakura sighed and handed him the white card that had been taped to the air canister. Naruto read the back outloud.

"Also, should you happen to have the air of another inside of you, you may release it into another by simply making lip to lip contacts and blowing into the selected person. That person will expand into the form you were in but only their body shape. Skin color and hair will not change unless a suit is worn. Oh wow, does that mean we have to kiss?"

"No we don't you idiot! Well...I mean I guess so but...you don't have to put it that way...", muttered Sakura who was now blushing madly.

"Oh wow!" thought Naruto to himself, "My first kiss with Sakura! I can't believe it!"

"Well come on...let's get this over with..." said Sakura, breaking Naruto's daydreaming.

Sweating nervously, Naruto had to bend down to even allow his face to reach Sakura's. Puckering up he prepared for the happiest moment of his life.
131111112111111.title: Breathe of the Hokage.

choices: "Stay like this for a little while."
1311111121111111.content:
Aside from absolute bliss, Naruto felt their lips almost lock together as the air inside of him rushed into Sakura. The pink haired girl had a look of wild surprise as to how quickly the air filled her cheeks. Naruto's skin felt like thousands of little ants were making a mad dash across his entire body. Tsunade's air was gathered from every toe and finger of his suit, rushing to the ninja's mouth. This was the fastest deflation yet as Naruto felt Tsunade's pants fall to ground as he shrunk down back to size.

Sakura was absolutely amazed at what the air was doing to her body. She watched as Naruto/Tsunade slowly miniaturized in front of her very eyes. Everywhere, she felt her clothing becoming tighter and tighter as she ballooned upwards. She felt the strength of the former Hokage building in her arms, her once petite rump swelled outwards with no signs of stopping. She felt something push her red dress out several inches. Her breasts were growing to match Tsunade's!

"This feels incredible! No wonder Naruto couldn't resist doing this." Thought Sakura.

Naruto was beginning to feel like his old self again. Only with a more empty feeling as the warmth of Tsunade's air left him. As he returned to his short height, he again had to look up at Sakura who was nearing 6 feet in height. Just about the size of Lady Tsunade.

An unbelievable warm feeling spread through her body like wild fire as Sakura struggled to maintain her composure. She swelled up several more inches and her bust grew a couple more sizes until at last the two ninjas could break their embrace. Sakura felt invincible and stronger than she could ever hope to be.

"Naruto..." said Sakura as she looked down at the now tiny ninja boy, "This is beyond words, I want to..."
1311111121111111.title: Tsunade/Sakura.

13111111211111111.content:
"I want to take in Ino's air too!", yelled Sakura in Tsunade's voice.

"Are you sure Sakura? I mean it might be dangerous...", spoke Naruto.

"Yes! I want to be bigger!"

"Alright, alright. Just relax, I'll find the air tank."

Naruto had to dig within the remains of Tsunade's clothes to find the small black air tank filled with Ino's air. Eventually he dug it up and handed it to Sakura who snatched it out of his hands and bite down vigorously on the valve. The bursts of air quickly flooded the Tsunade shaped ninja as they traveled into the deep bowels of Sakura's body. Rather than the air gathering all in the stomach as it did with Naruto, Ino's air settled in Sakura's hips, thighs, and bum. The middle of her body flared outwards as her already strained dress was pushed to the limits.

And Naruto did have to gape his mouth open as Sakura lengthened even further vertically, bursting to nearly 7 feet tall. Her breasts were now becoming two medicine balls filled with air as they ripped through the neckline of her dress, exposing a cleavage that would put any woman in the country to shame. Sakura's pants had long ripped in two and blushing she attempted to cover her growing cleavage and exposed womanhood. She looked like an 8 foot pear at this point, and she was still growing!
13111111211111111.title: Sakura, the blimp.

131111112111111112.content:
Sakura, however, had forgotten that she still had her kunai knives on her which were very well sharpened. As the giant of a girl neared 9 feet tall she felt a stabbing pain as one of the sharp ends dug into her leg.

"MMMF! (OWW!)", she panicked and reached to pry the knife from her leg.

But it was no good, her legs had swollen so much that they tightened the carry case around her thigh enough to prevent her from removing an knives. Sakura was 10 feet tall when she reached out to Naruto with her sausage fingers for help. Her dress was about to tear in half. The pain from the knife was almost unbearable! She was going to pop!

Naruto heard an earth shattering KABOOM that blew him off his feet. When he opened his eyes, he saw Sakura's skin on the ground in front of him with a giant gash in her leg. Her clothing was scattered in pieces all around the alley. Tsunade, Sakura, and Ino's air were now gone. And there was a high chance they could never come back!
131111112111111112.title: Pop goes the ninja.

1311111121111111121.content:
Naruto was panicking as he filtered with the remains of skin on the ground. He tried frantically to put the pieces towards, hoping some higher power would magically glue them together. He didn't even notice the swirling pink smoke appearing behind him. The smoke grew and grew, forming a 10 foot tall well endowed woman.

"Naruto." spoke the smoke.

Naruto jumped and turned around to face the cloud of air.

"S-Sakura! Thank god! I thought you were gone there for a second..."

"Naruto, I'm sorry but I need a body to maintain myself, or else I could blow away forever."

Before Naruto could even respond, the pink smoke surged into his open mouth. He felt himself growing, like he did when he breathed in Tsunade's air. Only this was far more intense. Body part after body part inflated to massive proportions to assume the shape Sakura once had. He felt strong and big as Tsunade's clothes strained to contain his ballooning body. Watermelon sized breasts sprouted out of the blouse which Naruto felt. His skin was so tight and sensitive now. It felt like his butt was containing beanbag chairs as he moved his hands down his massive rump. His legs were more like barrels now.

Finally Tsunade's clothing snapped and gave his body full room to grow. Height was increasing rapidly, now not being held back by clothing. The Tsunade's suit hair color was changing to a light shade of pink, like Sakura's hair. His body reached the 10 foot marker and stopped suddenly. All the smoke had entered his body.

"Naruto," he heard Sakura's voice inside his head, "We are both now one. Unless you want to find another host."
1311111121111111121.title: Sakura enters Naruto.

choices: Go play with the air tank some more.
13111111211111111211.content:
Naruto played with his new dome like assets in deep thought. If he could pass the air onto someone else then he and Sakura could have some more fun. Sakura would be able to take control over the patsy's body, the only reason Naruto was in control was because she allowed him to be. He jumped up the roof with his huge yet lightweight body and set off to find someone else to contain Sakura. After hopping from roof to roof for a bit he found the perfect target.

Sasuke was training, completely alone, in the clearing of the forest. Not only would he be too worn out from training to fight back but no one would hear or see them all the way out here. Naruto jumped high into the air right over Sasuke.

Sasuke had been training since they got back from their mission, with no breaks. He hadn't been this exhausted since their "running up the tree" training from their first big mission. The last few missions they were on had been boring and wasteful. Sasuke had to make sure he was in shape and growing stronger, else he'd never be able to kill his older brother. Unfortunately, if he wasn't so absorbed in his training, he'd take notice in the ever increasing shadow looming over him created by a gigantic balloon woman about to belly flop him.

There was a loud WHOOMP followed by Sasuke muffling, "What the HELL?!". Naruto had Sasuke pinned under his giant belly. Smiling, he grabbed Sasuke's head with his hands and gave him a big kiss to blow Sakura's air into him.

Sasuke felt an unbelievable amount of pressure from the huge woman on top of him and within his own body. He was trying so hard to register that a 10 foot tall lady had just body slammed and kissed him, that he didn't notice his own body was growing like a balloon. It wasn't until his now huge breasts popped out from under Naruto's belly did he begin to panic.

"Mm! MmmmMmmMM! (HEY! WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?!)" mumbled Sasuke between air filled cheeks.

His jet black hair was becoming longer and pinkish now, though he couldn't see it. His body was beginning to resemble Naruto's old shape, while Naruto's form was deflating. More and more he grew, his manhood had even disappeared now. He was more woman than man. Finally when his height could no longer be considered normal, his eyes changed to a deep shade of green. Naruto was able to release himself from the former Sasuke's mouth.

"That you Sakura?" he asked.

The pink haired giant looked around at her body, Sasuke's clothing had been ripped and did a poor job covering her. Satisfied, she spoke.

"Yea it's me Naruto. Thanks for picking Sasuke for a new host. Now we can be together forever...Eventually this will be his new permanent form."

"Oh, er. Well that's nice I guess...What do you want to do now?"
13111111211111111211.title: Sasuke, the patsy.

choices: That short and wide woman there.

Of course he'd have to be able to trust Sasuke with his body, and then there was trying to explain it to Sasuke that he had no idea why they swapped places. Naruto figured that Sasuke would learn a good lesson from it though, everyone would despise him compared to his normal position in the village like some sort of saint.

1532.content:
Naruto debated his decision for only a few more seconds before reaching his conclusion and making a shadow clone. “This is probably the best course of action,” he said, “If this whole thing blows up in my face it’s easy enough to reverse, and besides since I’m going to get to see what it’s like being top dog in our age group, it’s only fair that Sasuke sees what it’s like to be the loser ‘dobe’ at the bottom of the pecking order.”

Taking the air can and approaching the clone who had received his orders and was waiting obediently for Naruto to begin, the blonde placed the mask over the clone’s mouth and injected Sasuke’s air into him. It was an odd sight as the clone blew up and then shrunk back down creating a near exact replica of Sasuke. The only difference was that this Sasuke had blonde, duck-butt shaped hair and his clothes had also morphed. The design was exactly like Sasuke’s only instead of a blue shirt and sandals they were bright orange like Naruto’s jumpsuit. The Uchiha-Uzumaki’s bandaged leggings and white forearms had also changed to become a nice shade of blue.

Naruto was in awe of how cool he looked when crossed with Sasuke. The clothes were awesome and he was willing to be that Sasuke would get way more girls if he showed off a little more orange. Or at least so Naruto thought.

“Back on track though,” Naruto said as he addressed his clone, “Suck my air out and put it into Sasuke’s body ok?”

“Hai!” The Naruto-Sasuke clone saluted and he put the air tank over Naruto’s mouth and sucked the blonde’s air out. It was an odd experience for Naruto, it was as though someone was sucking out his entire soul to the point were it was almost painful and the blonde would probably scream if someone randomly walked up to him and tried this on him, but he was prepared.

Nearly as quick as Naruto’s world went dark, he woke up again. This time though he felt a bit different. Looking down he saw that he was wearing a blue shirt and some short white shorts. He could also make out some dark blackish-blue hair framing the edges of his vision.

“Yosh!” Naruto shouted with delight, “It worked!”

He froze instantly when he heard Sasuke’s voice coming from his mouth. It was so odd to talk like Sasuke and even weirder to hear him shout “Yosh!” Naruto quickly looked around to make sure that no one had seen him before retrieving the air tank from the clone. He placed it over the blonde’s mouth and sucked Sasuke’s air out, watching as the clone returned to a regular version of Naruto.

Naruto was about to put Sasuke’s air into his body when he thought of a better idea, “Wait, Clone, knock me out and put Sasuke’s air into my body. When he wakes up make sure you’re gone and you’ve hidden the air tank. It’ll seem more like I have no idea what’s going on if Sasuke find’s me unconscious.”

Not missing a beat Naruto’s clone nailed Naruto in Sasuke’s body right in the gut before he could even brace himself. The blonde now dark haired boy slumped to the ground unconscious while the clone picked up the air tank and placed it over the empty Naruto skin suit. He pumped the air into the suit and as soon as it was finished he took off before Sasuke could fully wake up and spot him.

-- Sasuke’s POV

Sasuke groggily opened his eyes feeling slightly off. It felt as though he had suddenly gotten weaker and shorter as he sat up. Glancing down he noticed that he was wearing one of Naruto’s hideous orange jumpsuits. “What the hell am I wearing? This better not be another one of Naruto’s stupid pranks.”

The moment he spoke those words his eyes darted around looking for Naruto. Then it dawned on him that the words were his and he was talking like Naruto. Quickly removing his forehead protector he shined it up and used it as a makeshift mirror. He saw a pair of bright blue eyes and a whiskered face staring at him. Somehow he was an exact replica of Naruto.

“What the hell is happening,” Sasuke thought, “Kai! Kai!” he shouted trying to dispel whatever genjutsu someone had placed on him. It was no use however and so he got up to his feet since it was no use sitting on the ground wondering what to do. Finally his eyes happened upon a dark haired boy in blue laying unconscious in the corner of the alley.

“My body,” Sasuke muttered walking over to it. He picked it up and started building hopping towards the Uchiha compound. He was going to get to the bottom of this and until he did, his body was going nowhere.

-- Naruto’s POV

Naruto woke up once again when someone threw cold water all over him. Stunned for a moment before he shook the water out of his long dark hair, Naruto quickly surveyed his surroundings. He realized that he was tied to a chair in a dark room with a single bright lamp overhead: the classic interrogation scene.

“Alright you,” Sasuke in Naruto’s body said, “Talk, I want answers and I want them now. Why the hell do I look like the dobe!?”

Naruto realized that Sasuke had apparently not reacted too well to finding out his place swapping with Naruto. Maybe having the clone knock him unconscious wasn’t such a good idea. Quickly feigning ignorance the now onyx-eyed ninja shouted, “What the hell are you doing clone! I don’t even remember making you but if you don’t untie me from this fucking chair immediately, I’ll make you wish you were ever spawned from my imagination.”

”Hmmm, looks like the dobe and I really did switch places and he’s not someone else. This still doesn’t help my predicament though.” Sasuke thought. Returning his attention to Naruto, the blonde was about to slap his teammate when he realized that if he slapped him he’d really be slapping himself. Instead he decided it would be best if he tried talking things out for once.

“Listen up dobe, I’m not a clone. It’s me Sasuke and I’m in your body, and somehow you’re in my body. We need to get to the bottom of this,” Sasuke said.

“I’m you? Cool!” Naruto exclaimed freaking Sasuke out when he saw how idiotic he looked when Naruto was whooping and hollering in his body.

“No, you idiot this isn’t cool,” Sasuke said. “Don’t you have any clue what happened?”

Naruto pretended to think for a moment, “Well I was looking for Kakashi-sensei to see if he could help train me but then someone came out of nowhere and hit me in the back of the head. The next thing I know, I’m tied to this chair and you’re shouting and throwing cold water on me… jerk. Why don’t you untie me already?”

“Because I’m not sure that I want to yet,” Sasuke said causing Naruto’s jaw to drop. “If I let you out, you’ll look like a complete idiot like you usually do, only you’ll be doing it in my body that means I’ll look like an idiot!”

“Oh come on I’m not that bad!” Naruto whined.

“Yes you are,” Sasuke replied simply.

“But wait! Sasuke if you leave me sitting here for weeks on end, then what happens we switch back? Your muscles will all have gotten weak,” Naruto tried to reason.

“Hn,” Sasuke grunted while pondering that argument. It wouldn’t be good if he got weaker over time. It would delay his revenge on Itachi and he knew he was already behind enough on that. So he could either turn the blonde loose in his body and hope he didn’t make too big of a fool of Sasuke or he could keep him locked up and sacrifice vital training time he could spend preparing his body for Itachi.

There was also the possibility that this was some huge elaborate scheme concocted by Naruto. That would be really odd but Naruto was a trickster and a cunning one at that, no matter how stupid he tended to act. What to do… what to do…

As Naruto stood in the street looking at the air tank in a mix of disbelief and confusion a shadow fell over him. He turned and found himself face to stomach with none other than the Snake Mistress of Konoha herself, Mitarashi Anko. The tokubetsu jonin had a stick with dumplings on it hanging out of her mouth as she look at Naruto with a raised eyebrow. Naruto had just begun to sweat under her studious gaze when she spoke.

"What ya doin' kid?"

Naruto almost jumped. He picked up the air tank and pointed to it.

"Er...I tripped over this and was just wondering who would just leave in the middle of an alleyway. It was weird to, there was a note..."

Naruto put the tank on the ground as he looked around for the note detailing the alleged function of the air tank. He didn't see Anko's playful grin as she eyed the tank. Anko loved helium. Especially while on missions. There was just something utterly hilarious about running around slitting throats while your voice sounded like a chipmunk whose nuts are in a vise.

As Naruto kicked around trash looking for the paper the tokujo reached down and picked up the tank. She put the nozzle in her mouth and grinned around it.

"Hey, Uzumaki! Wanna see something funny?"

Naruto turned around just as Anko turned the valve on top of the tank.

"Anko-sensei, wait! Don't!"

To late. Anko's eyes widened and she tried to close the valve, but she couldn't move the hand. Which was strange. Helium didn't do that to you, as a matter of fact, this didn't feel like helium at all! Helium almost felt like you were swallowing cold water, this felt more like that time she tried to hold her breath for twenty minutes! The lack of air and the shooting pains! Anko looked to Naruto for help. The blonde ran over and began trying to pull the hose from her mouth, but to no avail.The tube didn't give an inch. Naruto next tried to close the valve, but judging from Anko's groans, that only made things worse.

He ran up and wound up his arm to cut the air tube. The genin brought down the kunai in a picture perfect cut. Both ninja watched in shock as the steel knife shattered against the rubber tube. Naruto's jaw dropped open and he turned to Anko.

"Just...just hold on sensei! I'm going to get help!"

Naruto turned to run away, but was stopped by frantic grunting from Anko followed by a metallic clang. He turned around and found the jonin on her knees. Naruto was alone in an alley with the air tank and what remained of Mitarashi Anko. Only one thing went through the blonde's head.

15533222222221111.content:
Naruto had never been in Hinata's room before. Considering she lived in a mansion, he had expected her to have a large bed maybe complete with a closest full of hundreds of shoes and other girly stuff. Instead, the room was rather small with a tiny cot for a bed. The only other things she had were a dresser and desk with a mirror and chair, maybe several scrolls shattered around them. Hinata collapsed on the bed, causing it to creak loudly.

"What a day...I'm exhausted..." But Naruto was more interested in the mirror. He hadn't gotten a good look at himself after he took the suit off and was eager to see what he now looked like.

Since it seemed like Hinata had forgotten about the ramen already, Naruto started to climb his way up the chair and onto the desk. That's when Hinata noticed him.

"Huh? A-Akaruto! Get down from there!"

She grabbed Naruto with two hands and plucked him off the desk, but not before he was able to see himself in the mirror. Though his view was brief, he looked a lot like Akamaru only with yellow fur. His whiskers were also a lot more blacker and more noticeable, he had bright blue eyes as well. But the biggest difference was his usual bright orange jacket, shrunken to fit his dog size. He had forgotten to take his clothing off before he entered the suit.

"Oh, I get it boy. You're hungry is all, right? Sorry, I-I forgot all about the ramen..."

She reached into her backpack and pulled out a large brown bag. Naruto would recognize that smell anywhere. Pork-beef ramen, cooked just the way he liked it. He started salivating as Hinata set both him and and bowl down. For the first time since Naruto had donned the suit, he was thankful for his tiny size. That made the bowl of ramen seem so much bigger! He didn't even have to use chopsticks anymore, he could just dip his head in and eat.

After a few minutes of slurping, Naruto rolled over. His small stomach was now completely full of beef-noodle goodness. Of course, his face was completely drenched in wet noodles. Hinata shook her head.

"What a m-mess...I think you to take a bath now, Akaruto..."

Naruto gave a weak whimper. He was in no position to be moving in order to resist.

"Oh c-come on now that's not f-fair...I hate it when you give me t-that look...Alright, so you'll be more c-cooperative. I'll take a bath with you."

"Aroo!?" That was not what Naruto had in mind!
