155332222222211112.content:
Naruto hadn't expected Hinata tooffer to bathe alongside him.

Although he wouldn't mind taking a bath with her, Hinata was a pretty nice girl, and part of him didn't want to see her exposed, under false pretenses.

Even so, Naruto did put this suit on to have some fun, and it was a chance to have some fun.

Naruto gave his best impression of a happy dog, by wagging his tail and panting. "Arf arf!"

Hinata nodded, grabbing two towels."A-alright then, c'mon Akaruto!" Hinata said, stuttering slightly.

The two of them exited the room and walked into one of the bathrooms.

Naruto couldn't believe his eyes. The bathroom was quite spacious. The room seemed to be strictly for bathing, as there was a large tub, large enough for three people to get in it, and still have plenty of room to themselves.

'It's practically a pool!' Naruto thought, maybe it was his new canine instincts, but he was glad that Hinata wanted to bathe with him here. It was a good spot to play.

"Now to turn it on." Hinata said as she twisted the valve, letting watm water fill the bath as she added a bubble mix.

Naruto then felt Hinata take off his jacket. He turned to see her.

Hinata was young, but already showing signs of good development. Her breasts were small, but larger than Sakura, Ino, or possibly Tenten's.

That day Naruto learned dogs could get nose bleeds.

Hinata then wadded into the tub, her head was the only thing visible now. "Come on Akaruto, j-jump on in!"

Naruto needed no second bidding, he went into the tub, and the floor was soaked with warm water.

Naruto then doggie paddled to his 'owner' and barked again.

Hinata smiled. "Are you ready to get clean?"

Before Naruto could respond, he noticed that Hinata had soap and a mischevous smile. Soon he was being scrubbed and cleaned, but kept splashing Hinata playfully.

Once all was done, Hinata held Naruto close.

"I love you boy!" she said quietly and contently.

Naruto really enjoyed it.
155332222222211112.title: A shy girl and her blonde pup

choices: Hinata tripped and the air tank came out of her pack.
1553322222222111121.content:
Naruto couldn't quite explain it, but he didn't want to leave Hinata's side. Maybe it was because he never really had a family, and no one had ever told him that they loved him (Even if he was a dog). After the bath she tried to dry him off, though by some sort of instinct he shook himself clean getting her soaked again. Hinata laughed though and took him to bed.

Naruto slept right next to her on top of the sheets of the ragged cot. For the first time in his life he didn't feel alone when going to bed. The darkness didn't seem big and empty. He felt warm. Safe.

"I get it..." He thought to himself. "If things had been different...Hinata and I would have been really close."

Reality sunk in. Here he was, a teenage ninja trying to pass off as a girl's pet dog. And this girl seemed to have really strong feelings for him. But Naruto felt he couldn't deceive Hinata like that. He really knew next nothing about her life. He wasn't her dog, this wasn't real. No matter how comfortable or pleasant it felt. He was only fooling himself.

"I'll tell her tomorrow..." That was his last thought before drifting off into a peaceful slumber.

~

The next day, it was a beautiful and sunny morning. Both of them woke up and went downstairs for breakfast. Unfortunately, Hinata didn't have anymore ramen meaning he had to eat actual dog food. Needless to say, the artificial bacon and beef taste did little to disguise the after taste. It was like eating a beef flavored cereal, and maybe using vinegar for milk. Naruto had to gag the food down.

"What's wrong b-boy? You usually love Ninjas-And-Bits..."

Naruto hadn't been able to get a moment alone with Hinata to tell her what really was happening. All he could do was act like a dog while Hinata was around her family; he only wanted her to know so that way they could avoid mass panic. What would happen if the family dog just started talking after all?

Naruto was relieved when Hinata's father said. "Hinata, take Akaruto for a walk. He needs to be prepared for today's training."

"Y-yes father." She led Naruto outside, grabbing her backpack (Which still had the air-tank and Akamaru suit in it)

"Perfect." He thought to himself.

~

Apparently, Konoha had a dog park near the Hokage monument. Naruto never knew because he never had a pet, except maybe that big goldfish but one night he forgot to do the shopping for dinner and the stores were all closed...Let's just say Naruto wouldn't be the pet owner.

The park was basically a large circular clearing with a nice dirt path leading around the edge. In the center of the field were dozens of dogs playing fetch happily with their masters. Something deep inside Naruto told him to go run out and play with them. But Hinata had been kind enough to not put him on a leash, he didn't want to break that trust. Besides the last thing he wanted was having other dogs start smelling his ass.

"Come on, just tell her..." He started thinking to himself. He couldn't bring himself to.

Just then...

Before Kiba could try and figure things out, a great dane came and snatched the Akamaru suit from his hand.

The great dane was a feral dog, about two (human) years old. She wasn't very well fed and thought that the suit was some dead animal she could eat.

The Great Dane ran off with Akamaru's skinsuit.

Naruto knew that if he lost the suit, he could kiss his human self goodbye. Quickly he grabbed the airtank, so no one could take that.

As he began to scamper away, Hinata called out to him. "Akaruto! S-stop please!"

Naruto knew that Hinata would just stop him if he ran, and the only way he'd make it in time was if he was unhindered. Naruto decided to talk to her.

"Hinata! Wait for me here!" he yelled to her, as Hinata grew pale.

Soon Naruto found Kiba near a narrow alley.

"Aroo!" Naruto howled, to say yes. He then entered the narrow space and emerged to see the great dane.

She was sitting in an abandoned doghouse, amid metal, decaying wood, and other garbage. The great dane was asleep, the skin was by her.

'Great, now to grab that suit!' Naruto thought. He did manage to grab it, but got an idea.

Naruto put the airtank into the dog's mouth carefully and sucked the air from it, producing a second suit.

155332222222211112112.title: A spare suit...

choices: Later that night, Naruto plays with the new dog suit.
1553322222222111121122.content:
"Hinata! Wait for me here!" The words played over and over in Hinata's head. Akaruto talked like a real person, if only for a few seconds. But that was impossible...Hinata had known Akaruto for her whole life, ever since his old master the Fourth Hokage sealed the Nine-Tailed-Fox into the pup.

"Hinata!" There was no way he could talk. But there was something about the voice that sounded so familiar...It was puzzling.

"Hinata!" There was a blond haired boy grinning at her.

"Hinata!" Yelled Kiba. "What happened!?"

Hinata opened her eyes. Kiba was standing over her with what appeared to be a rotten bag in his hands. Akaruto sat their wagging his tail; though unknown to her, he was trying as best as he could to seem as dog-like as possible. It was working though, Hinata was beginning to doubt herself.

"Was...it a dream?"

Kiba gave her a confused look. "Was what a dream? Akaruto caught that dog if that's what you mean..."

"No t-that's not what I meant. I..." She tried to think of a way to make it sound like she wasn't going crazy. "I-I thought I heard Akaruto talk..."

"Talk? You mean like barking?"

"N-no, like talking talking..." Kiba stared at her for a few seconds before putting his hand to her forehead. "I do not have a fever Kiba..."

"Surprisingly not. Hinata, that's just crazy talk. Only a few dogs even in the Inuzuka clan can speak like we do. He might be able to understand you but not talk, right Akaruto?"

Naruto took that as his cue to bark.

Still, Hinata was having a hard time just shrug it off as a trick of her mind or a dream.

"I-I don't know...I r-remember clearly what I heard..."

Kiba sighed. "You know what I think it was? Your father's been giving you a hard time again lately, right? You probably are so stressed out that you just imagined it. Come on, we probably need to get back there soon anyway. Else he'll be on MY case for being late. Besides, Akaruto got plenty of exercise from that little chase. Right?"

Naruto barked in agreement again.

"I...I guess so..." Kiba helped her up and they all went home.

~

"Why did I play along like that?" Naruto asked himself during the walk back. "You know you gotta tell her, idiot! You can't get too comfortable like this! This isn't real and see? She's already getting suspicious!"

Part of him, a big part, really didn't want to tell her his secret. Secretly Naruto wished that dog had just taken away the suit. But his rational side (the one that always talked him out of buying candy when passing the shop on the way home) was screaming at him to end this.

Naruto had to admit, this was getting more complicated than it was worth. Maybe he should just make the change back tonight when he was alone. This reality wasn't his and he didn't belong here.

Lord Hyūga was very cross when they all got home after lunch, training was scheduled for just after breakfast. Kiba tried to explain that they had to chase a stray dog around but Hinata's father would hear nothing of it.

"Now you'll all have to work three times as hard to make up for lost time! Get to work!"

All three of them sighed. Kiba returned the bag to Hinata, and Naruto's training began.
1553322222222111121122.title: Strange Thing Dreams.

15533222222221111211222.content:
Hours later, Naruto finally finished training.

Hiashi Hyuga (Hinata's father) wasn't kidding, the training was hard, not to mention full of lectures.

Naruto basically had to learn certain jutsu specific to ninja dogs, like the ones that he had seen Akamaru use. Not only that, but he got flicked on the nose whenever he fell asleep, which was whenever Kiba explained a jutsu for more than a minute.

Somehow, Naruto managed the training without blowing his cover. The rest of the day went on without much happening, just more Ninjas-and-bits, and Hanabi, Hinata's little sister, complaining that he smelled.

Later that night, after he was sure Hinata was asleep, Naruto pulled out the new suit.

His less than wise side wanted one last prank before returning to normal, so he decided to turn someone else in the Hyuga home into a dog as well.

The only realistic targets were Hinata and Hanabi.

On the one hand, Hinata would be a fun target, but she had been so nice to him, and if something went wrong, she'd be stuck with her new form.

The option of trapping Hanabi had less drawbacks, but didn't seem to be as appealing as the first. Although the fact that she was mean earlier, and that he barely knew her meant he could just prank her with no remorse.

'Man, this is hard!' Naruto thought, as he paced the bed, the great dane suit in his mouth.

In the end he chose...
15533222222221111211222.title: Who should Naruto put in the dog house?

155332222222211112112221.content:
Hinata started snoring loudly. It was still late at night, sunrise wouldn't be for another eight hours. That would be plenty of time for what Naruto had in mind. Thankfully, Hinata was an extremely heavy sleeper. Naruto was able to pull off her covers and work the dog suit on her starting from her toes and up. It was very difficult to do at the size of a small dog but somehow he managed to completely cover her.

Now it was the easy part, grabbing the air tank in his teeth he gently place the nozzle in her snoring lips. He was no longer worried about waking her up now, he flipped the knob and watched as her air swapped with the great dane's. He wagged his tail in delight.

~

"Psst! Hinata!" Whispered a voice in her ear.

Hinata blinked several times. Something felt different. And who was that calling her? Father? It seemed too early to wake up...

"Are you there, Hinata!?" She felt a cold nose poke her in the back.

"Akaruto?" That got her up quickly. Sitting up she saw that Akaruto was indeed standing over her. He looked a little bigger though for some reason.

"D-did you just talk?"

"Yep!"

Hinata nearly fainted again in shock. But there were so many questions going through her mind.

"W-what's going on?"

Akaruto gave her a confused look. "Why, you're dreaming of course! Here take a look in the mirror." He extended one paw aimed at her desk mirror.

Hinata took a look across the room and saw what appeared to be a dark haired great dane sitting in her bed next to Akaruto. Wait a moment, a great dane? Why was a great dane in her bed? When Hinata moved, the dog moved as well. She felt a cold sweat drop done her back (Even though dogs can't sweat), as she looked down at her body. She had on her pajamas still but black fur covered her underneath.

"I-I'm...a dog!" She nearly screamed.

Akaruto started laughing. "Very observant! Nice reaction."

There was a long moment of silence as Hinata took everything in. At last she said. "This is a very strange dream..."

"That's an understatement."

"I don't u-understand though." Hinata stood up, standing on four legs was very strange. "W-why am I dreaming this? And why does this seem so r-real? I've never had a dream like this before, it's so...o-odd."

Akaruto just shrugged. "You tell me, it's your dream. I will tell you this though. You gotta be back in this bed and asleep before sunrise."

"W-why?"

Akaruto gave her a sudden serious look. "Or else you can never wake up from this dream."

Hinata gulped. "O-oh..."

"But don't worry! That's hours away, we have all night to play! Is there anything you want to do...?"

Hinata thought for a moment. "Well..."

~

"I can't believe she's buying this!" Thought Naruto to himself. He had gotten lucky that she didn't scream at first and wake up the whole house. For his prank he was going to have some fun with Hinata as dogs.

"T-this is all a dream...r-right?"

He sighed. "Yes, I told you that already."

She had a grin on her face that he had never seen before. "L-let's..."
155332222222211112112221.title: This is a very strange dream...

Using his Ninja skills along with survival he scouted the area that he landed in and saw a village where peole were wearing loose robes around their being's, using the transformation Jutsu he entered the village and discovered he was no longer in the Elemental nations but in the land of Greece where gods, heroes and monsters live.

as expected he freak-out a bit but remembered that he was no longer under the watchful eyes and glares of the village and can do what ever he wanted.

a Grin crept up in his face as he could start a new life here.

checking his pockets he found he still had the scrolls that contain all of his necessities including the Tank that allows him to turn anyone into a skinsuit by stealing their air/ life.

Armed with knowledge, skill and the tank what does or who does he target first
1553322222222222122221222122222222222222.title: yes god of war

1553322222222222122221222122222222222222.content:
after a while of traveling and learning about this new world, Naruto learned of three Deities known as the sisters of Fate who control the fates of all who live in this world, including the gods.

Naturally the thought of one who controls the fate of others sounded not only helpful to the young shinobi but also powerful, if he found them then he could find a way to return home if he choose.

so after learning where the temple of fate was located, Naruto, snuck in using all of his shinobi skills and traversed into the temple, encountering no resistance even though there were monster but they did not notice him.

he made his way into what he thought was the centre and from the balcony he site a vision of beauty.

She was an unnaturally tall woman with Pure white hair, star like eye's, a robe that hugged her body perfectly and covered just the one breast leaving the other exposed, showing her D-cups, the cloth split at the sides form a long loincloth that dropped to her knees while her legs and thighs were exposed.

she seemed to be unaware of his presence, even as he oogled her, Naruto was overcome by the idea and the arousal of using the tank on her.

The thought of becoming her was arousing to him, but how did he do it?
1553322222222222122221222122222222222222.title: Lahkesis one of the sisters of fate

1553322222222222122221222122222222222222.content:
Naruto decided to go for the simple choice, the Mouth, he prepared the tank and creeped up behind the Deity, his skill as a ninja proved fruitful as he stood behind her large form.

he readied the Tube and in an flash of charka enhanced speed he jump onto her back, surprising the large woman before a tube was stuck in her mouth just as she was about to speak, Naruto quickly jumped back down and turned the Valve as fast as he can before it started to work it's magic.

Lahkesis, didn't know what just happened, one moment she was watching the Mirrors of fate the next something jumped up on her and stuck this weird tube in her mouth, she felt something weird overcome her, her strength was leaving her along with her power that she couldn't stay afloat In the air, when her feet touched the ground she collapsed face first as she felt all of her strength gone.

next she started to loose feeling in her lower half, from Naruto's perspective he saw the large woman's legs deflate before him, he watched in awe as her muscles disappeared and her limbs deflated into hanging sacks of flesh.

Lahkesis gave out one last muffled scream before her head became a hollow bag of skin.

Naruto saw the once great woman become nothing more then a laying bag of skin on the floor with clothes still around it.

her once luscious ass had deflated into two flat bags of flesh along with her breasts, her head was hollow with her mouth opened up in a silent scream.

turning off the tank he looked at the two items and thought about what he should do next.

info.brief_description: After a mission Naruto finds an air tank that can turn anyone into an inflatable suit.
info.description:
After a tough mission Naruto is down in the dumps. He wanders the streets and just so happens to trip over a weird air tank. The note on the card states:

"Who so ever breathes into this air tank will deflate into a wearable skin suit that any person may put on over their own skin. Once the air tank is full of the deflated one's air anyone may either breathe his or her air from the tank and assume their body shape, height, and voice, they may wear their skin and take their appearance, or they may do both and become a complete duplicate of the victim."

Excited, Naruto decides to test his new found prank air tank on the many characters of the Naruto universe.

Feel free to have fun with this story and take it where ever you want.

(Time period is just before Sasuke leaves. However if you must you may include other characters from the past or future.)

Update: Thanks for the 5000 views all! And thanks for those who have contributed to the story! Woot 100 chapters!
